GSP33brssgo2u:6: utpattyantavivarjitaścitivapurvyāpi ca kartāṃśako liṅgena prathito 'pi nāmatanukṛttaṃ jānakīśaṃ bhaje //2//
GSP33brssgo2u:10: prathame 'dhyāye sarvajñaḥ sarveśvaraḥ jagata utpattikāraṇaṃ, mṛtsuvarṇādaya iva ghaṭarucakādīnām /
GSP33brssgo2u:11: utpannasya jagato niyantṛtvena stithikāraṇaṃ, māyāvīva māyāyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:12: prasāritasya ca jagataḥ punaḥ svātmanyevopasaṃhārakāraṇaṃ, avaniriva caturvidhasya bhūtagrāmasya /
GSP33brssgo2u:13: sa eva ca sarveṣāṃ na ātmetyetadvedāntavākyasamanvayapratipādanena pratipāditam /
GSP33brssgo2u:17: prativedāntaṃ ca sṛṣṭyādiprakriyāyā avigītatvamisyarthajātasya pratipādanāya dvitīyo 'dhyāya ārabhyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:20: yaduktaṃ brahmaiva sarvajñaṃ jagataḥ kāraṇamiti, tadayuktam /
GSP33brssgo2u:22: smṛtiśca tantrākhyā paramarṣipraṇītā śiṣṭaparigṛhītā anyāśca tadanusīriṇyaḥ smṛtayaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:24: tāsu hyacetanaṃ pradhānaṃ svatantraṃ jagataḥ kāraṇamupanibadhyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:35: kathaṃ punarīkṣatyādibhyo hetubhyo brahmaiva sarvajñaṃ jagataḥ kāraṇamityavadhāritaḥ śrutyarthaḥ smṛtyanavakāśadoṣaprasaṅgena punarākṣipyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:37: paratantraprajñāstu prāyeṇa janāḥ svātantryeṇa śrutyarthamavadhārayitumaśaknuvantaḥ prakhyātapraṇetṛkāsu smṛtiṣvavalamberan /
GSP33brssgo2u:39: asmatkṛte ca vyākhyāne na viśvasyurbahumānātsmṛtīnāṃ praṇetṛṣu /
GSP33brssgo2u:41: śrutiśca bhavati- 'ṛṣiṃ prasūtaṃ kapilaṃ yastamagre jñānairbibharti jāyamānaṃ ca paśyet' (śve. 5.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:44: tasmādapi smṛtibalena vedāntā vyākhyeyā iti punarākṣepaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:48_0: tā udāhariṣyāmaḥ - 'yattatsūkṣmamavijñeyam' iti paraṃ brahma prakṛtya 'sa hyantarātmā
GSP33brssgo2u:48_1: bhūtānāṃ kṣetrajñaśceti kathyate' iti coktvā 'tasmādavyaktamutpannaṃ triguṇaṃ dvijasattama' ityāha /
GSP33brssgo2u:51: sa sargakāle ca karoti sarvaṃ saṃhārakāle ca tadatti bhūyaḥ' iti purāṇe /
GSP33brssgo2u:52: bhagavadgītāsu ca- 'ahaṃ kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ pralayastathā' (bha.gī. 7.6) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:53: paramātmānameva ca prakṛtyāpastamabaḥ paṭhati- 'tasmātkāyāḥ prabhavanti sarve sa mūlaṃ śāśvatikaḥ sa nityaḥ (dha.sū. 1.8.23.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:57: vipratipattau ca smṛtīnāmavaśyakartavye 'nyataraparigrahe 'nyataraparityāge ca śrutyanusāriṇyaḥ smṛtayaḥ pramāṇamanapekṣyā itarāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:58: taduktaṃ pramāṇalakṣaṇe- 'virodhe tvanapekṣaṃ syādasti hyanumānam' (jai.sū. 1.3.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:59: nacātīndriyānarthañśrutimantareṇa kaścidupalabhata iti śakyaṃ saṃbhāvayituṃ nimittābhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:65: tataśca pūrvasiddhāyāścodanāyā artho na paścimasiddhapuruṣavacanavaśenātiśaṅkituṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:66: siddhavyapāśrayakalpanāyāmapi bahutvātsiddhānāṃ pradraśitena prakāreṇa smṛtivipratipattau satyāṃ na śrutivyapāśrayādanyannirṇayakāraṇamasti /
GSP33brssgo2u:69: tasmāttasyāpi smṛtivipratipattyupanyāsena smṛtyanusārāviṣayavivecanena ca sanmārge prajñā saṃgrahaṇīyā /
GSP33brssgo2u:70: yā tu śrutiḥ kapilasya jñānātiśayaṃ pradarśayantī pradarśitā na tayā śrutiviruddhamapi kāpilaṃ mataṃ śraddhātuṃ śakyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:72: anyasya ca kapilasya sagaraputrāṇāṃ pratapturvāsudevanāmnaḥ smaraṇāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:74: bhavati cānyā manormāhātmyaṃ prakhyāpayantī śrutiḥ - 'yadvai kiñca manuravadattadbheṣajam' (tai.saṃ 2.2.10.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:77: ' (12.11) iti sarvātmatvadarśanaṃ praśaṃsatā kāpilaṃ mataṃ nindyata iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:79_0: mahābhārate 'pi ca 'bahavaḥ puruṣā brahmannutāho eka eva tu' iti vicārya 'bahavaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:81: ' ityupakramya 'mamāntarātmā tava ca ye cānye dehasaṃsthitāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:87: tatra ko mohaḥ kaḥ śokaḥ ekatvamanupaśyataḥ' (ī. 7) ityevaṃvidhā /
GSP33brssgo2u:88: ataśca siddhamātmabhedakalpanayāpi kapilasya tantraṃ vedaviruddhaṃ vedānusārimanuvacanaviruddhaṃ ca,
GSP33brssgo2u:90: vedasya hi nirapekṣaṃ svārthe prāmāṇyaṃ raveriva rūpaviṣaye /
GSP33brssgo2u:91: puruṣavacasāṃ tu mūlāntarāpekṣaṃ vaktusmṛtivyavahitaṃ ceti viprakarṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:108_1: karteti aṃśa iti ca prathitaḥ prasiddho yastaṃ pratyagabhinnaṃ paramātmānaṃ mūlaprakṛtiniyantāraṃ bhaje ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:113: evaṃ prathamādhyāyasyārthamanūdya tasmin viṣaye virodhaparihāraviṣayiṇaṃ dvitīyādhyāyasyārthaṃ pādaśaḥ saṃkṣipya kathayati-idānīmiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:116: tṛtīyapāde prativedāntaṃ sṛṣṭiśrutīnāṃ jīvātmaśrutīnāṃ ca vyomādimahābhūtānāṃ janmalayakramādikathanenāvirodhaḥ pratipādyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:125: atra pūrvapakṣe smṛtivirodhāduktasamanvayāsiddhiḥ phalaṃ, siddhānte tatsiddhiriti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:127: sa kiṃ sāṃkhyasmṛtyā virudhyate na veti smṛtiprāmāṇyāprāmāṇyābhyāṃ saṃdehe pūrvapakṣamāha-yaduktamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:128: tantryante vyutpādyante tattvānyaneneti tantraṃ śāstraṃ kapiloktam,
GSP33brssgo2u:132: nanu sāṃkhyasmṛtiprāmāṇyāya pradhānavādagrahe manvādismṛtīnāmaprāmāṇyaṃ syādityāśaṅkya tāsāṃ dharme sāvakāśatvātpramāṇyaṃ syādityāha-manvādīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:137: śrutivirodhe smṛtyaprāmāṇyasyeṣṭatvātpūrvapakṣo na yukta iti śaṅkate-kathamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:138: ye svātantryeṇa śrutyarthaṃ jñātuṃ śaknuvanti teṣāmayaṃ pūrvapakṣo na bhavet,
GSP33brssgo2u:144: yathā sāṃkhyasmṛtivirodhādbrahmavādastyājya iti tvayocyate tathā smṛtyantaravirodhātpradhānavādāstyājya iti mayocyata iti siddhāntayati-tasya samādhiriti /
GSP33brssgo2u:154: nanu śrutivirodhaḥ kimiti nokta ityata āha-smṛtibaleneti /
GSP33brssgo2u:155: smṛtīnāṃ mitho virodhe kathaṃ tattvanirṇayaḥ, tatrāha-darśitaṃ tviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:158: vastutattve smṛtīnāṃ mitho virodhe vastuni vikalpāyogāt kḷptaśrutimūlāḥ smṛtayaḥ pramāṇaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:161: 'audumbarīṃ spṛṣṭvodgāyet'iti pratyakṣaśrutiviruddhā 'sā sarvā veṣṭayitavyā'iti smṛtirmānaṃ na veti saṃdehe,
GSP33brssgo2u:165: atra tu virodhe sati śrutyanumānāyogānmūlābhāvāt sarvaveṣṭanasmṛtirapramāṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:168: kapilādibhiḥ kilādau vedaprāmāṇyaṃ niścitya tadarthasya dharmasyānuṣṭhānena siddhiḥ saṃpāditā,
GSP33brssgo2u:169: tayā siddhyā praṇītasmṛtyanusāreṇānādiśrutipīḍā na yuktopajīvyavirodhāditi pariharati-na /
GSP33brssgo2u:172: śrutīnāṃ mukhyārthamatikramyopacaritārthatvaṃ śaṅkituṃ na śakyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:176: siddhānāṃ vacanamāśritya vedārthakalpanāyāmapi siddhoktīnāṃ mitho virodhe śrutyāśritamanvādyuktibhireva vedārthanirṇayo yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:178: nanu mandamateḥ sāṃkhyasmṛtau śraddhā bhavati tasya matirvedāntamārge kathamāneyetyata āha-paratantretyādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:179: nanu śrutyā kapilasya sarvajñatvoktestanmate śraddhā durvāretyata āha-yā tviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:180: kapilaśabdamātreṇa sāṃkhyakartā śrauta iti bhrāntirayuktā, tasya dvaitavādinaḥ sarvajñatvāyogāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:181: atra ca sarvajñānasaṃbhṛtatvena śrutaḥ kapilo vāsudevāṃśa eva /
GSP33brssgo2u:182: sa hi sarvātmatvajñānaṃ vaidikaṃ sāṃkhyamupadiśatīti sarvajña iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:184: kiñca yaḥ kapilaṃ jñānairbibharti tamīśvaraṃ paśyediti vidhīyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:186: dvaitavādinaḥ kapilasya śrautatvaṃ nirasya brahmavādino manoḥ śrautatvamāha-bhavati ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:188: puruṣā ātmānaḥ kiṃ vastuto bhinnā uta sarvadṛśyānāṃ pratyagātmaḥ eka iti vimarśārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:189: bahūnāṃ puruṣākārāṇāṃ dehānāṃ yathaikā yonirupādānaṃ pṛthvī tathā taṃ puruṣamātmānaṃ viśvaṃ sarvopādānatvena sarvātmakaṃ sarvajñātvādiguṇaiḥ saṃpannaṃ kathayiṣyāmi /
GSP33brssgo2u:190: viśve sarve lokaprasiddhā devatiryaṅmanuṣyādīnāṃ mūrdhāno 'syaiveti viśvamūrdhā,
GSP33brssgo2u:201: yasmiñjñānakāle kevalaṃ svatantraprakṛtikalpanayaiva vedaviruddhaṃ na kintvātmabhedakalpanayāpīti siddhamiti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:202: smṛtivirodhe vedasyaivāprāmāṇyaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-vedasya hīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:204: pauruṣeyavākyānāṃ svārthasmṛtitanmūlānubhavayoḥ kalpanayā pramāṇyaṃ jñeyamiti vyavahitaṃ parataḥprāmāṇyamiti viprakarṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:207: iha svataḥparataḥpramāṇyayorvaiṣamyājjhaṭiti niścitaprāmāṇyena cānupasaṃjātavirodhinā vedavākyena viruddhasmṛtereva bādha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:216: pradhānāditarāṇi yāni pradhānapariṇāmatvaṃ na samṛtau kalpitāni mahadādīni na tāni vede loke vopalabhyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:219: yadapi kvacittatparamiva śravaṇamavabhāsate tadapyatatparaṃ vyākhyātam 'ānumānikamapyekeṣām' (bra. 1.4.1) ityatra /
GSP33brssgo2u:224: ahaṅkāraprakṛtikatvena tanmātrāṇyapyaprasiddhāni smartuṃ na śakyanta ityāha-itareṣāṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:227: sāṃkhyasmṛtermahadādiṣviva pradhāne 'pi prāmāṇyaṃ neti niścīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:228: sāṃkhyasmṛterbādhe 'pi taduktayuktīnāṃ kathaṃ bādha ityata āha-tarketi //2//
GSP33brssgo2u:239: samyagdarśanābhyupāyo hi yogo vede vihitaḥ 'śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyaḥ' (bṛ. 2.4.5) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:241: ityādinā cāsanādikalpanāpuraḥsaraṃ bahuprapañcaṃ yogavidhānaṃ śvetāśvataropaniṣadi dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:242: liṅgāni ca vaidikāni yogaviṣayāṇi sahasraśa upalabhyante 'tāṃ yogamiti manyante sthirāmindriyadhāraṇām' (kā. 2.6.18)
GSP33brssgo2u:243: iti 'vidyāmetāṃ yogavidhiṃ ca kṛtsnam (kā. 2.6.18) iti caivamādīni /
GSP33brssgo2u:244: yogaśāstre 'pi 'atha tattvadarśanopāyo yogaḥ' iti samyagdarśanābhyupāyatvenaiva yogoṅgīkriyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:248: satīṣvapyadhyātmaviṣayāsu bahvīṣu smṛtiṣu sāṃkhyayogasmṛtyoreva nirākaraṇe yatnaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:252: 'tatkāraṇaṃ sāṃkhyayogābhipannaṃ jñātvā devaṃ mucyate sarvapāśaiḥ' (śvaṃ. 6.13) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:253: nirākaraṇaṃ tu na sāṃkhyajñānena vedanirapekṣeṇa yogamārgeṇa vā niḥśreyasamadhigamyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:254: śrutirhi vaidikādātmaikatvavijñānādanyanniḥśreyasasādhanaṃ vārayati 'tameva viditvātimṛtyumeti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya' (śvaṃ. 3.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:255: dvaitino hi te sāṃkhyā yogāśca nātmaikatvadarśinaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:257: vaidikameva tatra jñānaṃ dhyānaṃ ca sāṃkhyayogaśabdābhyāmabhilapyate pratyāsatterityavagantavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:258: yena tvaṃśena na virudhyete teneṣṭameva sāṃkhyayogasmṛtyoḥ sāvakāśatvam /
GSP33brssgo2u:265: tattvajñānaṃ tu vedāntavākyebhya eva bhavati 'nāvedavinmanute taṃ bṛhantam' (tai. brā. 3.12.9.7)
GSP33brssgo2u:272: brahmaṇyuktasamanvayaḥ pradhānavādiyogasmṛtyā virudhyate na veti saṃdehe pūrvanyāyamatidiśati-etena yogaḥ pratyuktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:278: na kevalaṃ yoge vidhiḥ kintu yogasya jñāpakānyarthavādavākyānyapi santītyāha-liṅgāni ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:279: tāṃ pūrvoktāṃ dhāraṇāṃ yogavido yogaṃ paramaṃ tapa iti manyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:280: uktāmetāṃ brahmavidyāṃ yogividhiṃ dhyānaprakāraṃ ca mṛtyuprasādānnaciketā labdhā brahma prāpta iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:284: evaṃ yogasmṛteryoge prāmāṇyāttattvāṃśe 'pi prāmāṇyamiti pūrvapakṣamanūdya siddhāntayati-iyamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:285: nanu bauddhādismṛtayo 'tra kimiti na nirākṛtā ityata āha-satīṣvapīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:288: teṣāṃ prakṛtānāṃ kāmānāṃ kāraṇaṃ sāṃkhyayogābhyāṃ vivekadhyānābhyāmabhipannaṃ pratyaktayā prāptaṃ devaṃ jñātvā sarvapāśairavidyādibhirmucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:289: samūlatve smṛtidvayasya nirāsaḥ kimiti kṛta ityata āha-nirākaraṇaṃ tviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:297: upakārakabādho na yukta ityāśaṅkya yoṃ'śa upakārakaḥ sa na bādhyaḥ kintu tattvāṃśa ityāha-tānyapīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:304: na vilakṣaṇatvād asya tathātvaṃ ca śabdāt | BBs_2,1.4 |
GSP33brssgo2u:305: brahmāsya jagato nimittakāraṇaṃ prakṛtiścetyasya pakṣasyākṣepaḥ smṛtinimittaḥ parihṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:308: nanu dharma iva brahmaṇyanapekṣa āgamo bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo2u:309: bhavedayamavaṣṭambho yadi pramāṇāntarānavagāhya āgamamātraprameyo 'yamarthaḥ syādanuṣṭheyarūpa iva dharmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:311: pariniṣpanne ca vastuni pramāṇāntarāṇāmastyavakāśo yathā pṛthivyādiṣu /
GSP33brssgo2u:316: anubhavāvasānaṃ ca brahmavijñānamavidyāyā nivartakaṃ mokṣasādhanaṃ ca dṛṣṭaphalatayeṣyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:317: śrutirapi- 'śrotavyo mantavyaḥ' iti śravaṇavyatirekeṇa mananaṃ vidadhatī tarkamapyatrādartavyaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:319: yaduktaṃ cetanaṃ brahma jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ prakṛtiriti /
GSP33brssgo2u:323: idaṃ hi brahmakāryatvenābhipreyamāṇaṃ jagat brahmavilakṣaṇamacetanamaśuddhaṃ ca dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:324: brahma ca jagadvilakṣaṇaṃ cetanaṃ śuddhaṃ ca śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:326: nahi rucakādayo vikārā mṛtprakṛtikā bhavanti śarāvādayo vā suvarṇaprakṛtikāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:327: mṛdaiva tu mṛdānvitā vikārāḥ kriyante suvarṇena ca suvarṇānvitāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:328: tathedamapi jagadacetanaṃ sukhaduḥkhamohānvitaṃ sadacetanasyaiva sukhaduḥkhamohātmakasya kāraṇasya kāryaṃ bhavitumarhatīti na vilakṣaṇasya brahmaṇaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:337: yo hyekasya cetanasya parigraho buddhyādicetanabhāgaḥ sa evānyasya cetanasyopakaroti natu svayameva cetanaścetanāntarasyopakarotyapakaroti vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:343: yo 'pi kaścidācakṣīta śrutvā jagataścetanaprakṛtikatāṃ tadbalenaiva samastaṃ jagaccetanamavagamayiṣyāmi /
GSP33brssgo2u:346: yathā spaṣṭacaitanyānāmapyātmanāṃ svāpamūrcchādyavasthāsu caitanyaṃ na vibhāvyata evaṃ kāṣṭhaloṣṭādīnāmapi caitanyaṃ na vibhāvayiṣyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:347: etasmādeva ca vibhāvitāvibhāvitatvakṛtādviśeṣādrūpādibhāvābhāvābhyāṃ ca kāryakāraṇānāmātmanāṃ ca cetanatvāviśeṣe 'pi guṇapradhānabhāvo na virotsyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:348: yathā ca pārthivatvāviśeṣe 'pi māṃsasūpaudanādīnāṃ pratyātmavartino viśeṣātparasparopakāritvaṃ bhavatyevamihāpi bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssgo2u:352: nacetaradapi vilakṣaṇatvaṃ parihartuṃ śakyata ityāha- tathātvaṃ ca śabdāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:353: anavagamyamānamevaṃ hīdaṃ loke samastasya vastunaścetanatvaṃ cetanaprakṛtikatvaśravaṇācchabdaśaraṇatayā kevalayotprekṣata,
GSP33brssgo2u:365: smṛtīnāmaprāmāṇyāttābhiḥ samanvayasya na virodha iti siddhāntalakṣaṇatvādvṛttānuvādenāsyādhikaraṇasya tātparyamāha-brahmāsyeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:372: nanvekaviṣayatvena virodhe 'pi śrutivirodhānmānāntarameva bādhyatāmityata āha-yathā ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:374: kiñca brahmasākṣātkārasya mokṣahetutve pradhānasyāntaraṅgaṃ tarkastasyāparokṣadṛṣṭāntagocaratvena pradhānavadaparokṣārthaviṣayatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:383_0: ghaṭavaditi sāṃkhyayoganyāyena virudhyate na veti saṃdehe smṛtermūlābhāvāddurbalatve
GSP33brssgo2u:383_1: 'pyanumānasya vyāptimūlatvena prābalyāttena virudhyata iti pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣayati-na vilakṣaṇatvāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:392: yaditthaṃ tattathā yathā mṛdanvitā ghaṭādaya ityāha-mṛdaiveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:394: yathā hi eka eva strīpiṇḍaḥ patisapatnyupapatīnāṃ prītiparitāpaviṣādādīnkaroti,
GSP33brssgo2u:396: tatra prītiḥ sukhaṃ, paritāpaḥ śokaḥ, viṣādo bhramaḥ, ādipadādrāgādigrahaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:423: indriyaviṣayāpi 'te heme prāṇā ahaṃśreyase vivadamānā brahma jagmuḥ' (bṛ. 6.1.7)
GSP33brssgo2u:429: na khalu mṛdabravīdityevañjātīyakayā śrutyā bhūtendriyāṇāṃ cetanatvamāśaṅkanīyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:431: mṛdādyabhimāninyo vāgādyabhimāninyaśca cetanā devatā vadanasaṃvadanādiṣu cetanociteṣu vyavahāreṣu vyapadiśyante na bhūtendriyamātram /
GSP33brssgo2u:434: viśeṣo hi bhoktṛṇāṃ bhūtendriyāṇāṃ ca cetanācetanapravibhāgalakṣaṇaḥ prāgabhihitaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:436: apica kauṣītakinaḥ prāṇasaṃvāde karaṇamātrāśaṅkāvinivṛttaye 'dhiṣṭhātṛcetanaparigrahāya devatāśabdena viśiṣanti- 'etā ha vai devatā ahaṃśreyase vivadamānāḥ' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:437: 'tā vā etāḥ sarvā devatāḥ prāṇe niḥśreyasaṃ viditvā' (2.14) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo2u:440: ityevamādikā ca śrutiḥ karaṇeṣvanugrāhikāṃ devatāmanugatāṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:441: prāṇasaṃvādavākyaśeṣe ca 'te ha prāṇāḥ prajāpatiṃ pitarametyocuḥ' (chā. 5.1.7)
GSP33brssgo2u:446: 'tatteja aikṣata' ityapi parasyā eva devatāyā adhiṣṭātryāḥ svavikāreṣvanugatāyā iyamīkṣā vyapadiśyata iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:456: tathā 'vijñānaṃ cāvijñānaṃ ca'iti cetanācetanavibhāgaśabdasyopacaritārthatvaṃ na yuktamiti sāṃkhyaḥ samādhatte-abhimānīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:461: ahaṃśreyase svasvaśreṣṭhatvāya prāṇā vivadamānā ityuktaprāṇānāṃ cetanavācidevatāpadena viśeṣitatvāt prāṇādipadairabhimānivyapadeśa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:462: prāṇe niḥśreyasaṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ viditvā prāṇādhīnā jātā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:464: tasmai prāṇāya, baliharaṇaṃ vāgādibhiḥ svīyavasiṣṭhatvādiguṇasamarpaṇaṃ kṛtam /
GSP33brssgo2u:474: dṛśyate hi loke cetanatvena prasiddhebhyaḥ puruṣādibhyo vilakṣaṇānāṃ keśanakhādīnāmutpattiḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:478: ucyate- evamapi kiñcidacetanaṃ cetanasyāyatanabhāvamupagacchati kiñcinnetyastyeva vailakṣaṇyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:479: mahāṃścāyaṃ pāriṇāmikaḥ svabhāvaviprakarṣaḥ puruṣādīnāṃ keśanakhādīnāṃ ca svarūpādibhedāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:482: athocyetāsti kaścitpārthivatvādisvabhāvaḥ puruṣādīnāṃ keśanakhādiṣvanuvartamāno gomayādīnāṃ vṛścikādiṣviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:484: vilakṣaṇatvena ca kāraṇena brahmaprakṛtitvaṃ jagato dūṣayatā kimaśeṣasya brahmasvabhāvasyānanuvartanaṃ vilakṣaṇatvamabhipreyata uta yasya kasyacidasya caitanyasyeti vaktavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:488: dṛśyate hi sattālakṣaṇo brahmasvabhāva ākāśādiṣvanuvartamāna ityuktam /
GSP33brssgo2u:490: kiṃ hi yaccaitanyenānanvitaṃ tadabrahmaprakṛtikaṃ dṛṣṭamiti brahmavādinaṃ pratyudāhriyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:499: tathāca śrutiḥ - 'naiṣā tarkeṇa matirāpaneyā proktānyenaiva sujñānāya preṣṭha' (kā. 1.2.9) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:502: iti caite ṛcau siddhānāmapīśvarāṇāṃ durbodhatāṃ jagatkāraṇasya darśayataḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:503: smṛtirapi bhavati- 'acintyāḥ khalu ye bhāvā na tāṃstarkeṇa yojayet' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:505: 'na me viduḥ suragaṇāḥ prabhavaṃ na maharṣayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:506: ahamādirhi devānāṃ maharṣīṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ' (gī. 10.2) iti caivañjātīyakā /
GSP33brssgo2u:507: yadapi śravaṇavyatirekeṇa mananaṃ vidadhacchabda eva tarkamapyādartavyaṃ darśayatītyuktam /
GSP33brssgo2u:514_1: vijñānaṃ cāvijñānaṃ ca iti cetanācetanavibhāgaśravaṇaṃ vibhāvanāvibhāvanābhyāṃ caitanyasya
GSP33brssgo2u:517: paramakāraṇasya hyatra samastajagadātmanā samavasthānaṃ śrāvyate 'vijñānaṃ cāvijñānaṃ cābhavat' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:520: pratyuktatvāttu vilakṣaṇatvasya yathāśrutyaiva kāraṇaṃ grahītavyaṃ bhavati // 6 //
GSP33brssgo2u:523: eṣā vedāntaśāstrajanyā matistarkeṇa svamatyūhamātreṇāpaneyā bādhārhā na /
GSP33brssgo2u:525: kintu anyena nipuṇenācāryeṇa proktaprabodhitā satī sujñānāya sākṣātkārāya bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:527: iyaṃ visṛṣṭirākāśādisṛṣṭiḥ kutaḥ kasmājjātā kasmācca sthitiṃ prāptetyaddhā tattvena ko veda, na ko 'pi /
GSP33brssgo2u:539: kiñca yayoḥ prakṛtivikārabhāvastayoḥ sādṛśyaṃ vadatā vaktavyaṃ kimātyantikaṃ yatkiñcidveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:543: jagati samastasya brahmasvabhāvasya cetanatvāderananuvartanānna brahmakāryamiti pakṣe sarvasāmye prakṛtivikāratvamityuktaṃ syāt,
GSP33brssgo2u:546: naca jaganna brahmaprakṛtikamacetanatvādavidyāvaditi dṛṣṭānto 'stīti vācyaṃ, anāditvasyopādhitvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:553: eṣā brahmaṇi matistarkeṇa svatantreṇa nāpaneyā na saṃpādanīyā /
GSP33brssgo2u:555: kutārkikādanyenaiva vedavidācāryeṇa proktā matiḥ sujñānāyānubhavāya phalāya bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:556: he preṣṭha, priyatameti naciketasaṃ prati mṛtyorvacanam /
GSP33brssgo2u:557: iyaṃ vividhā sṛṣṭiryataḥ ā samantādbabhūva taṃ ko addhā sākṣādveda /
GSP33brssgo2u:558: tiṣṭhatu vedanaṃ, ka iha loke taṃ pravocat prāvocat /
GSP33brssgo2u:561: prabhavaṃ janma na viduḥ mama sarvāditvena janmābhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:564: śrutyā tattve niścite satyanu paścāt puruṣadoṣasyāsaṃbhāvanādernirāsāya gṛhītaḥ śrutyanugṛhītaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:569: yathā ghaṭādayo mṛdabhinnāstathā jagadbrahmābhinnaṃ tajjatvādityādistarka āśrīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:570: ito 'nyādṛśatarkasyātra brahmaṇyapraveśādasya cānukūlatvānna tarkeṇākṣepāvakāśa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:574: yaduktaṃ ekadeśinā sarvasya jagataścetanatvoktau vibhāgaśrutyanupapattiriti dūṣaṇaṃ sāṃkhyena /
GSP33brssgo2u:579: siddhānte cetanācetanavailakṣaṇyāṅgīkāre kathaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prakṛtitvamityata āha-pratyuktatvāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:584: asad iti cen na pratiṣedhamātratvāt | BBs_2,1.7 |
GSP33brssgo2u:585: yadi cetanaṃ śuddhaṃ śabdavihīnaṃ ca brahma tadviparūtasyācetanasyāśuddhasya śabdādimataśca kāryasya kāraṇamiṣyetāsattarhi kāryaṃ prāgutpatteriti prasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:590: nahyayaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ prāgutpatteḥ sattvaṃ kāryasya pratiṣeddhuṃ śaknoti /
GSP33brssgo2u:592: yathaiva hīdānāmapīdaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇātmanā sadevaṃ prāgutpatterapīti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:599: natu śabdādimatkāryaṃ kāraṇātmanā hīnaṃ prāgutpatteridānīṃ vāsti /
GSP33brssgo2u:603: svaviruddhakāraṇātmanā sattvāyogādityapasiddhāntāpattimāśaṅkya mithyātvātkāryasya kālatraye 'pi kāraṇātmanā sattvamaviruddhamiti samādhatte-asaditicedityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:613_1: brahmakāraṇamabhyupagamyeta tadapītau pralaye pratisaṃsṛjyamānaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇāvibhāgamāpadyamānaṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:613_2: kāraṇamātmīyena dharmeṇa dūṣayedityapītau kāraṇasyāpi brahmaṇaḥ kāryasyevāśuddhyādirūpaprasaṅgātsarvajñaṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:615: apica bhoktṛṇāṃ pareṇa brahmaṇāvibhāgaṃ gatānāṃ karmādinimittapralaye 'pi punarutpattāvabhyupagamyamānāyāṃ muktānāmapi punaruttattiprasaṅgādasamañjasam /
GSP33brssgo2u:619: satkāryavādasiddhyarthaṃ kāryābhede kāraṇasyāpi kāryavadaśuddhyādiprasaṅga iti śaṅkāsūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-atrāheti /
GSP33brssgo2u:621: yathā jale līyamānaṃ lavaṇadravyaṃ jalaṃ dūṣayati tadvadityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:627: yadi layakāle 'pikāryaṃ kāraṇādvibhaktaṃ tarhi sthitikālavallayābhāvaprasaṅgātkāryeṇa dvaitāpatteścāsamañjasamidaṃ darśanamityarthaḥ //8//
GSP33brssgo2u:634: yattāvadabhihitaṃ kāraṇamapigacchatkāryaṃ kāraṇamātmīyena dharmeṇa dūṣayediti, tadadūṣaṇam /
GSP33brssgo2u:637: santi hi dṛṣṭāntā yathā kāraṇamapigacchatkāryaṃ kāraṇamātmīyena dharmeṇa na dūṣayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:638: tadyathā śarāvādayo mṛtprakṛtikā vikārā vibhāgāvasthāyāmuccāvacamadhyamaprabhedāḥ santaḥ punaḥ prakṛtimapigacchanto na tāmātmīyena dharmeṇa saṃsṛjanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:639: rucakādayaśca suvarṇavikārā apītau na suvarṇamātmīyena dharmeṇa saṃsṛjanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:640: pṛthivīvikāraścaturvidho bhūtagrāmo na pṛthivīmapītāvātmīyena dharmeṇa saṃsṛjati /
GSP33brssgo2u:642: apītireva hi na saṃbhavedyadi kāraṇe kāryaṃ svadharmeṇaivāvatiṣṭheta /
GSP33brssgo2u:643: ananyatve 'pi kāryakāraṇayoḥ kāryasya kāraṇātmatvaṃ natu kāraṇasya kāryātmatvaṃ 'ārambhaṇaśabdādibhyaḥ' iti vakṣyāmaḥ (bra.sū. 2.1.14) /
GSP33brssgo2u:644: atyalpaṃ cedamucyate kāryamapītāvātmīyena dharmeṇa kāraṇaṃ saṃsṛjediti /
GSP33brssgo2u:650: ityevamādyābhirhi śrutibhiraviśeṣeṇa triṣvapi kāleṣu kāryasya kāraṇānanyatvaṃ śrāvyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:651: tatra yaḥ parihāraḥ kāryasya taddharmāṇāṃ cāvidyādhyāropitatvānna taiḥ kāraṇaṃ saṃsṛjyata iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:653: asti cāyamaparo dṛṣṭānto yathā svayaṃ prasāritayā māyayā māyāvī triṣvapi kāleṣu na saṃspaśyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:655: evaṃ paramātmāpi saṃsāramāyayā na saṃspṛśyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:656: yathā ca svapnadṛgekaḥ svapnadarśanamāyayā na saṃspṛśyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:660: atroktaṃ vedāntārthasaṃpradāyavidbhirācāryaiḥ - 'anādimāyayā supto yadā jīvaḥ prabudhyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:662: tatra yaduktamapītau kāraṇasyāpi kāryasyeva sthaulyādidoṣaprasaṅga ityetadayuktam /
GSP33brssgo2u:663: yatpunaretaduktaṃ samastasya vibhāgasyāvibhāgaprāpteḥ punarvibhāgenotpattau niyamakāraṇaṃ nopapadyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:666: yathāhi suṣuptisamādhyādāvapi satyāṃ svābhāvikyāmavibhāgaprāptau mithyājñānasyānapoditatvātpūrvavatpunaḥ prabodhe vibhāgo bhavatyevamihāpi bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssgo2u:667_0: śrutiścātra bhavati- 'imāḥ sarvāḥ prajāḥ sati saṃpadya na viduḥ sati saṃpadyāmaha
GSP33brssgo2u:667_1: iti ta iha vyāghro vā siṃho vā vṛko vā varāho vā kīṭo vā pataṅgo vā daṃśo vā maśako
GSP33brssgo2u:668: yathā hyavibhāge 'pi paramātmani mithyājñānapratibaddho vibhāgavyavahāraḥ svapnavadavyāhataḥ sthito dṛśyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:672: yaḥ punarayamante 'paro vikalpa utprekṣito 'thedaṃ jagadapītāvapi vibhaktameva pareṇa brahmaṇāvatiṣṭheteti,
GSP33brssgo2u:679: iha suṣupteḥ prāk prabodhe yena jātyādinā vibhaktā bhavanti tadā punarutthānakāle tathaiva bhavantīti vibhāgoktiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:688: asati kārye taddharmeṇa kāraṇasya yogo na saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:690: nanu satkāryavāde laye 'pi kāryasya kāraṇābhedena sattvāddūṣakatvaṃ syādityata āha-ananyatve 'pīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:692: kiñcāpītāviti viśeṣaṇaṃ vyarthamiti pratibandyā samādhatte-atyalpaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:695: astyeva svapnakāle dṛṣṭaḥ saṃsarga ityata āha-prabodheti /
GSP33brssgo2u:697: yadyajñasya jīvasyāvasthābhirasaṃsargastadā sarvajñasya kiṃ vācyamiti dārṣṭāntikamāha-evamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:700: yadā tattvamasītyupadeśakāle prabudhyate māyānidrāṃ tyajati tadā janmalayasthityavasthāśūnyamadvaitamīśvaramātmatvenānubhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:705: iha suṣupteḥ prāk prabodhe yena jātyādinā vibhaktā bhavanti tadā punarutthānakāle tathaiva bhavantīti vibhāgoktiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:706: nanu suṣuptau punarvibhāgaśaktyajñānasattve 'pi sarvapralaye tatsattvaṃ kuta ityata āha-yathā hīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:707: yathā suṣuptau paramātmani sarvakāryāṇāmavibhāge 'pi punarvibhāgahetvajñānaśaktirasti evamapītau mahāpralaye 'pi mithyābhūtājñānasaṃbandhātpunaḥ sṛṣṭivibhāgaśaktiranumāsyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:708: yataḥ sthitāvidānīṃ mithyājñānakāryo vibhāgavyavahārastattvabodhābhāvāt svapnavadabādhito dṛśyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:717: svapakṣe caite prativādinaḥ sādhāraṇā doṣāḥ prāduṣyuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:724_1: prākpralayātpratipuruṣaṃ ye niyatā bhedā na te tathaiva punarutpatau niyantuṃ śakyante kāraṇābhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:727: ye nāpadyante teṣāṃ pradhānakāryatvaṃ na prāpnotītyevamete doṣāḥ sādhāraṇatvānnānyatarasminpakṣe codayitavyā bhavantītyadoṣatāmevaiṣāṃ draḍhayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:735: satyakāryasya viruddhakāraṇātmanā sattvāyogāt sāṃkhyasyaivāyaṃ doṣo na kāryamithyātvavādina iti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:740: yadi vyavasthārthaṃ muktānāṃ bhedāḥ saṃghātaviśeṣāḥ pradhāne līyante baddhānāṃ bhedāstu na līyanta ityucyate tarhyalīnānāṃ puruṣavatkāryatvavyāghāta ityarthaḥ //10//
GSP33brssgo2u:744: tarkāpratiṣṭhānād apy anyathānumeyam iti ced evam apy anirmokṣaprasaṅgaḥ | BBs_2,1.11 |
GSP33brssgo2u:749: tairapyutprekṣitāḥ santastato 'nyairābhāsyanta iti na pratiṣṭhitatvaṃ tarkāṇāṃ śakyamāśrayituṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:751: atha kasyacitprasiddhamāhātmyasya kapilasya cānyasya vā saṃmatastarkaḥ pratiṣṭhita ityāśrīyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:755: nahi pratiṣṭhitastarka eva nāstīti śakyate vaktum /
GSP33brssgo2u:759: atītavartamānādhvasāmyena hyanāgate 'pyadhvani sukhaduḥkhaprāptiparihārāya pravartamāno loko dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:760: śrutyarthavipratipattau cārthābhāsanirākaraṇena samyagarthanirdhāraṇaṃ tarkeṇaiva vākyavṛttinirūpaṇarūpeṇa kriyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:761: manurapi caivaṃ manyate- 'pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca śāstraṃ ca vividhāgamam /
GSP33brssgo2u:769: nahi pūrvajo mūḍha āsīdityātmanāpi mūḍhena bhavitavyamiti kiñcidasti pramāṇam /
GSP33brssgo2u:770: tasmānna tarkāpratiṣṭhānaṃ doṣa iti cet, evamapyavimokṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:771: yadyapi kvacidviṣaye tarkasya pratiṣṭhitatvamupalakṣyate tathāpi prakṛte tāvadviṣaye prasajyata evāpratiṣṭhitatvadoṣādanirmokṣastarkasya /
GSP33brssgo2u:773: rūpādyabhāvāddhi nāyamarthaḥ pratyakṣagocaraḥ, liṅgādyabhāvācca nānumānādīnāmiti cāvocāma /
GSP33brssgo2u:777: loke tadviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ samyagjñānamityucyate yathāgniruṣṇā iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:780: yaddhi kenacittārkikeṇedameva samyagjñānamiti pratipāditaṃ tadapareṇa vyutthāpyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:781: tenāpi pratiṣṭhāpitaṃ tato 'pareṇa vyutthāpyata iti prasiddhaṃ loke /
GSP33brssgo2u:783: naca pradhānavādī tarkavidāmuttama iti sarvāstārkikaiḥ parigṛhīto yena tadīyaṃ mataṃ samyagjñānamiti pratipadyemahi /

GSP33brssgo2u:788: ata āgamavaśenāgamānusāritarkavaśena ca cetanaṃ brahmajagataḥ kāraṇaṃ prakṛtiśceti sthitam // 11 //
GSP33brssgo2u:795: kiñca tarkasya saṃbhāvitadoṣatvāttena nirdeṣavedāntasamanvayo na bādhya ityāha-tarkāpratiṣṭhānādapīti /

GSP33brssgo2u:797: 'kapilo yadi sarvajñaḥ kaṇādo neti kā pramā'iti nyāyena pariharati-evamapīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:799: vilakṣaṇatvāditarkāṇāmapratiṣṭhitatve 'pi vyāptipakṣadharmatāsaṃpannaḥ kaścittarkaḥ pratiṣṭhito bhaviṣyati tena pradhānamanumeyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:809: kiñca pūrvottaramīmāṃsayostarkeṇaiva vākyatātparyanirṇayasya kriyamāṇatvāttarkaḥ pratiṣṭhita ityāha-śrutyartheti /
GSP33brssgo2u:813: sarvatarkāṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāyāṃ pūrvapakṣa eva na syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:815: kvacittarkasya pratiṣṭhāyāmapi jagatkāraṇaviśeṣe tarkasya svātantryaṃ nāstīti sūtraśeṣaṃ vyācaṣṭe-yadyapītyādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:821: ekarūpavastujñānasya samyagjñānatve 'pi tarkajanyatvaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-tatraivaṃ satīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:824: ekarūpeṇānavasthito viṣayo yasya tattarkaprabhavaṃ kathaṃ samyagjñānaṃ bhavediti yojanā /

GSP33brssgo2u:826: nanu sarvatārkikairmilitvā niścitatarkotthā matirmuktiheturityata āha-naca śakyanta iti /

GSP33brssgo2u:845: pradhānavādaḥ śiṣṭairdebalādibhiḥ satkāryatvāṃśena svīkṛta iti prabalatvādupadeśaḥ /

GSP33brssgo2u:856: bhoktrāpatter avibhāgaś cet syāl lokavat | BBs_2,1.13 |
GSP33brssgo2u:858: yadyapi śrutiḥ pramāṇaṃ svaviṣaye bhavati tathāpi pramāṇāntareṇa viṣayāpahāre 'nyaparā bhavitumarti /
GSP33brssgo2u:863: kathaṃ punaḥ pramāṇāntaraprasiddhor'thaḥ śrutyā bādhyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:864: atrocyate- prasiddho hyayaṃ bhoktṛbhogyavibhāgo loke bhoktā cetanaḥ śārīro bhogyāḥ śabdādayo viṣayā iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:865: yathā bhoktā devadatto bhojya odana iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:866: tasya ca vibhāgasyābhāvaḥ prasajyeta yadi bhoktā bhogyabhāvamāpadyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:872: upapadyata evāyamasmatpakṣe 'pi vibhāgaḥ evaṃ loke dṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:873: tathāhi- samudrādudakātmano 'nanyatve 'pi tadvikārāṇāṃ phenavīcītaraṅgādīnāmitaretaravibhāga itaretarasaṃśleṣādilakṣaṇaśca vyavahāra upalabhyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:876: evamihāpi naca bhoktṛbhogyayoritaretarabhāvāpattiḥ, naca parasmādbrahmaṇo 'nyatvaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssgo2u:886_0: sa kiṃ yanmitho bhinnaṃ tannādvitīyakāraṇābhinnaṃ yathā mṛttantujau ghaṭapaṭhāviti
GSP33brssgo2u:886_1: tarkasahitabhedapratyakṣādinā virudhyate na veti saṃdehe brahmaṇi tarkasyāpratiṣṭhitatve
GSP33brssgo2u:893: tarkāderdvaite prāmāṇye 'pi tataḥ samanvayavirodhe kimāyātamiti śaṅkate-kimata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:895: tarkādeḥ prāmāṇyāt dvaitabādhakatvaṃ śruterayuktamityadvaitasamanvayabādho yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:908: kathaṃ vā teṣāṃ bhede satyekasmādabhinnatvamityāśaṅkya na hi dṛṣṭenupapattiriti nyāyenāha-naceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:914: nanu bhoktuḥ pratidehaṃ vibhāgaḥ kathamityata āha-kāryamanupraviṣṭasyeti /

GSP33brssgo2u:930_0: ekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ pratijñāya dṛṣṭāntāpekṣāyāmucyate- 'yathā somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍena
GSP33brssgo2u:930_1: sarvaṃ mṛnmayaṃ vijñātaṃ syādvācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttiketyeva satyam' (chā. 6.1.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:931: etaduktaṃ bhavati- ekena mṛtpiṇḍena paramārthato mṛdātmanā vijñātena sarvaṃ mṛnmayaṃ ghaṭaśarāvodañcanādikaṃ mṛdātmakatvāviśeṣādvijñātaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brssgo2u:932: yato vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ vācaiva kevalamastītyārabhyate /

GSP33brssgo2u:938_1: bravīti- 'apāgādagneragnitvaṃ vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ trīṇi rūpāṇītyeva satyam'
GSP33brssgo2u:939: ārambhaṇaśabdādibhya ityādiśabdāt 'aitadātmyamidaṃ sarvaṃ tatsatyaṃ sa ātmā tattvamasi' (chā. 6.8.7)
GSP33brssgo2u:949: nanvanekātmakaṃ brahma, yathā vṛkṣo 'nekaśākha evamanekaśaktipravṛttiyuktaṃ brahma /
GSP33brssgo2u:951: yathā vṛkṣa ityanekatvaṃ śākhā iti nānātvam /
GSP33brssgo2u:955: nānātvāṃśena tu karmakāṇḍāśrayau laukikavaidikavyavahārau setsyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:960: dārṣṭāntike 'pi 'aitadātmyamidaṃ sarvaṃ tatsatyam' iti ca paramakāraṇasyaivaikasya satyatvāvadhāraṇāt 'sa ātmā tattvamasi śvetaketo' iti ca śārīrasya brahmabhāvopadeśāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:961: svayaṃ prasiddhaṃ hyetaccharīrasya brahmātmatvamupadiśyate na yatnāntaraprasādhyam /

GSP33brssgo2u:964: bādhite ca śārīrātmatvasya tadāśrayaḥ samastaḥ svābhāviko vyavahāro bādhito bhavati yatprasiddhaye nānātvāṃśo 'paro brahmaṇaḥ kalpyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:967: ityādinā brahmātmatvadarśinaṃ prati samastasya kriyākārakaphalalakṣaṇasya vyavahārasyābhāvam /
GSP33brssgo2u:970: taskaradṛṣṭāntena cānṛtābhisaṃdhasya bandhanaṃ satyābhisaṃdhasya ca mokṣaṃ darśayannekatvamevaikaṃ pāramārthikaṃ darśayati (chā. 6.16) /
GSP33brssgo2u:972: ubhayasatyatāyāṃ hi kathaṃ vyavahāragocaro 'pi janturanṛtābhisaṃdha ityucyeta /

GSP33brssgo2u:987: vikārāneva tvahaṃ mametyavidyāyāmātmīyena bhāvena sarvo jantuḥ pratipadyate svābhāvikīṃ brahmātmatāṃ hitvā /
GSP33brssgo2u:989: yathā suptasya prākṛtasya janasya svapna uccāvacānbhāvānpaśyato niścitameva pratyakṣābhimataṃ vijñānaṃ bhavati prākprabodhāt,
GSP33brssgo2u:991: kathaṃ tvasatyena vedāntavākyena satyasya brahmātmatvasya pratipattirupapadyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:998: tatra brūmaḥ- yadyapi svapnadarśanāvasthasya sarpadaṃśanodakasnānādikāryamanṛtaṃ tathāpi tadavagatiḥ satyameva phalaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:1000: nahi svapnādutthitaḥ svapnadṛṣṭaṃ sarpadaṃśanodakasnānādikāryaṃ mithyeti manyamānastadavagatimapi mithyeti manyate kaścit /
GSP33brssgo2u:1002: tathāca śrutiḥ - 'yadā karmasu kāmyeṣu striyaṃ svapneṣu paśyati /
GSP33brssgo2u:1004: ityasatyena svapnadarśanena satyāyāḥ samṛddheḥ pratipattiṃ darśayati /

GSP33brssgo2u:1005_1: ityuktvā 'atha svapnāḥ puruṣaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇadantaṃ paśyati sa enaṃ hanti' ityādinā
GSP33brssgo2u:1005_2: tena tenāsatyenaiva svapnadarśanena satyaṃ maraṇaṃ sūcyata iti darśayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:1006: prasiddhaṃ cedaṃ loke 'nvayavyatirekakuśalānāmīdṛśena svapnadarśanena sādhvāgamaḥ sūcyata īdṛśenāsādhvāgama iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1008: apicāntyamidaṃ pramāṇamātmaikatvasya pratipādakaṃ nātaḥ paraṃ kiñcidākāṅkṣyamasti /

GSP33brssgo2u:1013: na ceyamavagatirnopapadyata iti śakyaṃ vaktum, 'taddhāsya vijajñau' (chā. 6.16.3) ityādiśrutibhyaḥ /

GSP33brssgo2u:1020: pariṇāmino hi mṛdādayor'thā loke samadhigatā iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1026: nahyekasya brahmaṇaḥ pariṇāmadharmatvaṃ tadrahitatvaṃ ca śkyaṃ pratipattum /

GSP33brssgo2u:1034: kūṭasthabrahmātmavijñānādeva hi phalaṃ darśayati śāstram- 'sa eṣa neti netyātmā' ityupakramya 'abhayaṃ vai janaka prāpto 'si' (bṛ. 4.2.4)
GSP33brssgo2u:1036_1: phalasiddhau satyāṃ yattatrāphalaṃ śrūyate brahmaṇo jagadākārapariṇāmitvādi tadbrahmadarśanopāyatvenaiva viniyujyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:1046: sā pratijñā tadavasthaiva na tadviruddhor'thaḥ punarihocyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:1049: sarvajñasyeśvarasyātmabhūta ivāvidyākalpite nāmarūpe tattvānyatvābhyāmanirvacanīye saṃsāraprapañcabījabhūte sarvajñasyeśvarasya māyāśaktiḥ prakṛtiriti ca śrutismṛtyorabhilapyete /
GSP33brssgo2u:1050: tābhyāmanyaḥ sarvajña īśvaraḥ 'ākāśo vai nāma nāmarūpayornirvahitā te yadantarā tadbrahma' (chā. 8.14.1) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1052: , 'sarvāṇi rūpāṇi vicitya dhīro nāmāni kṛtvābhivadanyadāste' (tai. ā. 3.12.7)
GSP33brssgo2u:1056: sa ca svātmabhūtāneva ghaṭākāśasthānīyānavidyāpratyupasthāpitanāmarūpakṛtakāryakaraṇasaṃghātānurodhino jīvākhyānvijñānātmanaḥ pratīṣṭe vyavahāraviṣaye /
GSP33brssgo2u:1057_1: ca na paramārthato vidyāyāpāstasarvopādhisvarūpa ātmanīśitrīśitavyasarvajñatvādivyavahāra upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:1058: tathācoktam- 'yatra nānyatpaśyati nānyacchṛṇoti nānyadvijānāti sa bhūmā' (chā. 7.24.1)
GSP33brssgo2u:1059: iti 'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttatkena paśyet' (bṛ. 4.5.15) ityādinā ca /
GSP33brssgo2u:1060: evaṃ paramārthāvasthāyāṃ sarvavyavahārābhāvaṃ vadanti vedāntāḥ sarve /
GSP33brssgo2u:1061: tatheśvaragītāsvapi- 'na kartṛtvaṃ na karmāṇi lokasya sṛjati prabhuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1063: nādatte kasyacitpāpaṃ na caiva sukṛtaṃ vibhuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1066: vyavahārāvasthāyāṃ tūktaḥ śrutāvapīśvarādivyavahāraḥ 'eṣa sarveśvara eṣa bhūtādhipatireṣa bhūtapāla eṣa seturvidhāraṇa eṣāṃ lokānāmasaṃbhedāya' (bṛ. 4.4.22) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1070: vyavahārābhiprāyeṇa tu syāllokavaditi mahāsamudrasthānīyatāṃ brahmaṇaḥ kathayati /

GSP33brssgo2u:1080: rekhāsvakāratvādibhrāntyā satyā akārādayo jñāyanta iti prasiddham /

GSP33brssgo2u:1091: vāgārabhyaṃ nāmamātraṃ vikāro na kāraṇātpṛthagastītyevakārārtha iti śrutiṃ yojayati-etaduktamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1102: bhedābhedamate sarvavyavasthāsiddhiratyantābhede dvaitamānabādha ityabhimanyamāno dūṣayati-naivaṃ syāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:1104: kiñca saṃsārasya satyatve tadviśiṣṭasya jīvasya brahmaikyopadeśo na syādvirodhādityāha-sa ātmeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1108: yaduktaṃ vyavahārārthaṃ nānātvaṃ satyamiti, tatkiṃ jñānādūrdhvaṃ vyavahārārthaṃ prāgvā /
GSP33brssgo2u:1112: na dvitīyaḥ, jñānātprākkalpitanānātvena vyavahāropapattau nānātvasya satyatvāsiddheḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1113: yattu pramātṛtvādivyavahāraḥ satya eva mokṣāvasthāyāṃ nivartata iti, tannetyāha-na cāyamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1114: saṃsārasatyatve tadavasthāyāṃ jīvasya brahmatvaṃ na syāt, bhedābhedayorekadaikatra virodhāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:1116: kiñca yathā loke kaścit taskarabuddhyā bhaṭairgṛhīto 'nṛtavādī cettaptaparaśuṃ gṛhṇāti sa dahyate badhyate ca,
GSP33brssgo2u:1117: tathā nānātvavādī dahyate satyavādī cenna dahyate mucyate ca /
GSP33brssgo2u:1118: tathaitadātmyamidaṃ sarvamityekatvadarśī mucyata iti śrutadṛṣṭāntenaikatvaṃ satyaṃ nānātvaṃ mithyetyāha-taskareti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1129_0: nanu karmakārakāṇāṃ yajamānādīnāṃ vidyākārakāṇāṃ śiṣyādīnāṃ ca kalpitabhedamāśritya
GSP33brssgo2u:1131: tatra dvaitaviṣaye pratyakṣādīnāṃ yāvadbādhaṃ vyāvahārikaṃ prāmāṇyamupapadyata ityāha-atrocyata ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:1134: vastuto mithyātve 'pi vikāreṣu tanniścayābhāvena pratyakṣādivyavahāropapattāvuktadṛṣṭāntaṃ vivṛṇoti-yathā suptasya prākṛtasyeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1135_0: evaṃ dvaitapramāṇānāṃ vyavahārakāle bādhaśūnyārthabodhakatvaṃ vyāvahārikaṃ prāmāṇyamupapādya
GSP33brssgo2u:1135_1: dvaitapramāṇānāṃ vedāntānāṃ sarvakāleṣu bādhaśūnyabrahmabodhakatvaṃ tāttvikaṃ prāmāṇyamupapādayitumuktaśaṅkāmanuvadati-kathaṃ tvasatyeneti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1136: kimasatyātsatyaṃ na jāyate, kimuta satyasya jñānaṃ na /
GSP33brssgo2u:1140: sarpeṇādaṣṭasyāpi daṣṭatvabhrāntikalpitaviṣātsatyamaraṇamūrcchādidarśanādasatyāt satyaṃ na jāyata ityaniyama ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1142: asatyātsarpodarādeḥ satyasya daṃśanasnānādijñānasya kāryasya darśanādvyabhicāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1145: avagatirvṛttiḥ ghaṭādivatsatyāpi prātibhāsikasvapnadṛṣṭavastunaḥ phalaṃ caitanyaṃ vā vṛttyabhivyaktamavagatiśabdārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1147: svapnasthāvagateḥ svapnadehadharmatva utthitasya mayā tādṛśaḥ svapno 'vagata ityabādhitāvagatipratisaṃdhānaṃ na syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:1149: asatyātsatyasya jñānaṃ na jāyata iti dvitīyaniyamasya śrutyā vyabhicāramāha-tathāca śrutiriti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1150: naca striyo mithyātve 'pi taddarśanātsatyādeva satyāyāḥ samṛtdherjñānamiti vācyam,
GSP33brssgo2u:1151: viṣayaviśiṣṭatvena darśanasyāpi mithyātvātprakṛte 'pi satye brahmaṇi mithyāvedānugatacaitanyāñjñānasaṃbhavācceti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1154: rekhāsvakāratvādibhrāntyā satyā akārādayo jñāyanta iti prasiddhamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1155: evamasatyātsatyasya janmoktyā tadarthakriyākāri tatsatyamiti niyamo bhagnaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:1156: anṛtātsatyasya jñānoktyā yadanṛtakaraṇagamyaṃ tadbādhyaṃ kūṭaliṅgānumitavahnivaditi vyāptirbhagnā /
GSP33brssgo2u:1157: tathā ca kalpitānāmapi vedāntānāṃ satyabrahmabodhakatvaṃ saṃbhavatīti tāttvikaṃ prāmāṇyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1160: kiñca yadyubhayorekadā vyavahāraḥ syāt tadā syādapi satyatvam /
GSP33brssgo2u:1165: tat kilātmatattvamasya piturvākyāt śvetaketurvijñātavāniti jñānotpatteḥ śrutatvātsāmagrīsattvāccetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1168: kintu tayā virodhādanupajīvyaṃ pratyakṣādestāttvikaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ bādhyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1169: kiñcaikatvāvagateḥ phalavatpramātvānniṣphalo dvaitabhramo bādhya ityāha-na ceyamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1170: nanu sarvasya dvaitasya mithyātve svapno mithyā jāgrata satyamityādirlaukiko vyavahāraḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:1171_0: satyaṃ cānṛtaṃ ca satyamabhavaditi vaidikaśca kathamityāśaṅkya yathā svapne idaṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:1177: sṛṣṭau pariṇāmitvaṃ pralaye tadrāhitya ca krameṇāviruddhamiti dṛṣṭāntena śaṅkate-sthitīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1178: kūṭasthasya kadācidapi vikriyā na yuktā kūṭasthatvavyāghātādityāha-neti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1180: kūṭasthasya niravayavasya pūrvarūpatyāgenāvasthāntarātmakapariṇāmāyogācchuktirajatavadvivarta eva prapañca iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1182: 'taṃ yathā yathopāsate tadeva bhavati'iti śruterbrahmaṇaḥ pariṇāmitvavijñānāttatprāptirviduṣaḥ phalamityāśaṅkyāha-nahi pariṇāmavattveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1187: avidyātmake cidātmani līne nāmarūpe eva bījaṃ tasya vyākaraṇaṃ sthūlātmanā sṛṣṭistadapekṣatvādīśvaratvāderna virodha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1193: nāmarūpe cedīśvarasyātmabhūte tarhīśvaro jaḍa ityata āha-tābhyāmanya iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1197: na cātra nānājīvā bhāṣyoktā iti bhramitavyaṃ, buddhyādisaṃghātabhedena bhedokteḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1204: tena svarūpajñānāvaraṇena kartāhamīśvaro me niyantetyevaṃ bhramanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1206: na kevalaṃ laukikavyavahārārthaṃ pariṇāmaprakriyāśrayaṇaṃ kintūpāsanārthaṃ cetyāha-pariṇāmaprakriyāṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1212: itaśca kāraṇādananyatvaṃ kāryasya, yatkāraṇaṃ bhāva eva kāraṇasya kāryamupalabhyate, nābhāve /
GSP33brssgo2u:1213: tadyathā satyāṃ mṛdi ghaṭa upalabhyate satsu ca tantuṣu paṭaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1221: atha dhūmaṃ kayācidavasthayā viśiṃṣyādīdṛśo dhūmo nāsatyāgnau bhavatīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1222: naivamapi kaściddoṣaḥ tadbhāvānuraktāṃ hi buddhiṃ kāryakāraṇayorananyatve hetuṃ vayaṃ vadāmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1229: tantusaṃsthāne paṭe tantuvyatirekeṇa paṭo nāma kāryaṃ naivopalabhyate kevalāstu tantava ātānavitānavantaḥ pratyakṣamupalabhyante,
GSP33brssgo2u:1231: anayā pratyakṣopalabdhyā lohitaśuklakṛṣṇāni trīṇi tato rūpāṇi vāyumātramākāśamātraṃ cetyanumeyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:1232: (chā. 6.4) tataḥ paraṃ brahmaikamevādvitīyaṃ, tatra sarvapramāṇānāṃ niṣṭhāmavocāma // 15 //
GSP33brssgo2u:1234: FN: kāraṇasya bhāve sattve upalabdhau ca kāryasya sattvādupalabdheścānanyatvamiti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1236: kāraṇasya bhāve sattve upalabdhau ca kāryasya sattvādupalabdheścānanyatvamiti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1238: anyatve 'pyayaṃ hetuḥ kiṃ na syādityaprayojakatvamāśaṅkya nirasyati-naceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1241: ato mṛdghaṭayostena hetunā nimittādibhāvaḥ sidhyati nānanyatvamityarthāntaratāmāśaṅkāyaha-naca kulāleti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1247: agnibhāva eva dhūmopalabdhiriti niyamātmako hetustatra nāstītyāha-neti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1249: tadbhāvaniyatabhāvatve sati tadbuddhyanuraktabuddhiviṣayatvasya hetorvivakṣitatvānna vyabhicāra ityāha-naivamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1253: tathā ca tayoḥ kāryakāraṇayorbhāvena sattayānuraktāṃ sahakṛtāmiti bhāṣyārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1257: anumānārthatvena sūtraṃ vyākhyāya pāṭhāntareṇa pratyakṣaparatayā vyācaṣṭe-bhāvācceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1259: na caikaḥ paṭa iti pratyakṣaṃ paṭasya tantubhyaḥ pṛthaksattve pramāṇaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:1261: ata ātānavitānasaṃyogavantastantava eva paṭa iti pratyakṣopalabdheḥ sattvādananyatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1264: yatra pratyakṣaṃ nāsti tatra kārye vimatakāraṇādabhinnaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:1267: kāraṇapariśeṣe pradhānādikaṃ pariśiṣyatāṃ, na brahmetyata āha-tatra sarveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1268: brahmaṇi vedāntānāṃ sarveṣāṃ tātparyasyoktatvāttadevādvitīyaṃ pariśiṣyate na kāraṇāntaramaprāmāṇikatvāditi bhāvaḥ //15//
GSP33brssgo2u:1274: yatkāraṇaṃ prāgutpatteḥ kāraṇātmanaiva kāraṇe sattvamavarakālīnasya kāryasya śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:1278: yacca yadātmanā yatra na vartate na tattata utpadyate, yathā sikatābhyastailam /
GSP33brssgo2u:1280: yathāca kāraṇaṃ brahma triṣu kāleṣu sattvaṃ na vyabhicaratyevaṃ kāryamapi jagattriṣu kāleṣu sattvaṃ na vyabhicarati /
GSP33brssgo2u:1282: idaṃ jagat sadātmaiveti sāmānādhikaraṇyaśrutyā sṛṣṭeḥ prākkāryasya kāraṇātmanā sattvaṃ śrutaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:1285: ghaṭādikaṃ prāg mṛdādyātmanā vartate tata utpadyamānatvāt sāmānyato vyatirekeṇa sikatābhyastailavadityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1286: kāraṇavatkāryasyāpi sattvāt sattvabhede mānābhāvāt kāryasya kāraṇādabhinnasattākatvamiti sūtrasyārthāntaramāha-yathā ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1289: tadabhedena satī mṛt san ghaṭa iti bhāsamānayoḥ kāryakāraṇayorananyatvamityarthaḥ //16//
GSP33brssgo2u:1296: vastutaḥ sarvatra sattaikye 'pi ghaṭapaṭayorabhedena sattāyā bhinnatvānna tādātmyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:1301: asadvyapadeśān neti cen na dharmāntareṇa vākyaśeṣāt | BBs_2,1.17 |
GSP33brssgo2u:1302: nanu kvacidasattvamapi prāgutpatteḥ kāryasya vyapadiśati śrutiḥ - 'asadevedamagra āsīt (chā. 3.19.1)
GSP33brssgo2u:1307: kiṃ tarhi vyākṛtanāmarūpatvāddharmādavyākṛtanāmarūpatvaṃ dharmāntaraṃ tena dharmāntareṇāyamasadvyapadeśaḥ prāgutpatteḥ sata eva kāryasya kāraṇarūpeṇānanyasya /
GSP33brssgo2u:1311: iha ca tāvat 'asadevedamagra āsīt' ityasacchabdenopakrame nirdiṣṭaṃ yattadeva punastacchabdena parāmṛśya saditi viśinaṣṭi 'tatsadāsīt' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1313: 'asadvā idamagra āsīt' ityatrāpi 'tadātmānaṃ svayamakuruta' iti vākyaśeṣe viśeṣaṇānnātyantāsattvam /
GSP33brssgo2u:1315: nāmarūpavyākṛtaṃ hi vastu sacchabdārhaṃ loke prasiddham /
GSP33brssgo2u:1318: FN: agre śūnyamāsīcchūnyādeva jagatabhūditi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1319: rāddhānte tu idaṃ jagadagre sṛṣṭeḥ prāgasadavyākṛtanāmarūpatvādasattulyamatisūkṣmaṃ brahmaivāsīt /
GSP33brssgo2u:1321: uktaṃ kāryasya prāk kāraṇātmanā sattvamasiddhamityāśaṅkya samādhatte-asaditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:1322: 'aktāḥ śarkarā upadadhyāt'ityupakrame kenāktā iti saṃdehe 'tejo vai ghṛtam'iti vākyaśeṣāddhṛteneti yathā niścayaḥ evamatrāpi 'tatsat'iti vākyaśeṣātsanniścaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1330: yukteśca prāgutpatteḥ kāryasya sattvamananyatvaṃ ca kāraṇādavagamyate, śabdāntarācca /
GSP33brssgo2u:1331: yuktistāvadvarṇyate- dadhighaṭarucakādyarthibhiḥ pratiniyatāni kāraṇāni kṣīramṛttikāsuvarṇādīnyupādīyamānāni loke dṛśyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:1332: nahi dadhyarthibhirmṛttikopādīyate na ghaṭārthibhiḥ kṣīraṃ tadasatkāryavāde nopapadyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:1333: aviśiṣṭe hi prāgutpatteḥ sarvasya sarvatrāsatve kasmātkṣīrādeva dadhyutpadyate na mṛttikāyāḥ mṛttikāyā eva ca ghaṭa utpadyate na kṣīrāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:1334: athāviśiṣṭe 'pi prāgasattve kṣīra eva dadhnaḥ kaścidatiśayo na mṛttikāyāṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:1335: mṛttikāyāmeva ca ghaṭasya kaścidatiśayo na kṣīra ityucyeta,
GSP33brssgo2u:1337: śaktiśca kāraṇasya kāryaniyamārthā kalpamānā nānyāsatī vā kāryaṃ niyacchet /
GSP33brssgo2u:1341: samavāyakalpanāyāmapi samavāyasya samavāyibhiḥ saṃbandhe 'bhyupagamyamāne tasya tasyānyonyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kalpayitavya ityanavasthāprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1343: atha samavāyaḥ svayaṃ saṃbandharūpatvādanapekṣyaivāparaṃ saṃbandhaṃ saṃbadhyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:1344: saṃyogo 'pi tarhi svayaṃ saṃbandharūpatvādanapekṣyaiva samavāyaṃ saṃbadhyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:1346: kathaṃ ca kāryamavayavidravyaṃ kāraṇeṣvavayavadravyeṣu vartamānaṃ vartate /
GSP33brssgo2u:1350: nahi bahutvaṃ samasteṣvāśrayeṣu vartamānaṃ vyastāśrayagrahaṇena gṛhyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:1351_1: kalpyeran yairārambhakeṣvavayaveṣvavayavaśo 'vayavī varteta kośāvayavavyatiriktairhyavayavairasiḥ kośaṃ vyāpnoti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1354: atha pratyavayavaṃ varteta tadaikatra vyāpāre.'nyatrāvyāpāraḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:1355: nahi devadattaḥ snughne saṃnidhīyamānastadahareva pāṭaliputre 'pi saṃnidhīyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:1361: yadi gotvādivatpratyekaṃ parisamāpto 'vayavī syādyathā gotvaṃ prativyakti pratyakṣaṃ gṛhyata evamavayavyapi pratyavayavaṃ pratyakṣaṃ gṛhyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:1363: pratyekaparisamāptau cāvayavinaḥ kāryeṇādhikārāttasya caikatvācchṛṅgeṇāpi stanakāryaṃ kuryādurasā ca pṛṣṭhakāryam /
GSP33brssgo2u:1365: prāgutpatteśca kāryasyāsattva utpattirakartṛkā nirātmikā ca syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:1366: utpacattiśca nāma kriyā, sā sakartṛkaiva bhavitumarhati gatyādivat /
GSP33brssgo2u:1367: kriyā ca nāma syādakartṛkā ceti vipratiṣidhyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:1368: ghaṭasya cetpattirucyamānā na ghaṭakartṛkā kiṃ tarihyanyakartṛketi kalpyā syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:1370: tathāca sati ghaṭa utpadyata ityukte kulālādīnāmapyutpadyamānatā pratīyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:1374: satorhi dvayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ saṃbhavati na sadasatorasatorvā /
GSP33brssgo2u:1376: satāṃ hi loke kṣetragṛhādīnāṃ maryādā dṛṣṭā nābhāvasya /
GSP33brssgo2u:1377_0: nahi vandhyāputro rājā babhūva prākpūrṇavarmaṇo 'bhiṣekādityevañjātīyakena maryādākāraṇena
GSP33brssgo2u:1377_2: maryādākaraṇena nirupākhyo vandhyaputro rājā babhūva bhavati bhaviṣyatīti vā viśeṣyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:1378: yadi ca vandyāputro 'pi kārakavyāpārādūrdhvamabhaviṣyattata idamapyupātsyata kāryābhāvo 'pi kārakavyāpārādūrdhvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1379: vayaṃ tu paśyāmo vandyāputrasya kāryābhāvasya cābhāvatvāviśeṣādyathā vandhyāputraḥ kārakavyāpārādūrdhvaṃ na bhaviṣyatyevaṃ kāryābhāvo 'pi kārakavyāpārādūrdhvaṃ na bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1382: evaṃ prāksiddhatvāttadananyatvācca kāryasya svarūpasiddhaye 'pi na kaścidvyāpriyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:1390: nahi devadattaḥ saṃkocitahastapādaḥ prasāritahastapādaśca viśeṣaṇa dṛśyamāno 'pi vastvanyatvaṃ gacchati,
GSP33brssgo2u:1392: tathā pratidinamanekasaṃsthānānāmapi pitrādīnāṃ na vastvanyatvaṃ bhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:1393: mama pitā mama bhrātā mama putra iti pratyabhijñānāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:1397: adṛśyamānānāmapi vaṭadhānādīnāṃ samānajātīyāvayavāntaropacitānāmaṅ kurādibhāvena darśanagocaratāpattau janmasaṃjñā /
GSP33brssgo2u:1399: tatredṛgjanmocchedāntaritatvāccedasataḥ sattvapattistathā sati garbhavāsina uttānaśāyinaśca bhedaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1402: yasyapunaḥ prāgutpatterasatkāryaṃ tasya nirviṣayaḥ kārakavyāpāraḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:1410: tasmātkṣīrādīnyeva dravyāṇi dadhyādibhāvenāvatiṣṭhamānāni kāryākhyāṃ labhanta iti na kāraṇādanyatkāryaṃ varṣaśatenāpi śakyaṃ niścetum /
GSP33brssgo2u:1411: tathā mūlakāraṇamevāntyātkāryāttena tena kāryākāreṇa naṭavatsarvavyavahārāspadatvaṃ pratipadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:1412: evaṃ yukteḥ kāryasya prāgutpatteḥ sattvamananyatvaṃ ca kāraṇādavagamyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:1414: pūrvasūtre 'sadvyapadeśinaḥ śabdasyodāhṛtatvāttato 'nyaḥ sadvyapadeśī śabdaḥ śabdāntaram- 'sadeva somyedamagra āsīdekamevādvitīyam' ityādi /
GSP33brssgo2u:1415: 'taddhaika āhurasadevedamagra āsīt' iti cāsatpakṣamupakṣipya 'kathamasataḥ sajjāyeta' ityākṣipya 'sadeva somyedamagra āsīt' (chā. 6.2.1) ityavadhārayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:1416: tatredaṃśabdavācyasya kāryasya prāgutpatteḥ sacchabdavācyena kāraṇena sāmānādhikaraṇyasya śrūyamāṇatvātsattvānanyatve prasiddhyataḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1417: yadi tu prāgutpatterasatkāryaṃ syātpaścāccotpadyamānaṃ kāraṇe samaveyāttadānyakāraṇātsyāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:1418: tatra 'yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavati' (chā. 6.1.3) itīyaṃ pratijñā pīḍyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:1427: dadhyādyarthināṃ kṣīrādau pravṛttyanyathānupapattiryuktistayā kāryasya prākkāraṇānanyatvena sattvaṃ sidhyatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1428: asato 'pi kāryasya tasmādutpatteḥ kāraṇatvadhiyā tatra pravṛttirityanyathopapattimāśaṅkyāha-aviśiṣṭe hīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1439: yasya kasyacidanyasya naraśṛṅgasya vā niyāmakatvaprasaṅgādanyatvāsattvayoḥ śaktāvanyatra cāviśeṣāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:1442: kiñca kāryakāraṇayoranyatve mṛdghaṭau bhinnau santāviti bhedabuddhiḥ syādityāha-apiceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1445: ādye sa saṃbandhaḥ kiṃ samavāyaḥ uta svarūpam /
GSP33brssgo2u:1462: kiñca 'niṣpāpatvādayo guṇāḥ'iti śrutismṛtyādiṣu 'vyavahārādiṣṭadharmo guṇaḥ'iti paribhāṣayā samāyasyāpi guṇatvācca /
GSP33brssgo2u:1465: ataḥ samavāyasiddheḥ prāk saṃyogasya guṇatvamasiddhamiti dik /
GSP33brssgo2u:1466: kiñca pratītyanusāreṇa vastu svīkāryamanyathā gopratiteraśva ālambanamityasyāpi suvacatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:1467: tathā ca mṛdghaṭa ityabhedapratīterabheda eva svīkāryaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:1469: evaṃ pratītyanusāreṇa kāryasya kāraṇātmanā sattvaṃ, svarūpeṇa tu mithyātmityuktam /
GSP33brssgo2u:1471: tatrādyamanūdyavayavinaḥ paṭādestantvādiṣvavayaveṣu tritvādivatsvarūpeṇa vṛttirutāvayavaśa iti vikalpādyaṃ dūṣayati-yadītyādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:1474: yathā haste kośe cāvayavaśaḥ khaṅgo vartamāno hastamātragrahe 'pi gṛhyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:1477: ekasmiṃstantau paṭavṛttikāle tantvantare vṛttirna syāt, vṛttāvanekatvāpatterityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1478: yathā yugapadanekavyaktiṣu vṛttāvapi jāteranekatvadoṣo nāsti tathāvayavina ityāśaṅkate-gotveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1483: yathā devadattaḥ svakāryamadhyayanaṃ grāme 'raṇye vā karoti,
GSP33brssgo2u:1484: yathā gauravayavī svakāryaṃ kṣīrādikaṃ śṛṅgapucchādāvapi kuryādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1487: yathā ghaṭaścalatītyukte calanakriyāṃ pratyāśrayatvarūpaṃ kartṛtvaṃ ghaṭasya bhāti tathā paṭo jāyata iti janikriyākartṛtvamanubhūyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:1491: asato ghaṭasyotpattau kartṛtvāsaṃbhave 'pi kulālādeḥ sattvātkartṛtvamityāśaṅkayāha-ghaṭasya ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1496: saṃprati kāryasyotpattirnāma svakāraṇe samavāyaḥsvasmin sattāsamavāyo veti tārkikamatamāśaṅkate-atheti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1499: nanu naraśṛṅgādivatkāryaṃ sarvadā sarvatrāsanna bhavati kintūtpatteḥ prāk dhvaṃsānantaraṃ cāsat madhye tu sadeveti vaiṣamyātsaṃbandhitvopapattirityāśaṅkyāha-abhāvasyeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1502: nanu kārakavyāpārādūrdhvabhāvinaḥ kāryasya vandhyāputratulyatvaṃ kathamityata āha-yadi ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1508: anirvācyakāryātmanā kāraṇasyābhivyaktyarthaḥ kārakavyāpāra ityāha-naiṣa doṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1509: kāryasatyatvamicchatāṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ satkāryavāde kārakavaiyarthyaṃ doṣa āpatati,
GSP33brssgo2u:1512: vicāryamāṇe sarvamayuktaṃ, yuktatve dvaitāpatteriti mukhyaṃ samādhānaṃ samādhānāntarābhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:1513: nanu kāraṇādbhinnamasadevotpadyata iti samādhānaṃ kiṃ na syādityāśaṅkyāsatpakṣasya dūṣaṇamuktaṃ smaretyāha-kāryākāro 'pīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1514: ataḥ kāraṇādbhedābhedābhyāṃ durnirūpasya sadasadvilakṣaṇasyānirvācyābhivyaktiranirvācyakārakavyāpārāṇāṃ phalamiti pakṣa eva śreyāniti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1516: tathāca ghaṭo mṛdbhinnaḥ, tadviruddhaviśeṣavattvāt, vṛkṣavadityata āha-naceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1520: dārṣṭāntike tu mṛdādināśe sati ghaṭādikaṃ jāyata iti janmavināśarūpaviruddhadharmavattvātkāryakāraṇayorabhedo na yukta iti śaṅkate-janmeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1523: nanu yatrānvayo dṛśyate tatra hetvasiddhāvapi yatrāṅkurādau vaṭabījādīnāmanvayo na dṛśyate tatra hetusattvādvasatvanyatvaṃ syādityata āha-adṛśyeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1524: tatrāpyaṅkurādau bījādyavayavānāmanvayānna sta eva janmavināśau kintvavayāntaropacayāpacayābhyāṃ tadvyavahāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1525: astūpacayāpacayaliṅgena vastubhedānumānaṃ tato 'sata utpattiḥ sato nāśa ityāśaṅkya vyabhicāramāha-tatredṛgiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1529: svapakṣe doṣaṃ parihṛtya parapakṣe prasañjayati-yasya punariti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1540: yathā ca saṃveṣṭitaḥ paṭo na vyaktaṃ gṛhyate kimayaṃ paṭaḥ kiṃ vānyaddravyamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1541: sa eva prasārito yatsaṃveṣṭitaṃ dravyaṃ tatpaṭa eveti prasāraṇenābhivyakto gṛhyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:1542: yathāca saṃveṣṭanasamaye paṭa iti gṛhyamāṇe 'pi na viśiṣṭāyāmavistāro gṛhyate sa eva prasāraṇasamaye viśiṣṭāyāmavistāro gṛhyate na saṃveṣṭitarūpādanyo 'yaṃ bhinnaḥ paṭa iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1543: evaṃ tantvādikāraṇāvasthaṃ paṭādikāryamaspaṣṭaṃ sat turīvemakuvindādikārakavyāpāradibhirvyaktaṃ spaṣṭaṃ gṛhyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:1547: kāryamupādānadbhinnaṃ tadupalabdhāvapyanupalabhyamānatvāt tato 'dhikaparimāṇatvācca maśakādiva śaśaka ityatra vyabhicārārthaṃ sūtram-paṭavacceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1554: yathā ca loke prāṇāpānādiṣu prāṇabhedeṣu prāṇāyāmena niruddheṣu kāraṇamātreṇa rūpeṇa vartamāneṣu jīvanamātraṃ kāryaṃ nivartyate nākuñcanaprasāraṇādikaṃ kāryāntaram /
GSP33brssgo2u:1555: teṣveva prāṇabhedeṣu punaḥ pravṛtteṣu jīvanādadhikamākuñcanaprāsāraṇādikamapi kāryāntaraṃ nirvartyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:1558: ataśca kṛtsnasya jagato brahmakāryatvāttadananyatvācca siddhaiṣā śrautī pratijñā 'yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavatyamataṃ matamavijñātaṃ vijñātam' (chā. 6.1.1) iti // 20 //
GSP33brssgo2u:1561: saṃmatavat iti hetumāśaṅkya vyabhicāramāha sūtrakāraḥ-yathā ca prāṇādīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1572: itarasya śārīrasya brahmātmatvaṃ vyapadiśati śrutiḥ - 'sa ātmā tattvamasi śvetaketo' (chā. 6.8.7) iti prabodhanāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:1574: itarasya ca brahmaṇaḥ śārīrātmatvaṃ vyapadiśati 'tatsṛṣṭvā tadevānuprāviśat' (tai. 2.6)
GSP33brssgo2u:1577: iti ca parā devatā jīvamātmaśabdena vyapadiśantī na brahmaṇo bhinnaḥ śārīra iti darśayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:1579: ataḥ sa svatantraḥ kartā san hitamevātmanaḥ saumanasyakaraṃ kuryānnāhitaṃ janmamaraṇajarārogādyanekānarthajālam /
GSP33brssgo2u:1585: sarvo hi lokaḥ spaṣṭaṃ kāryaṃ kṛtvā smarati mayedaṃ kṛtamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1591_0: sa yadi tādṛgbrahmajagajjanayettarhi svāniṣṭaṃ narakādikaṃ na janayet svatantracetanatvāditi
GSP33brssgo2u:1591_1: nyāyena virudhyate na veti saṃdehe pūrvoktajīvānanyatvamupajīvya jīvadoṣā brahmaṇi
GSP33brssgo2u:1592: pūrvapakṣe jīvābhinne samanvayāsiddhiḥ, siddhānte tatsiddhiriti phalam /
GSP33brssgo2u:1603: nahi tasya hitaṃ kiñcitkartavyamastyahitaṃ vā parihartavyaṃ, nityamuktasvabhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:1604: naca tasya jñānapratibandhaḥ śaktipratibandho vā kvacidapyasti, sarvajñatvātsarvaśaktitvācca /
GSP33brssgo2u:1606: natu taṃ vayaṃ jagataḥ sraṣṭāraṃ brūmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1609: 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyaḥ'' (bṛ. 2.4.5)
GSP33brssgo2u:1618: apica yadā tattvamasītyevañjātīyakenābhedanirdeśenābhedaḥ pratibodhito bhavatyapagataṃ bhavati tadā jīvasya saṃsāritvaṃ brahmaṇaśca sraṣṭṛtvaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:1620: tatra kuta eva sṛṣṭiḥ kuto vā hitākaraṇādayo doṣāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1623: abādhite tu bhedavyavahāre 'se 'nveṣṭavyaḥ sa vijijñāsitavyaḥ' ityevañjātīyakena bhedanirdeśenāvagamyamānaṃ brahmaṇo 'dhikatvaṃ hitākaraṇādidoṣaprasaktiṃ niruṇaddhi // 22 //
GSP33brssgo2u:1624: jīveśayorabhedājjīvajagaterdeṣā brahmaṇi syuḥ brahmagatāśca sṛṣṭisaṃhāraśaktisarvasmartṛtvādayo guṇā jīve syuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1626: jīvasya svaśarīre 'pi saṃhārasāmarthyādarśanāditi prāpte siddhāntasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-tuśabda ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:1628: yadi vayaṃ jīvaṃ sraṣṭāraṃ brūmastadā doṣāḥ prasajyante natu taṃ brūma ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1629: kiñcābhedājñānādūrdhvaṃ vā doṣā āpādyante, pūrvaṃ vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:1634: jñānādūrdhvaṃ sraṣṭṛtvādidharmāṇāṃ bādhāt pūrvaṃ ca kalpitabhedena vyavasthopapatterna kiñcidavadyamityarthaḥ //22//
GSP33brssgo2u:1639_0: yathā ca loke pṛthivītvasāmānyānvitānāmapyaśmanāṃ kecinmahārhā maṇayo vajravaiḍūryādayo
GSP33brssgo2u:1639_1: 'nye madhyamavīryāḥ sūryakāntādayo 'nye prahīṇāḥ śvavāyasaprakṣepaṇārhāḥ pāṣāṇā ityanekavidhaṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:1640: yathā caikapṛthivīvyapāśrayāṇāmapi bījānāṃ bahuvidhaṃ patrapuṣpaphalagandharasādivaicitryaṃ candanakiṃpākādiṣūpalakṣyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:1641: yathā caikasyāpyannarasasya lohitādīni keśalomādīni ca vicitrāṇi kāryāṇi bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1642: evamekasyāpi brahmaṇo jīvaprājñapṛthaktvaṃ kāryavaicitryaṃ copapadyata ityastadanupapattiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1648: kathaṃ ca tatkāryavaicitryamityanupapattiṃ dṛṣṭāntaiḥ pariharati sūtrakāraḥ-aśmādivacceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1655: kiñca kartṛtvabhoktṛtvādivikārasya mithyātvājjīvasyaiva tāvaddoṣo nāsti kuto bimbasthānīyasyāśeṣaviśeṣadarśinaḥ parameśvarasya doṣaprasaktiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1656: yattu brahma na vicitrakāryaprakṛti, ekarūpātvāt, vyatirekeṇa mṛttantvādivaditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:1659: tasmāt pratyagabhinne brahmaṇi samanvayasyāvirodha iti siddham //23//
GSP33brssgo2u:1664: upasaṃhāradarśanān neti cen na kṣīravad dhi | BBs_2,1.24 |
GSP33brssgo2u:1665: cetanaṃ brahmaikamadvitīyaṃ jagataḥ kāraṇamiti yaduktaṃ tannopapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:1668: iha hi loke kulālādayo ghaṭapaṭādīnāṃ kartāro mṛddaṇḍacakrasūtrādyanekakārakopasaṃhāreṇa saṃgṛhītasādhanāḥ santastattatkāryaṃ kurvāṇā dṛśyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:1669: brahma cāsahāyaṃ tavābhipretaṃ tasya sādhanāntarānupasaṃgrahe sati kathaṃ sraṣṭṛtvamupapadyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:1673: yathā hi loke kṣīraṃ jalaṃ vā svayameva dadhihimabhāvena pariṇamate 'napekṣya bāhyaṃ sādhanaṃ tathehāpi bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssgo2u:1674: nanu kṣīrādyapi dadhyādibhāvena pariṇāmamānapekṣata eva bāhyaṃ sādhanamauṣṇyādikaṃ kathamucyate kṣīravaddhīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1676: svayamapi hi kṣīraṃ yāṃ ca yāvatīṃ ca pariṇāmamātramanubhavati tāvatyeva tvāryate tvauṣṇyādinā dadhibhāvāya /
GSP33brssgo2u:1677: yadi ca svayaṃ dadhibhāvaśīlatā na syānnaivauṣṇyādināpi balāddadhibhāvamāpadyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:1682: śrutiśca bhavati- 'na tasya kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca vidyate na tatsamaścābhyadhikaśca dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:1683: parāsya śaktirvividhaiva śrūyate svābhāvikī jñānabalakriyā ca //
GSP33brssgo2u:1691: sa kiṃ yadasahāyaṃ tanna kāraṇamiti laukikanyāyena virudhyate na veti saṃdehe pūrvamaupādhikajīvabhedādbrahmaṇi jīvadoṣā na prasajyanta ityuktam,
GSP33brssgo2u:1692: saṃprati upādhito 'pi vibhaktaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prerakādikaṃ sahakāri nāsti īśanānātvābhāvāditi pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣasūtrāṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe-cetanamityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:1695: uktanyāyasya kṣīrādau vyabhicāra iti siddhāntayati-naiṣa doṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1697: viśiṣṭasyeśvarasya tu māyaiva sahāya iti bhāvenāha-bāhyamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1698: kṣīrasyāpyātañcanādisahāyo 'stītyasahāyatvahetorna vyabhicāra ityāśaṅkya sahāyābhāve 'pi yasya kasyacitpariṇāmasya kṣīre darśanādvyabhicāratādavasthyamityāha-nanvityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:1700: nanu tvāryate kṣīraṃ dadhibhāvāya śaighryaṃ kāryata iti kimarthaṃ kalpyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:1701: svato 'śaktaṃ kṣīraṃ sahāyena śaktaṃ kriyata iti kiṃ na syāt,
GSP33brssgo2u:1706: tarhi śaktivyañjako 'pi sahāyo brahmaṇo vācyaḥ, tatrāha-paripūrṇoti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1714: upapadyate kṣīrādīnāmacetanānāmanapekṣyāpi bāhyaṃ sādhanaṃ dadhyādibhāvaḥ, dṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:1715: cetanāḥ punaḥ kulālādayaḥ sādhanasāmagrīmapekṣyaiva tasmai kāryāya pravartamānā dṛśyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:1718_0: yathā loke devāḥ pitara ṛṣaya ityevamādayo mahāprabhāvāścetanā api santo 'napekṣyaiva
GSP33brssgo2u:1718_2: śarīrīṇi prāsādādīni ca rathādīni ca nirmimāṇā upalabhyante mantrārthavādetihāsapurāṇaprāmāṇyāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:1722: evaṃ cetanamapi brahmānapekṣya bāhyaṃ sādhanaṃ svata eva jagatsrakṣyati /
GSP33brssgo2u:1723: sa yadi brūyādya ete devādayo brahmaṇo dṛṣṭāntā upāttāste dārṣṭrāntikena brahmaṇā na samānā bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1724: śarīrameva hyacetanaṃ devādīnāṃ śarīrāntarādivibhūtyutpādana upādānaṃ natu cetana ātmā /
GSP33brssgo2u:1727: padminī ca cetanaprayuktā satyacetanevaiva śarīreṇa sarontaropasarpaṇe vyāpriyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:1731: yathā hi kulālādīnāṃ devādīnāṃ ca samāne cetanatve kulālādayaḥ kāryārambhe bāhyaṃ sādhanamapekṣante na devādayaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:1732: tathā brahma cetanamapi na bāhyaṃ sādhanamapekṣiṣyata ityetadvākyaṃ devādyudāharaṇena vivakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1733: tasmādyathaikasya sāmarthyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tathā sarveṣāmeva bhavitumarhatīti nāstyekānta ityabhiprāyaḥ // 25 //
GSP33brssgo2u:1735: FN: lokyate jñāyater'thoneneti loko mantrārthavādādiśāstraṃ vṛddhavyavahāraśca /
GSP33brssgo2u:1737: yathā bhārate śrīkṛṣṇasya saṃkalpamātreṇa draupadyāḥ paṭaparamparotpattiḥ tathā asahāyasyāpi brahmaṇaḥ kāraṇatvam /
GSP33brssgo2u:1738: nanu brahma na kāraṇaṃ cetanatve satyasahāyatvānmṛdādiśūnyakulālādivaditi na kṣīrādau vyabhicāra iti sūtravyāvartyāṃ śaṅkāmāha-syadetaditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:1744: ato viśiṣṭahetorna vyabhicāra iti śaṅkate-sa yadi brūyādityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:1747: atra hi hetau cetanatvamahandhīviṣayatvarūpaṃ cittādātmyāpannadehasādhāraṇaṃ grāhyaṃ na tu mukhyātmatvaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:1752: tathā ca kulālavailakṣaṇyaṃ devādīnāṃ ghaṭādikārye svātiriktānapekṣatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:1755: śrūyate hi mahābhārate śrīkṛṣṇasya saṃkalpamātreṇa draupadyāḥ paṭaparamparotpattiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1762: cetanamekamadvitīyaṃ brahma kṣīrādivaddevādivaccānapekṣya bāhyasādhanaṃ svayaṃ pariṇamamānaṃ jagataḥ kāraṇamiti sthitam /
GSP33brssgo2u:1764: kṛtsnaprasaktiḥ kṛtsnasya brahmaṇaḥ kāryarūpeṇa pariṇāmaḥ prāpnoti,
GSP33brssgo2u:1767: niravayavaṃ tu brahma śrutibhyo 'vagamyate- 'niṣkalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ śāntaṃ niravadyaṃ nirañjanam' (śve. 6.19)
GSP33brssgo2u:1776: athaitaddoṣaparijihīrṣayā sāvayavameva brahmābhyupagamyeta tathāpi ye niravayavatvasya pratipādakāḥ śabdā udāhṛtāste prakuṣyeyuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1778: sarvathāyaṃ pakṣo na ghaṭayituṃ śakyata ityākṣipati // 26 //
GSP33brssgo2u:1783_0: kṣīradṛṣṭāntena brahma pariṇāmīti bhramotpattyā pūrvapakṣe prāpte śāstrārtho vivarto
GSP33brssgo2u:1785: sa kiṃ yanniravayavaṃ tanna pariṇāmīti nyāyena virudhyate na veti saṃdehe virudhyata iti pūrvapakṣasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-kṛtsneti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1786: brahma pariṇāmīti vadatā vaktavyaṃ brahma niravayavaṃ sāvayavaṃ vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:1787: ādye sarvasya brahmaṇaḥ pariṇāmātmanā sthitiḥ syādityuktaṃ vyatirekadṛṣṭāntena vivṛṇoti-yadi brahmetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:1791: yadā pariṇāmavyatirekeṇa mūlabrahmātmā nāsti tadātmā draṣṭavya ityupadeśor'thaśūnyaḥ syāditi doṣāntaramāha-draṣṭavyateti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1803: yathaiva hi brahmaṇo jagadutpattiḥ śrūyata evaṃ vikāravyatirekeṇāpi brahmaṇo 'vastānaṃ śrūyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:1804: prakṛtivikārayorbhedena vyapadeśāt 'seyaṃ devataikṣata hantāhamimāstisro devatā anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi' (chā. 6.3.2)
GSP33brssgo2u:1806: pādo 'sya sarvā bhūtāni tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi' (chā. 3.12.6) iti caivañjātīyakāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:1808: yadi ca kṛtsnaṃ brahma kāryābhāvenopayuktaṃ syāt 'satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavati' (chā. 6.81)
GSP33brssgo2u:1814: śabdamūlaṃ ca brahma śabdapramāṇakaṃ nendriyādipramāṇakaṃ tadyathāśabdamabhyupagantavyam /

GSP33brssgo2u:2173: nirguṇasya brahmaṇo jagadupādanatvavādivedāntasamanvayo viṣayaḥ sa kiṃ yannirguṇaṃ tannopādānaṃ yathā rūpamiti nyāyena virudhyate na veti saṃdehe,
GSP33brssgo2u:2175: natūpādānatvaṃ tadvyāpakasya saguṇatvasyābhāvāditi pratyudāharaṇena prāpte siddhāntasūtratātparyamāha-cetanamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2179: yadyapi sarvajñatvaṃ sarvaśaktitvaṃ ca loke kāraṇadharmatvenāprasiddhaṃ tathāpi yo yasya kartā sa tasya sarvasya jñātā śaktaśceti prasiddham,
GSP33brssgo2u:2185: iti śrīgovindabhagavatpūjyapādaśiṣyaśaṅkarabhagavatpūjyapādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye dvitīyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ // 1 //
GSP33brssgo2u:2186: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ dvitīyasyādhyāyasya prathamapādaḥ samāptaḥ //1//
GSP33brssgo2u:2187: // iti dvitīyādhyāyasya sāṃkhyayogakāṇādādismṛtibhiḥ sāṃkhyādiprayuktatarkaiśca vedāntasamanvayavirodhaparihārākhyaḥ prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP33brssgo2u:2192: yasya tattvaṃ na jānanti taṃ vande raghupuṅgavam //1//
GSP33brssgo2u:2196: yadyapīdaṃ vedāntavākyānāmaidaṃparyaṃ nirūpayituṃ śāstraṃ pravṛttaṃ na tarkśāstravat devalābhir yuktibhiḥ kaṃcit siddhāntaṃ sādhayituṃ dūṣayituṃ vā pravṛttam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2197: tathāpi vedāntavākyam api vyācakṣāṇaiḥ samyagdarśanapratipakṣabhūtāni sāṃkhyādidarśanāni nirākaraṇīyāṇīti tadarthaḥ paraḥ pādaḥ pravartate /
GSP33brssgo2u:2198: vedāntārthanirṇayasya ca samyagdarśanārthatvāt tannirṇayena svapakṣasthāpanaṃ prathamaṃ kṛtaṃ taddyabhyarhitaṃ parapakṣapratyākhyānād iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2199: nanu mumukṣūṇāṃ mokṣasādhanatvena samyagdarśananirūpaṇāya svapakṣasthāpanam eva kevalaṃ kartuṃ yuktaṃ kiṃ parapakṣanirākaraṇena paradveṣakareṇa /
GSP33brssgo2u:2201: tathāpi mahājanaparigṛhītāni mahānti sāṃkhyāditantrāṇi samyagdarśanāpadeśena pravṛttānyupalabhya bhavet keṣāṃcin mandamatīnām etāny api samyagdarśanāyopadeyānītyapekṣā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2202: tathā yuktagāḍhatvasaṃbhavena sarvajñabhāṣitatvācca śraddhā ca teṣvityatastadasāratopapādanāya prayatyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:2206: iti ca pūrvatrāpi sāṃkhyādipakṣapratikṣepaḥ kṛtaḥ, kiṃ punaḥ kṛtakaraṇeneti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2207: taducyate- sāṃkhyādayaḥ svapakṣasthāpanāya vedāntavākyānyapyudāhṛtya svapakṣānuguṇenaiva yojayanto vyācakṣate,
GSP33brssgo2u:2208: teṣāṃ yadvyākhyānaṃ tadvyākhyanābhāsaṃ na samyagvyakhyānamityetāvatpūrvaṃ kṛtam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2209: iha tu vākyanirapekṣaḥ svatantrastadyuktipratiṣedhaḥ kriyata ityeṣa viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2210: tatra sāṃkhyā manyante- yathā ghaṭaśarāvādayo bhedā mṛdātmanānvīyamānā mṛdātmakasāmānyapūrvakā loke dṛṣṭāḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:2211: tathā sarva eva bāhyādhyātmikā bhedāḥ sukhaduḥkhamohātmatayānvīyamānāḥ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakasāmānyapūrvikā bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2212: yattatsukhaduḥkhamohātmakaṃ sāmānyaṃ tatttriguṇaṃ pradhānaṃ mṛdvadacetanaṃ cetanasya puruṣārthaṃ sādhayituṃ svabhāvenaiva vicitreṇa vikārātmanā vivartata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2216: gehaprāsādaśayanāsanavihārabhūmyādayo hi loke prajñāvadbhiḥ śilpibhiryathākālaṃ sukhaduḥkhaprāptiparihārayogyā racitā dṛśyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:2220: mṛdādiṣvapi kumabhakārādyadhiṣṭhiteṣu viśiṣṭākārā racanā dṛśyate tadvatpradhānasyāpi cetanāntarādiṣṭhitatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2221: naca mṛdādyupādānasvarūpavyapāśrayeṇaiva dharmeṇa mūlakāraṇamavadhāraṇīyaṃ na bāhyakumbhakārādivyapāśrayeṇeti kiñcinniyāmakamasti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2222: nacaivaṃ sati kiñcidvirudhyate, pratyuta śrutiranugṛhyate cetanakāraṇasamarpaṇāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2230_0: tathā parimitānāṃ bhedānāṃ mūlāṅ kurādīnāṃ saṃsargapūrvakatvaṃ dṛṣṭvā bāhyādhyātmikānāṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:2231: kāryakāraṇabhāvastu prekṣāpūrvakanirmitānāṃ śayanāsanādīnāṃ dṛṣṭa iti na kāryakāraṇabhāvādbāhyādhyātmikānāṃ bhedānāmacetanapūrvakatvaṃ śakyaṃ kalpayitum // 1 //
GSP33brssgo2u:2234: brahmaṇi sarvadharmopapattivat pradhāne 'pi tadupapattimāśaṅkya nirācaṣṭe-racanānupapatteśca nānumānam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2235: nanu mumukṣūṇāṃ vākyārthanirṇayapratibandhanirāsāya vedāntānāṃ tātparyaṃ niścetumidaṃ śāstramārabdhaṃ tacca nirdeṣatayā niścitaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:2236: tataḥ parapakṣanirāsātmako 'yaṃ pādo 'smin śāstre na saṃgataḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:2241: nanu rāgadveṣakaraṇatvāt paramatanirākaraṇaṃ na kāryamiti śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2244: sā ca teṣu bhrāntimūlatvaniścayaṃ vinā na sidhyati,
GSP33brssgo2u:2245: sa ca imaṃ pādaṃ vinā neti svasiddhāntasaṃrakṣaṇārthatvātpradhānasidhyarthatvādayaṃ pādo 'smin śāstre saṃgataḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:2248: mandamatīnām teṣu śraddhānimittāni bahūni santīti tannirāsāya yatnaḥ kriyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2251: parapakṣatvabuddhyā hi nirāso dveṣamāvahati na tu tattavanirṇayecchayā kṛta iti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2254: saṃprati śrutyanapekṣāstadīyāḥ svatantrā yuktayo nirasyanta ityarthabhedānna punaruktirityāha-taducyataiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2255_0: pradhānamacetanaṃ jagadupādānamiti sāṃkhyasiddhānto 'tra viṣayaḥ sa kiṃ pramāṇamūlo
GSP33brssgo2u:2261: bhidyanta iti bhedā vikārāḥ, ye vikārā yenānvitāste tatprakṛtikā iti vyāptimāha-yatheti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2265: tadarthaṃ svabhāvata eva pravartate na tu kenaciccetanena preryata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2273: tathā hi-kṣityādīnāṃ bhedānāṃ kāraṇamavyaktamasti, parimitatvāt, ghaṭavat /
GSP33brssgo2u:2276: tathā ghaṭādīnāṃ kāraṇaśaktitaḥ pravṛttermahadādikāryāṇāmapi kāraṇaśaktitaḥ pravṛttirvācyā,
GSP33brssgo2u:2278: kiñca kāraṇātkāryasya vibhāgo janma dṛśyate kṣitermṛttikā jāyate tato ghaṭa iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2279: evamavibhāgaḥ prātilomyena pralayo dṛśyate ghaṭasya mṛttikāyāṃ layaḥ tasyāḥ kṣitau kṣiterapsu apāṃ tejasīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2280: etau vibhāgāvibhāgau vaiśvarūpyasya vicitrasya bhāvajātasya dṛśyamānau pṛthakpakṣīkṛtau kvacitkāraṇe viśrāntau vibhāgatvādavibhāgatvācca mṛdi ghaṭavibhāgāvibhāgavadityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2285: svatantramacetanaṃ prakṛtirityetaddṛṣṭāntabalena tadā nirūpyeta yadi dṛṣṭāntaḥ kvacitsyāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2288: parakīyasya sādhyasyāprasiddhimuktvā satpratipakṣaṃ vaktuṃ yadvicitraracanātmakaṃ kāryaṃ taccetanādhiṣṭhitācetanaprakṛtikamiti vyāptimāha-geheti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2290: vipakṣe vicitraracanānupapattirūpaṃ sūtroktaṃ bādhakatarkaṃ vaktuṃ jagato vaicitryamāha-tatheti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2291: bāhyaṃ pṛthivyādi bhogyam, ādhyātmikaṃ śarīrādi ca bhogādhiṣchānamiti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2293: itthaṃ vicitraṃ jagaccetanānadhiṣṭhitā jaḍaprakṛtiḥ kathaṃ racayet /
GSP33brssgo2u:2302: tathā ca pariṇāmitve 'pi mūlaprakṛteracetanatvadharmeṇaiva yogo na cetanādhiṣṭitatvenetyāśaṅkya niṣedhati-naceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2303: mahānasadṛṣṭānte 'ntaraṅgasyāpi mahānasasvarūpasya dhūmavyāpakatvaṃ nāsti tadbhinnasya bahiraṅgasyāpi vahnestadastītyantaraṅgatvaṃ vyāpakatve prayojakaṃ na bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2304: kiñca yadacetanaṃ taccetanādhiṣṭhitameva pariṇamata ityaṅgīkāre bādhakābhāvāt pratyuta śrutyanugrahācca tathāṅgīkāryamityāha-na caivaṃ satīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2310: kiñca yadi ghaṭe mṛdvatsukhādikaṃ śabdādyanvitaṃ syāt tarhi sarvairaviśeṣeṇa sukhādikamupalabhyeta ghaṭe mṛdvat /
GSP33brssgo2u:2312: viṣayasyaikatve 'pi puruṣavāsanāvaicitryāt kasyacitsukhabuddhiḥ kasyacidduḥkhabuddhiḥ kasyacinmohabuddhirdṛśyate 'to viṣayāḥ sukhādyātmakā na bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2313: evaṃ samanvayāditi hetuṃ dūṣayitvā parimāṇādihetūn dūṣayati-tatheti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2314: buddhyādīnāṃ parimitatvena saṃsargapūrvakatvasiddhau saṃsṛṣṭānyanekāni sattvarajastamāmasi siddhyanti,
GSP33brssgo2u:2316: kimidaṃ parimitatvaṃ, na tāvaddeśataḥ paricchedaḥ, pakṣāntargatākāśe tasyābhāvena bhāvāsiddheḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2320: sattvādīnāṃ parasparaṃ bhinnatve satyapi sādhyābhāvena vyabhicārādityāha-sattveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2324: naca yaḥ kāryasya vibhāgaḥ sa cetanānadhiṣṭhitācetane samāpta iti vyāptirasti,
GSP33brssgo2u:2332: evaṃ cetanādhīnakāraṇaśaktitaḥ kāryapravṛttisaṃbhavāt śaktitaḥ pravṛttiliṅgamanyathāsiddhamiti bhāvaḥ //1//
GSP33brssgo2u:2338: tatsiddhyarthā yā pravṛttiḥ sāmyāvasthānātpracyutiḥ sattvarajastamasāmaṅgāṅgibhāvarūpāpattirviśiṣṭakāryābhimukhapravṛttitā sāpi nācetanasya pradhānasya svatantrasyopapadyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:2340: nahi mṛdādayo rathādayo vā svayamacetanāḥ santaścetanaiḥ kulālādibhiraśvādibhirvānadhiṣṭhitā viśiṣṭakāryābhimukhapravṛttayo dṛśyante dṛṣṭāccādṛṣṭisiddhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2342: nanu cetanasyāpi pravṛttiḥ kevalasya na dṛṣṭā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2347: yasminpravṛttirdṛṣṭā tasya sota yatasaṃyuktasya dṛṣṭā tasya seti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2348: nanu yasmindṛśyate pravṛttistasyaiva seti yuktamubhayoḥ pratyakṣatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2350: pravṛtyāśrayadehādisaṃyuktasyaiva tu cetanasya sadbhāvasiddhiḥ kevalācetanarathādivailakṣaṇyaṃ jīvadehasya dṛṣṭamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2351: ata eva ca pratyakṣe dehe sati darśanādasati cādarśanāddehasyaiva caitanyamapīti laukāyatikāḥ pratipannāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2353: tadabhidhīyate- na brūmo yasminnacetane pravṛttirdṛśyate na tasya seti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2357: yathā kāṣṭhādivyapāśrayāpi dāhaprakāśalakṣaṇā vikriyānupalabhyamānāpi ca kevale jvalane jvalanādeva bhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:2359: laukāyatikānāmapi cetana eva deho 'cetanānāṃ rathādīnāṃ pravartako dṛṣṭa ityavipratiṣiddhaṃ cetanasya pravartakatvam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2360: nanu tava dehādisaṃyuktasyāpyātmano vijñānasvarūpamātravyatirekeṇa pravṛttyanupapatteranupapannaṃ pravartakatvamiti cet /
GSP33brssgo2u:2363: yathāyaskānto maṇiḥ svayaṃ pravṛttirahito 'pyayasaḥ pravartako bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:2364: yathā vā rūpādayo viṣayāḥ svayaṃ pravṛttirahitā api cakṣurādīnāṃ pravartakābhavanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2365: evaṃ pravṛttirahito 'pīśvaraḥ sarvagataḥ sarvātmā sarvajñaḥ sarvaśaktiśca san sarvaṃ pravartayedityupapannam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2375: guṇānāṃ kila sāmyāvasthā tattvānāṃ pralayaḥ, tadā na kiñcit kāryaṃ bhavati pralayābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2377: tataḥ kasyacidguṇasyāṅgitvamudbhūtatvena prādhānyaṃ kasyacidaṅgatvaṃ śeṣatvamityaṅgāṅgibhāvo bhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:2382: kecittu bhedānāṃ pravṛttiśaktimatvāccetanānadhiṣṭhatācetanaprakṛtikatvamiti śaktitaḥ pravṛttiriti liṅgaṃ vyācakṣate /
GSP33brssgo2u:2385: pravṛttiśaktimatve sati kāryatvasya ghaṭādiṣu cetanādhiṣṭitaprakṛtikatvenoktasādhyaviruddhena vyāptidarśanāditi 'pravṛtteśca'iti sūtreṇa jñāpitam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2386: nanu loke svatantrācetanānāṃ pravṛtyadarśane 'pi pradhāne sā pravṛttiḥ sidhyatu,
GSP33brssgo2u:2389: nanu pradhānasya pravṛttiṃ khaṇḍayatā cetanasya sṛṣṭau pravṛttirvācyā sā na yukteti sāṃkhyaḥ śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2399_0: yasminnacetane rathādau pravṛttirdṛṣṭā tasyaiva sā na cetanastatra heturiti kiṃ sāṃkhyamataṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:2399_1: sādhu uta yena cetanenāśvādinā pravṛttistatprayuktā seti vedāntimataṃ vā sādhviti praśnārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2405: jīvaddehasya rathādibhyo vailakṣaṇyaṃ prāṇādisatvaṃ liṅgaṃ dṛṣṭamiti kṛtvā cetanasya siddhirityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2410: anumitasya sadbhāvamātreṇa pravṛttihetutve sarvatrākāśasyāpi hetutvaprasaṅgāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2416: pravṛttiṃ pratyāśrayatvamacetanasyaivetyuktamaṅgīkṛtya cetanasya prayojakatvaṃ siddhāntī sādhayati-tadabhidhīyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2417: rathādipravṛttāvaśvādicetanasyānvayavyatireko sphuṭau tābhyāṃ cetanasya pravartakatvaṃ bāhyānāmapi saṃmatamityāha-laukāyatikānāmapīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2418: yaḥ pravartakaḥ saḥ svayaṃ pravṛttimānaśvādivaditi vyāpterātmani vyāpakābhāvānna pravartakatvamiti kaścicchaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2422_0: avidyakalpite nāmarūpaprapañce tayaivāvidyārūpayā māyayā ya āveśaścidātmanaḥ kalpitaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:2422_1: saṃbandhastasya vaśaḥ sāmarthyaṃ tenāntaryāmitvādikamīśvasyetyuktatvānna codyāvasara ityarthaḥ //2 //
GSP33brssgo2u:2429: yathāca jalamacetanaṃ svabhāvenaiva lokopakārāya syandata evaṃ pradhānamacetanaṃ svabhāvenaiva puruṣārthasiddhaye pravartiṣyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2434: , 'etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi prācyonyā nadyaḥ syandante' (bṛ. 3.8.9)
GSP33brssgo2u:2442: ityatra tu bāhyanimittanirapekṣamapi svāśrayaṃ kāryaṃ bhavatītyetallokadṛṣṭyā nidarśitam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2443: śāstradṛṣṭyā tu punaḥ sarvatraiveśvarāpekṣatvamāpadyamānaṃ na parāṇudyate // 3 //
GSP33brssgo2u:2448: tatra kṣīrādau vyabhicāramāśaṅkya tasyāpi pakṣasamatvenoktānumānādāgamena ca sādhyasiddhirna vyabhicāra iti sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-syādetadityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2453: kṣīre pravartakatvena dhenvādeḥ sattvācca na vyabhicāra ityāha-cetanāyāśceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2456: sūtrakārasya 'kṣīravaddhi' 'tatrāpi'iti ca vaktuḥ pūrvāparavirodhamāśaṅkya lokadṛṣṭyā śāstradṛṣṭyā ca sūtradvayamityavirodhamāha-upasaṃhāreti //3//
GSP33brssgo2u:2462: natu tadvyatirekeṇa pradhānasya pravartakaṃ nivartakaṃ vā kiñcidbāhyamapekṣyamavastitamasti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2463: puruṣastūdāsīno na pravartako na nivartaka ityato 'napekṣaṃ pradhānaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:2464: anapekṣatvācca kadācitpradhānaṃ mahadādyākāreṇa pariṇamate kadācinna pariṇamata ityetadayuktam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2465: īśvarasya tu sarvajñatvātsarvaśaktitvānmahāmāyatvācca pravṛttyapravṛttī na virudhyete // 4 //
GSP33brssgo2u:2466: astu pradhānasyāpi dharmādi karma puruṣo vā pravartaka ityāśaṅkya sūtraṃ pravṛttaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:2468: pradhānavyatirekeṇa karmaṇo 'navasthiteḥ puruṣasyodāsīnatvāt kadācitsṛṣṭipravṛttiḥ kadācitpralaya ityayuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2469: karmaṇo 'pi pradhānātmakasyācetanatvāt sadāsatvācca na kādācitkapravṛttiniyāmakatvamiti bhāvaḥ //4//
GSP33brssgo2u:2475: yathā tṛṇapallavodādi nimittāntaranirapekṣaṃ svabhāvādeva kṣīrādyākāreṇa pariṇamata evaṃ pradhānamapi mahadādyākāreṇa pariṇaṃsyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2478: yadi hi kiñcinnimittamupalabhemahi tato yathākāmaṃ tena tṛṇādyupādāya kṣīraṃ saṃpādayemahi,
GSP33brssgo2u:2481: atrocyate- bhavettṛṇādivatsvābhāvikaḥ pradhānasyāpi paraṇāmo yadi tṛṇāderapi svābhāvikaḥ pariṇāmo 'bhyupagamyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:2484: dhenvaiva hyupayuktaṃ tṛṇādi kṣīro bhavati na prahīṇamanaḍudādyupayuktaṃ vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2486: naca yathākāmaṃ mānuṣairna śakyaṃ saṃpādayitumityetāvatā nirnimittaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:2488: manuṣyā api śaknuvatyevocitenopāyena tṛṇādyupādāya kṣīraṃ saṃpādayitum /
GSP33brssgo2u:2489: prabhūtaṃ hi kṣīraṃ kāmayamānāḥ prabhūtaṃ ghāsaṃ dhenuṃ cārayanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2494: punarapi dṛṣṭāntabalāt pradhānasya svata eva kādācitkapravṛttirityāśaṅkya niṣedhati sūtrakāraḥ-anyatretyādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2506: athāpi nāma bhavataḥ śraddhāmanurudhyamānāḥ svābhāvikīmeva pradhānasya pravṛttimabhyupagacchema tathāpi doṣo 'nuṣajyetaiva /
GSP33brssgo2u:2509_0: yadi tāvatsvābhāvikī pradhānasya pravṛttirna kiñcidanyadihāpekṣata ityucyeta tato
GSP33brssgo2u:2509_1: yathaiva sahakāri kiñcinnāpekṣata evaṃ prayojanamapi kiñcinnāpekṣiṣyate ityataḥ pradhānaṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:2509_2: puruṣasyārthaṃ sādhayituṃ pravartata itīyaṃ pratijñā hīyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:2510: sa yadi brūyātsahakāryeva kevalaṃ nāpekṣate na prayojanamapīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2511: tathāpi pradhānapravṛtteḥ prayojanaṃ vivektavyaṃ bhogo vā syādapavargo vobhayaṃ veti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2537: autsukyanivṛttyarthaṃ yathā kriyāsu pravartate lokaḥ puruṣasya vimokṣārthaṃ pravartate tadvadavyaktamiti kārikoktaṃ dūṣayati-naceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2538: autsukyamicchāviśeṣaḥ kevalajaḍasyātmano vā na yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2541: tayoḥ śaktyordṛśyasṛṣṭī vinā sārthakyāyogāt pradhānasya sṛṣṭau pravṛttiriti cet /
GSP33brssgo2u:2549: yathā kaścitpuruṣo dṛkśaktisaṃpannaḥ pravṛttiśaktihīnaḥ paṅguraparaṃ puruṣaṃ pravṛttiśaktisaṃpannaṃ dṛkśaktihīnamandhamadhiṣṭhāya pravartayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:2551: evaṃ puruṣaḥ pradhānaṃ pravartayiṣyatīti dṛṣṭāntapratyayena punaḥ pratyavasthānam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2554: pradhānasya svatantrasya pravṛttyabhyupagamāt, puruṣasya na pravartakatvānabhyupagamāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2562: tathā pradhānasyācaitanyātpuruṣasya caudāsīnyāttṛtīyasya ca tayoḥ saṃbandhayiturabhāvātsaṃbandhānupapattiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2566: puruṣasya pravartakatvaṃ nirastamapi dṛṣṭāntena punarāśaṅkya niṣedhati-puruṣāśmavaditi cettathāpi /
GSP33brssgo2u:2567: pradhānasya svātantryaṃ puruṣasyaudāsīnyaṃ cābhyupetaṃ tyajyata iti vadantaṃ sāṃkhyaṃpratyāha-kathaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2568: puruṣasya parispandaḥ prayatnaguṇo vā nāstīti vaktuṃ hetudvayam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2572: nanu cijjaḍayordraṣṭṛdṛśyabhāvayogyatāsti, tayā tadbhāvaḥ saṃbandha ityata āha-yogyateti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2574: yathā svatantrapradhānapravṛttipakṣo bhogo 'pavarga ubhayaṃ vā phalamiti vikalpya dūṣitaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:2592: cirakālasthitasya sāmyasya cyutau nimittaṃ vācyaṃ tannāstītyarthaḥ //8//
GSP33brssgo2u:2597: athāpi syādanyathā vayamanumimīmahe yathā nāyamanantaro doṣaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:2600: yathā yathā kāryotpāda upapadyate tathā tathaiṣāṃ svabhāvo 'bhyupagamyate /
