GSP33brssgo2u:2602: tasmātsāmyāvasthāyāmapi vaiṣamyopagamayogyā eva guṇā avatiṣṭhanta iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2603: evamapi pradhānasya jñaśaktiviyogādracanānupapattyādayaḥ pūrvoktā doṣāstadavasthā eva /
GSP33brssgo2u:2606: vaiṣamyopagamayogyā api guṇāḥ sāmyāvasthāyāṃ nimittābhāvānnaiva vaiṣamyaṃ bhajeran /
GSP33brssgo2u:2607: bhajamānā vā nimittābhāvāviśeṣātsarvadaiva vaiṣamyaṃ bhajeranniti prasajyata evāyamanantaro 'pi doṣaḥ // 9 //
GSP33brssgo2u:2610: anapekṣasvabhāvādanyathā sāpekṣatvena guṇānāmanumānātpūrvasūtrokto doṣo na prasajyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:2623: prasiddha eva tu śrutyeśvarakāraṇavādinyā virodhastadanuvartinyā ca smṛtyā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2626: ekaṃ hi brahma sarvātmakaṃ sarvasya prapañcasya kāraṇamabhyupagacchatāmekasyaivātmano viśeṣau tapyatāpakau na jātyantarabhūtāvityabhyupagantavyaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2627: yadi cetau tapyatāpakāvekasyātmano viśeṣau syātāṃ sa tābhyāṃ tapyatāpakābhyāṃ na nirmucyata iti tāpopaśāntaye samyagdarśanamupadiśacchāstramanarthakaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2628: nahyauṣṇyaprakāśadharmakasya pradīpasya tadavasthasyaiva tābhyāṃ nirmokṣa upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:2630: tatrāpi jalātmana ekasya vīcyādanyo viśeṣā āvirbhāvatirobhāvarūpeṇa nityā eveti samāno jalātmano vīcyādibhiranirmokṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2634: yasyārthino yadviṣayamarthitvaṃ sa tasyārtho nityasiddha eveti na tasya tadviṣayamarthitvaṃ syāt,
GSP33brssgo2u:2635: yathā prakāśātmanaḥ pradīpasya prakāśākhyortho nityasiddha eveti na tasya tadviṣayamarthitvaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:2646: tapyastu puruṣo ya ekaḥ paryāyeṇobhābhyāṃ saṃbadhyata iti tayostapyatāpakayorekātmatāyāṃ mokṣānupapattiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2650: bhavedeṣa doṣo yadyekātmatāyāṃ tapyatāpakāvānyonyasya viṣayaviṣayibhāvaṃ pratipadyeyātām /
GSP33brssgo2u:2652: nahyagnirekaḥ sansvamātmānaṃ dahati prakāśayati vā satyapyauṣṇyaprakāśādidharmabhede pariṇāmitve ca /
GSP33brssgo2u:2655: ucyate- kiṃ na paśyasi karmabhūto jīvaddehastapyastāpakaḥ saviteti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2656: nanu taptirnāma duḥkhaṃ sā cetayiturnācetanasya dehasya /
GSP33brssgo2u:2657: yadi hi dehasyaiva taptiḥ syātsā dehanāśe svayameva naśyatīti tannāśāya sādhanaṃ naiṣitavyaṃ syāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:2658: ucyate- dehābhāve 'pi kevalasya cetanasya taptirna dṛṣṭā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2659: naca tvayāpi taptirnāma vikriyā cetayituḥ kevalasyeṣyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:2662: kathaṃ tavāpi tapyatāpakabhāvaḥ sattvaṃ tapyaṃ tāpakaṃ raja iti cet /
GSP33brssgo2u:2668: nahi ḍuṇḍubhaḥ sarpaṃ ivetyetāvatā saviṣo bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:2669: sarpo vā ḍuṇḍubha ivetyetāvatā nirviṣo bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:2672: atha pāramārthikameva cetanasya tapyatvamabhyupagacchasi tavaiva sutarāmanirmokṣaḥ prasajyeta ,
GSP33brssgo2u:2679: aupaniṣadasya tvātmaikatvābhyupagamādekasya ca viṣayaviṣayibhāvānupapattervikārabhedasya ca vācārambhaṇamātratvaśravaṇādanirmokṣaśaṅkā svapne 'pi nopajāyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:2680: vyavahāre tu yatra yathā dṛṣṭastapyatāpakabhāvastatra tathaiva sa iti na codayitavyaḥ parihartavyo vā bhavati // 10 //
GSP33brssgo2u:2695: tasmādbhrāntimūlatvātsāṃkhyaśāstrasya tena nirdeṣavedāntasamanvayasya na virodha iti siddham /
GSP33brssgo2u:2701: ato na vyavahāralopa ityāśaṅkya vahneriva tābhyāmātmanomokṣo na syādityāha-yadi cetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2702: nanu satyapi dharmiṇi svabhāvanāśo mokṣa upapadyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:2705: artho hyarjanālābhādinārthinaṃ tāpayatīti tāpakaḥ, arthī tapyastayorabhede bādhakamāha-yadīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2708: arthatvaṃ hi kāmanāviṣayatvaṃ, tacca kāmyādanyasya kāmayiturasatvānna syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2709: na hi svasya svārthatvamasti kāmyasyaiva kāmayitṛtvāyogāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2715: tayā tapyayā buddhyā puruṣasya saṃyogaḥ svasvāmibhāvastasya heturanādiravivekastasya parihāro vivekastasmānnityamuktasyāpi puruṣasya kathañcidupacārānmokṣopapattirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2716: yathā yoddhṛgatau jayaparājayau rājanyupacaryete tathā puruṣādatyantabhinnabuddhigatau bandhamokṣau puruṣe upacaryete /
GSP33brssgo2u:2725: yatra tapyatāpakabhāvo dṛṣṭastatraiveti vyavahārapakṣamādāya siddhāntī brūte-kiṃna paśyasīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2727: acetanasyaiva dehasya taptirneti vadatā sāṃkhyena vaktavyaṃ kiṃ cetanasya kevalasya taptiḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:2737: tarhi jalacandrasya calanavanmithyaiva taptirityasmatpakṣa āgata ityāha-paramārthata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2738: ivaśabdamātreṇa kathaṃ mithyā taptyavagama iti cettaducyate-ivaśabdastapyabuddhisattvasādṛśyaṃ brūte,
GSP33brssgo2u:2739: tacca sādṛśyaṃ puruṣasya tapyatvarūpaṃ cet kalpitameva vastutastaptyabhāvādityupapādayati-na cediti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2742: saviṣayatvaṃ nirviṣayatvaṃ cevaśabdārthaḥ kalpita eva draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2743: sāṃkhyasyāvidyake tapyatāpakatve sati mamāpi kiñcinna duṣyati kintu dṛṣṭameva saṃpannamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2744: yadi mithyātapyatvāṅgīkāre 'pasiddhāntaḥ syāditi bhītyā satyaṃ tapyatvaṃ puruṣasyocyate tathāpyapasiddhāntaḥ, kauṭasthyahānāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2750: nimittamavivekātmakadarśanaṃ tamastena sahitaḥ sanimittaḥ saṃyegaḥ puruṣasya guṇasvāmitvarūpastadapekṣatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2752: nimittasya nivṛttyabhāvānna mokṣa iti siddhāntī pariharati-neti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2757: vyavahārastu bhedāṅgīkārāttapyatāpakabhāvo bandhaḥ tattvajñānāttannivṛttiścopapadyata iti na codyāvasara ityarthaḥ //10//
GSP33brssgo2u:2764: tatrādau tāvadyo 'ṇuvādinā brahmavādini doṣa utprekṣyate sa pratisamādhīyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:2765: tatrāyaṃ vaiśeṣikāṇāmabhyupagamaḥ - kāraṇadravyasamavāyino guṇāḥ kāryadravye samānajātīyaṃ guṇāntaramārabhante,
GSP33brssgo2u:2767: tasmāccetanasya brahmaṇo jagatkāraṇatve 'bhyupagamyamāne kārye 'pi jagati cetanyaṃ samaveyāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2768: tadadarśanāttu na cetanaṃ brahma jagatkāraṇaṃ bhavitumarhatīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2771: eṣā teṣāṃ prakriyā- paramāṇavaḥ kila kañcitkālamanārabdhakāryā yathāyogaṃ rūpādimantaḥ pārimaṇḍalyaparimāṇaśca tiṣṭhanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2772: te ca paścādadṛṣṭādipuraḥsarāḥ saṃyogasacivāśca santo dvyaṇukādikrameṇa kṛtsnaṃ kāryajātamārabhante /
GSP33brssgo2u:2774: yadā dvau paramāṇū dvyaṇukamārabhete tadā paramāṇugatā rūpādiguṇaviśeṣāḥ śuklādayo dvyaṇuke śaklādīnaparānārabhante /
GSP33brssgo2u:2778: yadāpi dve dvyaṇuke caturaṇukamārabhete tadāpi samānaṃ dvyaṇukasamavāyināṃ śuklādīnāmārambhakatvam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2781: yadāpi bahavaḥ paramāṇavo bahūni vā dvyaṇukāni dvyaṇukasahito vā paramāṇuḥ kāryamārabhate tadāpi samānaiṣā yojanā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2782: tadevaṃ yathā paramāṇoḥ parimaṇḍalātsato 'ṇu hrasvaṃ ca dvyaṇukaṃ jāyate mahaddīrghaṃ ca tryaṇukādi na parimaṇḍalam,
GSP33brssgo2u:2783: yathā vā dvyaṇukādaṇorhrasvācca sato mahaddīrghaṃ ca tryaṇukaṃ jāyate nāṇu no hrasvam,
GSP33brssgo2u:2784: evaṃ cetanādbrahmaṇo 'cetanaṃ jagajjaniṣyata ityabyupagame kiṃ tava cchinnam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2785: atha manyase virodhinā parimāṇāntareṇākrāntaṃ kāryadravyaṃ dvyaṇukādītyato nārambhakāṇi kāraṇagatāni pārimaṇḍalyādīnītyabhyupagacchāmi,
GSP33brssgo2u:2787: yena kāraṇagatā cetanā kārye cetanāntaraṃ nārabheta /
GSP33brssgo2u:2791: yathā kāraṇe vidyamānānāmapi pārimāṇḍalyādināmanārambhakatvamevaṃ caitanyasyāpītyasyāṃśasya samānatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2794: naca parimāṇāntarārambhe vyagrāṇi pārimāṇḍalyādīnītyataḥ svasamānajātīyaṃ parimāṇāntaraṃ nārabhante parimāṇāntarasyānyahetutvābhyupagamāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2800: dravyāntare guṇāntare vārabhyamāṇe sarveṣāmeva kāraṇaguṇānāṃ svāśrayasamavāyaviśeṣāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2801: tasmātsvabhāvādeva pārimāṇḍalyādīnāmanārambhakatvaṃ, tathā cetanāyā apīti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2806: naca dravyasya dravyamevodāhartavyaṃ guṇasya vā guṇa eveti kaścinniyame heturasti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2807: sūtrakāro 'pi bhavatāṃ dravyasya guṇamudājahāra- 'pratyakṣāpratyakṣāṇāmapratyakṣatvātsaṃyogasya pañcātmakaṃ na vidyate' (vai. sū. 4.2.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2808: yathā pratyakṣāpratyakṣayorbhūmyākāśayoḥ samavayansaṃyogo 'pratyakṣa evaṃ pratyakṣāpratyakṣeṣu pañcasu bhūteṣu samavayaccharīramapratyakṣaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2811: etaduktaṃ bhavati- guṇaśca saṃyogo dravyaṃ śarīram /
GSP33brssgo2u:2812: 'dṛśyate tu' (bra. sū. 2.1.6) iti cātrāpi vilakṣaṇotpattiḥ prapañcitā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2816: nanvatideśo 'pi samānanyāyatayā kṛtaḥ 'etena śiṣṭāparigrahā api vyākhyātāḥ' (bra.sū. 2.1.12) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2818: tasyaiva tvayaṃ vaiśeṣikaprakriyārambhe tatprakriyānugatena nidarśanena prapañcaḥ kṛtaḥ // 11 //
GSP33brssgo2u:2820: FN: paramāṇuḥ parimaṇḍalaḥ tadgataṃ parimāṇaṃ pārimāṇḍalyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2823_0: yadyapi sāṃkhyamatanirāsānantaraṃ paramāṇuvādo nirākartavyaḥ svamatasthāpanasya smṛtipāde
GSP33brssgo2u:2824: tathā brahmaguṇacaitanyānanvayādbrahmaṇo 'pi nopādānatvamiti doṣo dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatilābhādatra samādhīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2826_0: sa kiṃ yaḥ samavāyikāraṇaguṇaḥ sa kāryadravye svasamānajātīyaguṇārambhakastantuśauklyavaditi
GSP33brssgo2u:2826_1: nyāyena virudhyate na veti saṃdehe nyāyasyāvyabhicārādvirudhyata iti prāpte vyabhicārānna
GSP33brssgo2u:2827: yadyapi 'na vilakṣaṇatvāt'ityatra cetanādacetanasargaḥ sādhitastathāpi vaiśeṣikanyāyasya tadīyaprakriyayā vyabhicāroktyarthatvādasya sūtrasya na gatārthatā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2828: pralayakāle paramāṇavo niścalā asaṃyuktāstiṣṭhanti sargakāle cādṛṣṭavadātmasaṃyogātteṣu karma bhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:2830: kāraṇaguṇāḥ kārye guṇāntaramānabhanta iti sāmānyena prakriyāmuktvā viśeṣatastāmāha-yadā dvāviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2833: tacca svasamānajātīyaguṇārambhakaṃ na bhavatītyuktanyāyasya vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2837: yathāśrute tu dvābhyāṃ dvyaṇukābhyāṃ mahataścaturaṇukasyārambho na yujyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:2838: kāraṇagataṃ mahatvaṃ bahutvaṃ vā vinā kārye mahatvāyogāditi mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2839_0: prakaṭārthakārāstu yaddvābhyāṃ dvyaṇukābhyāmārabdhaṃ kārye mahatvaṃ dṛśyate tasya
GSP33brssgo2u:2839_1: hetuḥ pracayo nāma praśithilāvayavasaṃyoga iti rāvaṇapraṇīte bhāṣye dṛśyata iti cirantanavaiśeṣikadṛṣṭyedaṃ bhāṣyamityāhuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2841: yadyapi tārkikā dvābhyāmeva paramāṇubhyāṃ dvyaṇukaṃ tribhirdvyaṇukaistryaṇukamiti kalpayanti tathāpi tarkasyāpratiṣṭhānānna niyama iti matvā brūte-yadāpi bahava iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2843: kāryadravyaparimāṇaṃ tu na kāraṇaparimāṇārabhyaṃ kintu kāraṇagatasaṃkhyārabhyamiti prakriyā tulyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2844: evaṃ prakriyāṃ darśayayitvā sūtraṃ yojayan vyabhicāramāha-tadevamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2847: aṇuhrasvebhyo dvyaṇukebhyo 'ṇudravyaṃ na jāyate hrasvamapi na jāyata iti vyabhicāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2849: tathā ca hrasvaparimaṇḍalābhyāṃ dvyaṇukaparamāṇubhyāṃ mahaddīrghāṇuvaccetanādacetanaṃ jāyata iti sūtrayojanā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2850: tatra hrasvānmahaddīrghaṃ tryaṇukaṃ parimaṇḍalādaṇu dvyaṇukamiti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2856: tadutpatteḥ prāgvirodhyabhāvāt dvyaṇuke pārimāṇḍalyārambhaḥ kiṃ na syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2857: nanu virodhiparimāṇena sahaiva dravyaṃ jāyata ityata āha-ārabdhamapīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2864: kāraṇānāṃ dvyaṇukānāṃ bahutvāt tryaṇuke mahatvaṃ mṛdo mahatvāt ghaṭe mahatvaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:2872: teṣāmanārambhakatve kāryadravyasya virodhiguṇākrāntatvaṃ vyagratvamasaṃnidhirvā na heturityuktiphalamāha-tasmāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:2873_0: yattu kāraṇaguṇaḥ svasamānaguṇārambhaka iti vyāpteḥ sāmānyaguṇeṣu pārimāṇḍalyādiṣu
GSP33brssgo2u:2873_1: vyabhicāre 'pi yo dravyasamavāyikāraṇagato viśeṣaguṇaḥ sa svasamānajātīyaguṇārambhaka
GSP33brssgo2u:2881: guṇāt dravyavaccetanādacetanārambha iti vilakṣaṇārambhakatvāṃśe 'yaṃ dṛṣṭānta iti pariharati-neti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2893: sa ca vāda itthaṃ samuttiṣṭhata- paṭādīni hi loke sāvayavāni dravyāṇi svānugateraiva saṃyogasacivaistantvādibhirdravyairārabhyamāṇāni dṛṣṭāni /
GSP33brssgo2u:2894: tatsāmānyena yāvatkiñcitsāvayavaṃ tatsarvaṃ svānugateraiva saṃyogasacivaistairdravyairārabdhamiti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:2895: sa cāyamavayavāvayavivibhāgo yato nivartate so 'pakarṣaparyantagataḥ paramāṇuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2897: nacākāraṇena kāryeṇa bhavitavyamityataḥ paramāṇavo jagataḥ kāraṇamiti kaṇabhugabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2898_0: tānīmāni catvāri bhūtāni bhūmyudakatejaḥpavanākhyāni sāvayavānyupalabhya caturvidhāḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:2898_1: paramāṇavaḥ parikalpyante teṣāṃ cāpakarṣaparyantagatatvena parato vibhāgāsaṃbhavādvanaśyatāṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:2898_2: pṛthivyādīnāṃ paramāṇuparyanto vibhāgo bhavati sa pralayakālaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2899: tataḥ sargakāle ca vāyavīyeṣvaṇuṣvadṛṣṭāpekṣaṃ karmotpadyate tatkarma svāśrayamaṇumaṇvantareṇa saṃniyukti tato dvyaṇukādikrameṇa vāyurutpadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:2903: aṇugatebhyaśca rūpādibhyo dvyaṇukādigatāni rūpādīni saṃbhavanti tantupaṭanyāyeneti kāṇādā manyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:2909: yathādṛṣṭaṃ kimapi karmaṇo nimittamabhyupagamyeta tasyāsaṃbhavānnaivāṇuṣvādyaṃ karma syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2911: śarīrapratiṣṭhe hi manasyātmanaḥ saṃyoge satyātmaguṇaḥ prayatno jāyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:2913: sargottarakālaṃ hi tatsarvaṃ nādyasya karmaṇo nimittaṃ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:2914: athādṛṣṭamādyasya karmaṇo nimittamityucyeta tatpunarātmasamavāyi vā syādaṇusamavāyi vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2916: nahyacetanaṃ cetanenānadhiṣṭhitaṃ svatantraṃ pravartate pravartayati veti sāṃkhyaprakriyāyāmabhihitam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2923: saṃyogābhāvācca tannibandhanaṃ dvyaṇukādi kāryajātaṃ na syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2926: pradeśavato dravyasya pradeśavatā dravyāntareṇa saṃyogasya dṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2929: kalpitānāmavastutvādavastveva saṃyoga iti vastunaḥ kāryasyāsamavāyikāraṇaṃ na syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2931: yathācādisarge nimittābhāvātsaṃyogotpattyarthaṃ karma nāṇūnāṃ saṃbhavatyevaṃ mahāpralaye 'pi vibhāgotpattyarthaṃ karma naivāṇūnāṃ saṃbhavet /
GSP33brssgo2u:2933: adṛṣṭamapi bhogaprasiddhyarthaṃ na pralayaprasiddhyarthamityato nimittābhāvānna syādaṇūnāṃ saṃyogotpattyarthaṃ vibhāgotpattyarthaṃ vā karma /
GSP33brssgo2u:2940_0: nāsya prāsaṅgikena pūrvādhikaraṇena saṃgatirapekṣiteti manvānaḥ pradhānasyeśvarānadhiṣṭhitasyākāraṇatve
GSP33brssgo2u:2942: sa kiṃ mānamūlo bhrāntimūlo veti saṃdehe pūrvapakṣayati-sa ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2943: taiḥ paṭādibhiḥ sāmānyaṃ kṣityādeḥ kāryardravyatvaṃ tenetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2949: vimataṃ sāvayavatvaṃ pakṣatāvacchedakaṃ yato nivartate sa nyūnaparimāṇasyāpakarṣasya paryantatvenāvasānabhūmitvenāvagataḥ paramāṇurityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2959: evaṃ kāṇādamatasya mānamūlatvāttena vedāntasamanvayasya virodhādasiddhiriti pūrvapakṣe phalam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2961: pralaye vibhaktānāṃ paramāṇūnāmanyatarakarmaṇo 'bhayakarmaṇā vā saṃyogo vācyaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:2967: dvitīye karmānutpattiḥ nādyaḥ, prayatnādeḥ sṛṣṭyuttarakālīnatvādityubhayathāpi na karma saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:2969: sthirasya vegavaddravyasaṃyogāviśeṣo 'bhighātaḥ sa eva calasya nodanamiti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2972: jaḍātmavadaṇorāśrayatvaṃ ki na syāditi matvā vikalpaḥ kṛta iti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2980: vibhusaṃyogasyāṇuṣu sadā sattvāt kriyāsātatye pralayābhāvaḥ syāditi dūṣayati-saṃbandheti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2982: yajjñānaṃ taccharīrajanyamiti vyāptivirodhena nityajñānāsiddhestadguṇa īśvaro nāsti,
GSP33brssgo2u:2986: saṃyogasya vyāpyavṛttitve ekasminnitarasyāntarbhāvātkāryasya pṛthutvāyogāt sarvaṃ kāryaṃ paramāṇumātraṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2987: kiñca sāṃśadravye saṃyogasyaikāṃśavṛttitvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tadvirodhādvyāpyavṛttitvaṃ na kalpyamityāha-dṛṣṭeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2991: kāṇādānāṃ sargapratyuktau sūtraṃ yojayitvā pralayanirāse 'pi sūtraṃ yojayati-thā ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2995: tathā ca dṛṣṭādṛṣṭanimittayorasattvādubhayathāpi saṃyogārthatvena vibhāgārthatvena ca karma nāsti,
GSP33brssgo2u:2996: ataḥ karmābhāvāttayoḥ saṃyogavibhāgapūrvakayoḥ sargapralayayorabhāva iti sūtrayojanā //12//
GSP33brssgo2u:3006_0: yathaiva hyaṇubhyāmatyantabhinnaṃ sadvyaṇukaṃ samavāyalakṣaṇena saṃbandhena tābhyāṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:3007: tataśca tasya tasyānyonyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kalpayitavya ityanavasthaiva prasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:3008: nanviha pratyayagrāhyaḥ samavāyo nityasaṃbaddha eva samavāyibhirgṛhyate nāsaṃbaddhaḥ saṃbandhāntarāpekṣo vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3009: tataśca na tasyānyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kalpayitavyo yenānavasthā prasajyeteti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3011: saṃyogo 'pyevaṃ sati saṃyogibhirnityasaṃbaddha eveti samavāyavannānyaṃ saṃbandhamapekṣeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:3014: naca guṇatvātsaṃyogaḥ saṃbandhāntaramapekṣate na samavāyo 'guṇatvāditi yujyate vaktum /
GSP33brssgo2u:3021: aṇuvādāsaṃbhava iti yogyatayā saṃbadhyate dvyaṇukasamavāyayoḥ paramāṇubhinnatvasāmyāt dvyaṇukavatsamavāyasyāpi samavāyāntaramityanavasthitirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3022: nanviha tantuṣu paṭa ityādiviśiṣṭadhīniyāmakaḥ samavāyo na saṃbandhāntaramapekṣate,
GSP33brssgo2u:3024: saṃyogasyāpi svarūpasaṃbandhopapatteḥ samavāyo na syāditi dūṣayati-neti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3027: guṇatvābhāve 'pi karmasāmānyādīnāṃ samavāyāṅgīkārādguṇatvaṃ samavāyitve na vyāpakam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3037: apicāṇavaḥ pravṛttisvabhāvā vā nivṛttisvabhāvā vobhayasvabhāvā vānubhayasvabhāvā vābhyupagamyante gatyantarābhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3047: nimittaṃ ca kālādṛṣṭādikaṃ nityasaṃnihitamiti nityameva pravṛttiprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3053_0: sāvayavānāṃ dravyāṇāmavayavavaśo vibhajyamānānāṃ yataḥ paro vibhāgo na saṃbhavati
GSP33brssgo2u:3053_1: te caturvidhā rūpādimantaḥ paramāṇavaścaturvidhasya rūpādimato bhūtabhautikasyārambhakā
GSP33brssgo2u:3053_2: nityāśceti yadvaiśeṣikā abhyupagacchanti sa teṣāmabhyupagamo nirālambana eva /
GSP33brssgo2u:3058: yadi loke rūpādimadvastu tatsvakāraṇāpekṣayā sthūlamanityaṃ ca dṛṣṭam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3059: tadyathā paṭastantūnapekṣya sthūle 'nityaśca bhavati tantavaścaṃśūnapekṣya sthūlā anityāśca bhavanti,
GSP33brssgo2u:3062: yacca nityatve kāraṇaṃ tairuktam- 'sadakāraṇavannityam' (vai. sū. 4.1.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3065: yadapi nityatve dvitīyaṃ kāraṇamuktam- 'anityamiti ca viśeṣataḥ pratiṣedhābhāvaḥ' (vai. sū. 4.1.4) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3067: asati hi yasminkasmiṃścinnitye vastuni nityaśabdena nañaḥ samāso nopapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:3072: yadapi nityatve tṛtīyaṃ kāraṇamuktam- 'avidyā ca' (vai. sū. 4.1.5)
GSP33brssgo2u:3074: tadyadyevaṃ vivrīyate satāṃ paridṛśyamānakāryāṇāṃ kāraṇānāṃ pratyakṣeṇāgrahaṇamavidyeti,
GSP33brssgo2u:3077: tasya ca prāgevoktatvāt 'avidyā ca' iti punaruktaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3078: athāpi kāraṇavibhāgātkāraṇavināśāccanyasya tṛtīyasya vināśahetorasaṃbhavo 'vidyā sā paramāṇūnāṃ nityatvaṃ khyapayatīti vyākhyāyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:3079: nāvaśyaṃ vinaśyadvastu dvābhyāmeva hetubhyāṃ vinaṣṭumarhatiti niyamo 'sti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3080: saṃyogasacive hyanekasmiṃśca dravye dravyāntarasyārambhake 'bhyupagamyamāna etadevaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3081: yadā tvapāstaviśeṣaṃ sāmānyātmakaṃ kāraṇaṃ viśeṣavadavasthāntaramāpadyamānamārambhakamabhyupagamyate tadā ghṛtakāṭhinyavilayanavanmūrtyavasthāvilayanenāpi vināśa upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:3084: kiṃ ca paramāṇavaḥ samavāyikāraṇavantaḥ kāraṇāpekṣayā sthūlā anityāśca,
GSP33brssgo2u:3085: rūpavattvāt rasavattvādgandhavattvāt sparśavattvāt ghaṭavaditi sūtraṃ yojayituṃ paraprakriyāmāha-sāvayavānāmityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3086: nanvatra paramāṇutvaṃ pakṣatāvacchedakaṃ tadviruddhaṃ sthūlatvaṃ kathaṃ sādhyata iti cet /
GSP33brssgo2u:3090: naca tarhi vāyuḥ kāraṇavāniti pṛthaksādhane rūpādihetūnāṃ bhāgāsiddhyabhāve 'pi siddhasādhanatā syāditi vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3092: yatra rūpaṃ tatsakāraṇamiti vyāptigrahakāle vāyutvādyavacchedena sādhyasiddhyabhāvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3094: ātmavaditi satpratipakṣamutthāpya viśeṣyāsiddhyā dūṣayati-yacca nityatva iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3098: ghaṭābhāvāvaditi nityasya kvacitsiddhau kāryamanityamiti viśeṣataḥ kārye nityatvapratiṣedhāt kāraṇabhūtaparamāṇuṣu nityatvaṃ sidhyati,
GSP33brssgo2u:3102: kāraṇanityatvasya pramāṇāntareṇa jñānaṃ vinā kāryamanityamiti vyavahārayogādityāha-naca śabdeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3103: yadi pramāṇāntaraṃ kāraṇanityatve syāttadāyaṃ vyavahāraḥ samūlo bhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:3105: vaṭe yakṣavyavahārādapi tatsiddhiprasaṅgāt mūlajñāne tu tenaiva aśeṣasiddhervyavahāropanyāsavaiyarthyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3106: evaṃ paramāṇunityatve kāṇādasūtradvayaṃ nirasya tṛtīyaṃ nirasyati-yadapīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3107: satāmaṇūnāṃ dṛśyamānasathūlakāryāṇāṃ pratyakṣeṇa kāraṇajñānamavidyeti yadi sūtrārthaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3116: avayavānāṃ saṃyogena dravyāntarotpattirāraṃbha iti yadi mataṃ syāt,
GSP33brssgo2u:3119: ataḥ kāraṇameva svato nirviśeṣaṃ viśeṣavadavasthātmanā kāryamityanubhavabalādāstheyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3120: tathā cāṇūnāmapyavidyāpariṇāmarūpāṇāṃ pralayanimittena kālādinā piṇḍātmakasvarūpatirobhāvena kāraṇabhāvāpattirvināśa upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:3125: vastutastu ghṛtaṃ kaṭhinaṃ dravamityanusyūtaghṛtapariṇāmaviśeṣo dravyameva kāṭhinyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3126: naca dravyatve 'pyavayavavibhāgādeva tasya nāśa iti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3129: kiñca pralaye nāsīdrajo nānyat kiñcanetyaṇūnāṃ nāśasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3138: sparśaguṇaḥ sūkṣmatamo vāyurityevametāni catvāri bhūtānyupacitāpacitaguṇāni sthūlasūkṣmatarasūkṣmatamatāratamyopetāni ca loke lakṣyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:3144: akalpyamāne tūpacitāpacitaguṇatve paramāṇutvasāmyaprasiddhaye yadi tāvatsarvaṃ ekaikaguṇā eva kalpyeraṃstatastejasi sparśasyopalabdhirna syāt,
GSP33brssgo2u:3157: pārthivaḥ paramāṇūradhikaguṇastata ekaikanyūnaguṇā jalādiparamāṇava iti kalpyate, na vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3163: neti pakṣe sarveṣāmāṇūnāṃ sāmyārthamekaikaguṇavattvaṃ vā syāccaturguṇavatvaṃ vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3170: ayaṃ tu paramāṇukāraṇavādo na kaiścidapi śiṣṭaiḥ kenacidapyaṃśena parigṛhīta ityatyantamevānādaraṇīyo vedavādibhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3176: yathā hi loke śaśakuśapalāśaprabhṛtīnāmatyantabhinnānāṃ satāṃ netaretarādhīnatvaṃ bhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:3178: atha bhavati dravyādhīnatvaṃ guṇādīnāṃ tato dravyabhāve bhāvāddravyābhāve 'bhāvāddravyameva saṃsthānādibhedādanekaśabdapratyayabhāgbhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:3184: iha tu śuklaḥ kambalo rohiṇī dhenurnīlamutpalamiti dravyasyaiva tasya tasya tena tena viśeṣeṇa pratīyamānatvānnaiva dravyaguṇayoragnidhūmayoriva bhedapratītirasti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3194: paṭasya tu guṇāḥ śuklatvādayaḥ paṭadeśā abhyupagamyante na tantudeśāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3195: tathācāhuḥ - 'dravyāṇi dravyāntaramārabhante guṇāśca guṇāntaram' (vai. sū. 1.1.10) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3197: tantugatāśca guṇāḥ śuklādayaḥ kāryadravye paṭe śuklādiguṇāntaramārabhanta iti hi te 'bhyupagacchanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3202: yutasiddhayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ saṃyogo 'pyutasiddhayostu samavāya ityayamabhyupagamo mṛṣaiva teṣāṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3204: athānyatarāpekṣa evāyamabhyupagamaḥ syādayutasiddhasya kāryasya kāraṇena saṃbandhaḥ samavāya iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:3205: evamapi prāgsiddhasyālabdhātmakasya kāryasya kāraṇena saṃbandho nopapadyate dvayāyattatvātsaṃbandhasya /
GSP33brssgo2u:3207: prākkāraṇasaṃbandhātkāryasya siddhāvabhyupagamyamānāyāmayutasiddhyabhāvātkāryakāraṇayoḥ saṃyogavibhāgau na vidyete itīdaṃ duruktaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3208_1: saṃyoga evābhyupagamyate na samavāya evaṃ kāraṇadravyeṇāpi saṃbandhaḥ saṃyoga eva syānna samavāyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3209: nāpi saṃyogasya samavāyasya vā saṃbandhavyatirekeṇāstitve kiñcitpramāṇamasti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3213: yathaiko 'pi san devadatto loke svarūpaṃ saṃbandhirūpaṃ cāpekṣyānekaśabdapratyayabhāgbhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:3214: manuṣyo brāhmaṇaḥ śrotriyo vadānyo bālo yuvā sthaviraḥ pitā putraḥ pautro bhrātā jāmāteti,
GSP33brssgo2u:3225: iyānevāvidyamāno viruddho 'viruddho vārthaḥ kalpanīyo nāto 'dhika iti niyamahetvabhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3227: naca vaiśeṣikaiḥ kalpitebhyaḥ ṣaḍbhyaḥ padārthebhyo 'nye 'dhikāḥ śataṃ sahasraṃ vārthā na kalpayitavyā iti nivārako heturasti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3229: kaścitkṛpāluḥ prāṇināṃ duḥkhabahulaṃ saṃsāra eva mābhūditi kalpayet /
GSP33brssgo2u:3230: anyo vā vyasanī muktānāmapi punarutpattiṃ kalpayet /
GSP33brssgo2u:3233: dvābhyāṃ paramāṇubhyāṃ niravayavābhyāṃ sāvayavasya dvyaṇukasyākāśeneva saṃśleṣānupapattiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3235: kāryakāraṇadravyayorāśritāśrayabhāvo 'nyathā nopapadyata ityavaśyaṃ kalpyaḥ samavāya iti cet /
GSP33brssgo2u:3242: paramāṇūnāṃ paricchinnatvādyāvatyo diśaḥ ṣaḍaṣṭau daśa vā tāvadbhiravayavaiḥ sāvayavāste syuḥ sāvayavatvādanityāśceti nityatvaniravayavatvābhyupagamo bādhyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:3243: yāṃstvaṃ digbhedabhedino 'vayavānkalpayasi ta eva paramāṇava iti cet /
GSP33brssgo2u:3246: yathā pṛthivī dvyaṇukādyapekṣayā sthūlatamā vastubhūtāpi vinaśyati,
GSP33brssgo2u:3247: tataḥ sūkṣmaṃ sūkṣmataraṃ ca pṛthivyekajātīyakaṃ vinaśyati,
GSP33brssgo2u:3273: nityaḥ saṃbandhaḥ samavāya iti bhinnāni lakṣaṇāni /
GSP33brssgo2u:3284: abhede dravyaṃ guṇa iti śabdapratyayabhedaḥ kathaṃ, tatrāha-dravyamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3287: astu guṇādīnāṃ dravyatādātmyamiti vadantaṃ tārkikamanyaṃ pratyāha-tathā satīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3293: tathāpi tatkāryatvaṃ tadadhīnatvaṃ matvā vyabhicāraṃ śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3295: tathāpi tādātmyena pratīyamānatvasya hetorvivakṣitatvānna vyabhicāra ityāśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3299: śauklyasya paṭaniṣṭhatvāt paṭasya tantudeśatvāt paṭaśauklyayorapṛthagdeśatvābhāvācchuklaḥ paṭa iti sāmānādhikaraṇyapratītirna syādityādyaṃ dūṣayati-apṛthagdeśatva iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3303: evaṃ ṣaṭpadārthā atyantabhinnā iti siddhānto 'nubhavavirodhena dūṣitaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3308: kāraṇasya pṛthaksiddhatve 'kāryamapṛthaksiddhamityuktamupetya saṃbandho 'siddhasya siddhasya veti vikalpyādyaṃ dvitīyaṃ śaṅkate-siddhaṃ bhūtveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3309: satoraprāptayoḥ prāptiḥ saṃyoga ityabhyupagamāttantupaṭayorapi saṃyogāpattirityapasiddhāntaḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3311: kiñca saṃbandhasyāpi saṃbandhe 'navasthānādasaṃbaddhasyāniyāmakatvāt saṃbandho 'pi durnirūpa ityāha-nāpīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3313: kalpitabhedasādhane siddhasādhanatā, vastubhedasādhane tu vyabhicāra iti samādhatte-na /
GSP33brssgo2u:3318: vilakṣaṇaśabdadhīgamyatvādityupalabdhighaṭitena-lakṣaṇena siṅgena prāptasya vastvantarasya saṃyogādeḥ saṃbandhivyatirekeṇānupalabdherabhāvo niścīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3321: saṃbandhasya saṃbandhyabhede saṃbandhinaḥ sadā sattvātsarvadā saṃbandhabuddhiprasaṅga iti śaṅkāṃ niṣedhati-nāpīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3322: parāpekṣayā nairantaryāvasthāyāmaṅgulyoḥ rūparūpiṇośca saṃbandhidhīḥ na svata ityuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3324: saṃpratyadṛṣṭavadātmanāṇūnāṃ saṃyogo 'ṇuṣu kriyāhetuḥ ātmamanoḥ saṃyogo buddhyādyasamavāyikāraṇaṃ nirasyate-tathāṇvātmeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3337: nanu dvyaṇukasyāsamavetatve tadāśritatvaṃ na syāt, saṃbandhaṃ vinā tadayogāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3345_1: 'vayavāstvayocyante ta eva mama paramāṇavaste 'pi sāvayavāścet tadavayavā eveti evaṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:3345_2: yataḥ paraṃ na vibhāgaḥ sa eva niravayavaḥ paramāṇuriti śaṅkati-yāṃstvamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3348: ayamarthaḥ-yatsavātmanāvibhāgāyogyaṃ vastu sa paramāṇuriti yadyucyeta tarhi brahmaṇa eva paramāṇusaṃjñā kṛtā syāt,
GSP33brssgo2u:3350: yadi pṛthivyādijātīyo 'lpaparimāṇaviśrāntibhūmiryaḥ sa paramāṇurityucyeta tarhi tasya na mūlakāraṇatvaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3352: naca hetvasiddhiḥ, aṇavo vināśinaḥ, pṛthivyādijātīyatvāt, ghaṭavaditi sādhanāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:3353: saṃprati niravayavadravyasya nāśahetvabhāvādātmavadavināśa ityāśaṅkya pūrvoktaṃ parihāraṃ smārayati-vinaśyanta ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3370: naca ta eva truṭināmāno jagaddhateva iti vācyam, pṛthivītvādinā sāvayavatvānityatvayoranumānāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3388: tatra te sarvāstitvavādino bāhyamāntaraṃ ca vastvabhyupagacchanti bhūtaṃ bhautikaṃ ca cittaṃ caittaṃ ca,
GSP33brssgo2u:3392: catuṣṭaye ca pṛthivyādiparamāṇavaḥ svarasnehoṣṇasvabhāvāste pṛthivyādibhāvena saṃhanyanta iti manyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:3400: anyasya ca kasyaciccetanasya bhoktuḥ praśāsiturvā sthirasya saṃhanturanabhyupagamāt nirapekṣapravṛttyabhyupagame ca pravṛttyanuparamaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3406: FN: bhūte bhautikaṃ bāhyam, cittaṃ caittaṃ ca kāmādyantaramiti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3419: parimāṇabhedena dehāderāśutaravināśāṅgīkārādardhavaināśiko vaiśeṣikastasya nirāsānantaraṃ sarvakṣaṇikavādī buddhistho nirasyata iti prasaṅgasaṃgatimāha-vaiśeṣiketi /
GSP33brssgo2u:3420: 'nābhāva upalabdheḥ'iti nirasanīyasiddhāntādatra nirasyasiddhāntasya bhedaṃ vaktuṃ tatsiddhāntaṃ vibhajate-sa ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3425: sautrāntiko vaibhāṣiko yogācārī mādhyamikaśceti catvāraḥ śiṣyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3426: teṣvādyayorbāhyārthānāṃ parokṣatvāparokṣatvavivāde 'pyastitvasaṃpratipattestayoḥ siddhāntamekīkṛtya nirasyata ityāha-tatra ye sarvāstitveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3427: bhūtaṃ bhautikaṃ bāhyaṃ, cittaṃ caittaṃ ca kāmādyāntaramiti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3428: tatra saṃdihyate kiṃ mānamūlo bhrāntimūlo vāyaṃ siddhānta iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3429: tatra pramāṇamūla iti pūrvapakṣayan siddhāntaṃ tadīyaṃ darśayati-tatra bhūtamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3430: sthiraḥ prapañco brahmahetuka iti vedāntasiddhāntasya mānamūlakṣaṇikasiddhāntavirodhādasiddhiḥ pūrvapakṣe phalaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3432: pṛthivyādibhūtacatuṣṭayaṃ viṣayendriyātmakaṃ bhautikaṃ ca paramāṇusamudāya eva nāvayavyantaramiti matvā paramāṇūn vibhajate-catuṣṭaye ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3449: yathā vidyuditi teṣāṃ kṣaṇikatvamiti mānamūlo 'yaṃ siddhānta iti prāpte siddhāntasūtraṃ yojayati-yo 'yamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3450: sargādau paramāṇūnāṃ ca skandhānāṃ ca svataḥsaṃghātastāvanna saṃbhavati, acetanatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3452: saṃghāte dehākāre jāte vijñānaṃ vijñāne jāte saṃghāta ityanyonyāśrayāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3453: naca kṣaṇikavijñānādanyaḥ kaścijjīva īśvaro vā tvayābhyupagamyate yaḥ saṃghātakartā bhavet /
GSP33brssgo2u:3454: naca kartāramanapekṣyāṇavaḥ skandhāśca svayameva saṃghātārthaṃ pravartanta iti vācyam,
GSP33brssgo2u:3457: āśerate 'smin rāgādaya ityāśayaḥ saṃtānaḥ, sa kiṃ saṃtānibhyo 'nyo vijñānibhyo 'nyo 'nanyo vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3461: kṣaṇikasya janmātiriktavyāpāro nāsti, tasmāttasya paramāṇvādimelanārthaṃ pravṛttiranupapannā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3463: etenānanyaḥ saṃtāna iti pakṣo nirastaḥ, kṣaṇikasya melakatvānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3469: yadyapi bhoktā praśāsitā vā kaściccetanaḥ saṃhantā sthiro nābhyupagamyate tathāpyavidyādīnāmitaretarakāraṇatvādupapadyate lokayātrā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3471_0: te cāvidyādayo 'vidyā saṃskāro vijñānaṃ nāma rūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśā vedanā tṛṣṇā
GSP33brssgo2u:3471_1: upādānaṃ bhavo jātirjarā maraṇaṃ śokaḥ paridevanā duḥkhaṃ durmanastetyevañjātīyakā
GSP33brssgo2u:3471_2: itaretarahetukāḥ saugate samaye kvacitsaṃkṣiptā nirdiṣṭāḥ kvacitprapañcitāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3473: tadevamavidyādikalāpe parasparanimittanaimittikabhāvena ghaṭīyantravadaniśamāvartamāner'thākṣipta upapannaḥ saṃghāta iti cet /
GSP33brssgo2u:3479: yata itaretarapratyayatve 'pyavidyādīnāṃ pūrvapūrvamuttarottarasyotpattimātranimittaṃ bhavedbhavenna tu saṃghātotpatteḥ kiñcinnimittaṃ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:3481: atrocyate- yadi tāvadayamabhiprāyo 'vidyādayaḥ saṃghātamantareṇātmānamalabhamānā apekṣante saṃghātamiti,
GSP33brssgo2u:3483: tacca nityeṣvapyaṇuṣvabhyupagamyamāneṣvāśrayāśrayibhūteṣu ca bhokteṣu satsu na saṃbhavatītyuktaṃ vaiśeṣikaparīkṣāyām /
GSP33brssgo2u:3484: kimaṅga punaḥ kṣaṇikeṣvapyaṇuṣu bhoktṛrahiteṣvāśrayiśūnyeṣu vābhyupagamyamāneṣu saṃbhavet /
GSP33brssgo2u:3487: atha manyase saṃghātā evānādau saṃsāre saṃtatyānuvartante tadāśrayāścāvidyādaya iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:3492: aniyamābhyupagame 'pi manuṣyapudgalaḥ kadācitkṣaṇena hastī bhūtvā devo vā punarmanuṣyo vā bhavediti prāpnuyāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3494: apica yadbhogārthaḥ saṃghātaḥ syātsa nāsti sthiro bhokteti tavābhyupagamaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3495: tataśca bhogo bhogārtha eva sa nānyena prārthanīyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3496: tathā mokṣo mokṣārthaṃ eveti mumukṣuṇā nānyena bhavitavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3499: tasmāditaretarotpattimātranimittatvamavidyādīnāṃ yadi bhavedbhavatu nāma natu saṃghātaḥ siddhyet /
GSP33brssgo2u:3502: FN: kāryaṃ prati ayate gacchatīti pratyayaḥ kāraṇam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3503: vijñānaṃ pṛthivyādicatuṣṭayaṃ rūpaṃ ceti ṣaḍāyatanāni yasyendriyajātasya tatṣaḍāyatanam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3517: vijñānaṃ pṛthivyādicatuṣṭayaṃ rūpaṃ ceti ṣaḍāyatanāni yasyendriyajātasya tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3531: na kevalaṃ sugatānāmevāvidyādayaḥ saṃmatāḥ, kintu sarvavādināmapītyāha-sarveṣāmiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3532: avidyādihetukā janmādayo janmādihetukāścāvidyādaya iti mitho hetuhetumadbhāvādarthātsaṃghātasiddhiriti śaṅkāmupasaṃharati-tadevamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3534: avidyādīnāmuttarottarahetutvamaṅgīkṛtya saṃghātahetvabhāvāt saṃghāto na syādityukte pūrvoktaṃ smārayati-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3535: kimavidyādayaḥ saṃghātasya gamakā utotpādakā iti vikalpyādye saṃghātasyotpādakaṃ kiñcidvācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3539_0: yadā sthireṣvaṇuṣu saṃghātayogyeṣu kartṛṣu cādṛṣṭasahāyeṣu satsu jñānābhāvamātreṇa
GSP33brssgo2u:3544: svābhāvikaḥ khalvayaṃ saṃghātānāṃ hetuhetumadbhāvena pravāho na saṃhantāramapekṣate,
GSP33brssgo2u:3545: pūrvasaṃghātāśrayā avidyādaya uttarasaṃghātapravartakā iti nānyonyāśrayadoṣo 'pītyāśaṅkate-atha manyasa iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3548: kiñca bhoktuḥ kṣaṇikatvapakṣe bhogāpavargavyavahāro 'pi durghaṭa ityāha-api ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3549: yo yadicchati sa tatkāle nāsti cedicchāvyarthā, asti cet kṣaṇikatvabhaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3557: kṣaṇabhaṅgavādino 'yamabhyupagama uttarasminkṣaṇa utpadyamāne pūrvaḥ kṣaṇo nirudhyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3560: atha bhāvabhūtaḥ pariniṣpannāvasthaḥ pūrvakṣaṇa uttarakṣaṇasya heturityabhiprāyastathāpi nopapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:3562: atha bhāva evāsya vyāpāra ityabhiprāyastathāpi naivopapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:3564: svabhāvoparāgābhyupagame ca hetusvabhāvasya phalakālāvasthāyitve sati kṣaṇabhaṅgābhyupagamatyāgaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3565: vinaiva vā svabhāvoparāgeṇa hetu phalabhāvamabhyupagacchataḥ sarvatra tatprāpteratiprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3566: apicotpādanirodhau nāma vastunaḥ svarūpameva vā syātāmavasthāntaraṃ vā vastvantarameva vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3568: yadi tāvadvastunaḥ svarūpamevotpādanirodhau syātāṃ tato vastuśabda utpādanirodhaśabdau ca paryāyāḥ prāpnuyuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3569: asthāsti kaścidviśeṣa iti manyetotpādanirodhaśabdābhyāṃ madhyavartino vastuna ādyantākhye avasthe abhilapyete iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:3573: yadi ca darśanādarśane vastuna utpādanirodhau syātām,
GSP33brssgo2u:3574: evamapi draṣṭṛdharmau tau na vastudharmāviti vastunaḥ śāśvatatvaprasaṅga eva /
GSP33brssgo2u:3579: dvividho hi kāryasamutpādaḥ sugatasaṃmato hetvadhīnaḥ kāraṇasamudāyādhīnaśceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3586: nanu kāryakāle vināśavyāptatve 'pi pūrvakṣaṇe sattvāt kṣaṇikārthasya hetutvamakṣatamiti śaṅkate-ayaṃ bhāveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3588: kiṃ hetorutpattyatiriktaḥ kāryotpādanākhyo vyāpāraḥ, anatirikto vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3591: uktaṃ hi 'bhūtiryeṣāṃ kriyā saiva kārakaṃ saiva cocyata'iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3592: yeṣāṃ kṣaṇikābhāvānāṃ yā bhūtiḥ saiva kriyā kārakaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3593: naṣṭasyāpi nimittattvaṃ syānvopādānatvaṃ, tathā ca mṛdāderghaṭādikālāsattve ghaṭādyanutpattiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3608: athāsatyeva hetau phalotpattiṃ brūyāt, tataḥ pratijñoparodhaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3609: caturvidhānhetūnpratītya cittacaittā utpadyanta itīyaṃ pratijñā hīyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:3611: athottarakṣaṇotpattiryāvattāvadavatiṣṭhate pūrvakṣaṇa iti brūyāttato yaugapadyaṃ hetuphalayoḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3617: viṣayakaraṇasahakārisaṃskārāścaturvidhā hetavastān pratītya prāpya cittaṃ rūpādivijñānaṃ caittāścittātmakāḥ sukhādayaśca jāyanta iti pratijñārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3623: sahetukatvapakṣe 'nvayikāraṇasya mṛdādeḥ kāryasahabhāvāpattyā kṣaṇikatvapratijñāhāniriti sūtraśeṣaṃ vyācaṣṭe-athottarakṣaṇetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3630: apica vaināśikāḥ kalpayanti buddhibodhyaṃ trayādanyatsaṃskṛtaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3633: buddhipūrvakaḥ kila vināśo bhāvānāṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodho nāma bhāṣyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:3641: etau hi pratisaṃkhyāpratisaṃkhyānirodhau saṃtānagocarau vā syātāṃ bhāvagocarau vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3645: nahi bhāvānāṃ niranvayo nirupākhyo vināśaḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:3651: pratīpā pratukūlaḥ saṃkhyā santaṃ bhāvamasantaṃ karomītyevaṃrūpā buddhiḥ pratisaṃkhyā tayā nirodhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3658: pratīpā pratikūlā saṃkhyā santaṃ bhāvamasantaṃ karomītyevaṃrūpā buddhiḥ pratisaṃkhyā,
GSP33brssgo2u:3664: tasmin saṃtāne caramakṣaṇaḥ kṣaṇāntaraṃ karoti vā na vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3706: yenāvaraṇabhāvo viśeṣyate tattarhi vastubhūtamevākāśaṃ manyamānasya saugatasya svābhyupagamavirodhaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:3707_0: saugate hi samaye 'pṛthivī bhagavaḥ kiṃsaṃniścayā' ityasminprativacanapravāhe pṛthivyādīnāmante
GSP33brssgo2u:3707_1: vāyuḥ 'kiṃsaṃniścayaḥ' ityasya praśnasya prativacanaṃ bhavati 'vāyurākāśasaṃniścayaḥ' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3710: apica nirodhadvayamākāśaṃ ca trayamapyetannirūpākhyamavastu nityaṃ ceti vipratiṣiddham /
GSP33brssgo2u:3715: kiṃ samyak niścaya āśrayo 'syā iti kiṃ saṃniścayā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3718: nanvāgamaprāmāṇye vipratipannānsugatānpratyākāśasya vastutvaṃ kathaṃ sidhyatītyata āha-vipratipannāniti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3719: śabdo vastuniṣṭhaḥ guṇatvāt, gandhādivadityanumānādākāśasya vastutvaṃ sidhyati /
GSP33brssgo2u:3722: yathaikaghaṭasattve 'pi ghaṭasāmānyābhāvo nāsti tathaikapakṣisattve 'pi mūrtadravyasāmānyābhāvātmakākāśo nāstyeveti pakṣyantarasaṃcāro na syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3727: kiṃ samyak niśraya āśrayo 'syā iti kiṃsaṃniśrayā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3736: apica vaināśikaḥ sarvasya vastunaḥ kṣaṇikatāmabhyupayannupalabdhurapi kṣaṇikatāmabhyupeyāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3741: kathaṃ hyahamado 'drākṣamidaṃ paśyāmīti ca pūrvottaradarśinyekasminnasati pratyayaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3742: apica darśanasmaraṇayoḥ kartaryekasminpratyakṣaḥ pratyabhijñāpratyayaḥ sarvasya lokasya prasiddho 'hamado 'drākṣamidaṃ paśyāmīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3743: yadi hi tayorbhinnaḥ kartā syāttato 'haṃ smārāmyadrākṣīdanya iti pratīyāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3748: na nāhamityātmano darśanaṃ nirvṛttaṃ nihnute yathāgniranuṣṇo 'prakāśa iti vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3749: tatraivaṃ satyekasya darśanasmaraṇalakṣaṇadvayasaṃbandhe kṣaṇikatvābhyupagamahāniraparihāryā vaināśikasya syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3750_1: pratipattīrā janmana ātmaikakartṛkāḥ pratisaṃdadhānaḥ kathaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgavādī vaināśiko
GSP33brssgo2u:3761: pratyayāntarameva cetsādṛśyaviṣayaṃ syāttenedaṃ sadṛśamiti vākyaprayogo 'narthakaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3763: yadā hi lokaprasiddhaḥ padārthaḥ parīkṣakairna parigṛhyate tadā svapakṣasiddhiḥ parapakṣadoṣo vobhayamapyucyamānaṃ parīkṣakāṇāmātmanaśca yathārthatvena na buddhisaṃtānamārohati /
GSP33brssgo2u:3768: bhavedapi kadācidbāhyavastuni vipralambhasaṃbhavāttadevedaṃ syāttatsadṛśaṃ veti saṃdehaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3769: upalabdhari tu saṃdeho 'pi na kadācidbhavati sa evāhaṃ syāṃ tatsadṛśo veti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3770: ya evāhaṃpūrvedyuradrākṣaṃ sa evāhamadya smarāmīti niścitatadbhāvopalambhāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3774: kṣaṇikatve jñānadvayānusaṃdhānaṃ ca na syādityāha-kathaṃ hyahamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3776: yo 'hamadaḥ pūrvamadrākṣaṃ sa evāhamadya tatsmarāmīti pratyabhijñānākāro draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3780: draṣṭṛsmartrorbhede 'haṃ smarāmi anyo 'drākṣīditi pratītiḥ syādityatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-yatraivamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3782: smarāmyahamanyo 'drākṣīditi pratyayo yatra tatra bhinnameva kartāraṃ loko 'vagacchatītyavivādamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3783: prakṛtapratyabhijñāyāṃ tādṛśabhedapratyayasya bādhakasyādarśanādātmasthāyitvaṃ durvāramityāha-iha tvahamada iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3784: yathāgnerauṣṇyādikaṃ na bādhate kaścittathā nāhamadrākṣamiti pūrvadarśanaṃ na nihnuta ityanena bādhābhāvāt pratyabhijñā prametyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:3785: tathā draṣṭṛsmartroraikye sati sthāyitvaṃ phalitamityāha-tatraivaṃ satīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3789: sādṛśyajñānasya dharmipratiyogijñānādhīnatvāt sthirasya jñāturasattvānna sādṛśyajñānaṃ saṃbhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:3793: kiṃ tarhi kaścideṣa vikalpaḥ svākārameva bāhyatvena viṣayīkurvāṇaḥ kṣaṇāntarāsparśī,
GSP33brssgo2u:3795: atra vaktavyaṃ sādṛśyapratyaye tenedaṃ sadṛśamiti vastutrayaṃ bhāsate na veti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3799: atha bhāsate vastutrayaṃ tacca pratyayābhinnameva na bāhyamiti cet /
GSP33brssgo2u:3803: vastutrayaṃ jñeyaṃ sādṛśyapratyayādbhinnaṃ sarvalokaprasiddhaṃ taccennāṅgīkriyate sthāyidraṣṭṛprasaṅgabhayena,
GSP33brssgo2u:3804: tarhi tattadākārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikavijñānānāṃ mitho vārtānabhijñatvādekasmin dharmiṇi viruddhānekapakṣasphuraṇātmakavipratipattyasaṃbhavāt svapakṣasādhanādivyavahāro lupyeta,
GSP33brssgo2u:3806: tathā ca tenedaṃ sadṛśamiti bāhyārthayorjñānapūrvakaṃ sādṛśyaṃ jānata ātmanaḥ sthāyitvaṃ durvāramityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3812: na cedānīṃ ghaṭa iti pratyakṣamavartamānakālāsattvaṃ ghaṭasya gocarayadvartamānakṣaṇamātrasatvarūpe kṣaṇikatve mānamiti vācyam,
GSP33brssgo2u:3814: naca yatsat tatkṣaṇikamiti vyāptirasti, vidyudāderapi dvitrikṣaṇasthāyitvena dṛṣṭāntābhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3817: kiñca sādṛśyaṃ pratyabhijñāyāṃ doṣayatā nimittaṃ viṣayatayā vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3823: so 'hamiti pratyabhijñāyā bhramatvaṃ nirasya saṃśayatvaṃ nirasyati-bhavediti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3824: jaḍārthe pratyabhijñāte 'pi bādhasaṃbhāvanayā saṃśayaḥ kadācit syānnātmanītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3833: vinaṣṭāddhi kila bījādaṅ kura utpadyate, tathā vinaṣṭātkṣīrāddadhi, mṛtpiṇḍācca ghaṭaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3839: nahi bījādīnāmupamṛditānāṃ yo 'bhāvastasyābhāvasya śaśaviṣāṇādīnāṃ ca niḥsvabhāvatvāviśeṣādabhāvatve kaścidviśeṣo 'sti,
GSP33brssgo2u:3840: yena bījādevāṅ kuro jāyate kṣīrādeva dadhītyevañjātīyakaḥ kāraṇiśeṣaṇādibhyupagamor'thavānsyāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3841: nirviśeṣasya tvabhāvasya kāraṇatvābhyupagame śaśaviṣāṇādibhyo 'pyaṅ kurādayo jāyeran /
GSP33brssgo2u:3843: yadi punarabhāvasyāpi viśeṣo 'bhyupagamyetotpalādīnāmiva nīlatvādistato viśeṣavattvādevābhāvasya bhāvatvamutpalādivatprasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:3847: sarvasya ca vastunaḥ svena svena rūpeṇa bhāvātmanaivopalabhyamānatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3853: yeṣvapi bījādiṣu svarūpopamarde lakṣyate teṣvarapi nāsāvupamṛdyamānā pūrvāvasthottarāvasthāyāḥ kāraṇamabhyupagamyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:3857: paramāṇubhyaśca bhūtabhautikalakṣaṇaḥ samudāya utpadyata ityabhyupagamya punarabhāvādbhāvotpattiṃ kalpayadbhirabhyupagatamapahnuvānairvaināśikaiḥ sarvo loka ākulīkriyate // 26 //
GSP33brssgo2u:3858: abhāvaḥ śaśaviṣāṇavadatyantāsannityaṅgīkṛtya mṛdādināśādasato ghaṭādikaṃ jāyate iti sugatā vadanti,
GSP33brssgo2u:3860: na kevalaṃ balādāpadyate kintu svayaṃ darśayanti ca /
GSP33brssgo2u:3866: nityasya niratiśayasya kāryaśaktatve tatkāryāṇi sarvāṇyekasminneva kṣaṇe syuḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3889: naca śaktasya sahakāryapekṣā na yukteti vācyaṃ, yato 'śaktasyāpi nāpekṣetyasahakāri viśvaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3896: na hyarthakriyākāritvameva sattvam, asatastadayogena sattvasya tato bhedāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3922: tasmādbhrāntimūlena kṣaṇikabāhyārthavādena kūṭasthanityabrahmasamanvayasya na virodha iti siddham //27//
GSP33brssgo2u:3928: evaṃ bāhyārtavādamāśritya samudāyāprāptyādiṣu dūṣaṇeṣūdbhāviteṣu vijñānavādī bauddha idānīṃ pratyavatiṣṭhite /
GSP33brssgo2u:3929: keṣāñcitkila bāhye vastunyabhiniveśamālakṣya tadanurodhena bāhyārthavādaprakriyeyaṃ virocitā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3932: tasmiṃśca vijñānavāde buddhyārūḍhena rūpeṇāntastha eva pramāṇaprameyavyavahāraḥ sarva upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:3934: kathaṃ punaravagamyate 'ntastha evāyaṃ sarvavyavahāro na vijñānavyatirikto bāhyor'tho 'stīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3936: sa hi bāhyortho 'bhyupagamyamānaḥ paramāṇavo vā syustatsamūhā vā stambhādayaḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3938: nāpi tatsamūhāḥ stambhādayaḥ, teṣāṃ paramāṇubhyo 'nyatvānanyatvābhyāṃ nirūpayitumaśakyatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3940: apicānubhāvamātreṇa sādhāraṇātmano jñānasya jāyamānasya yo 'yaṃ prativiṣayaṃ pakṣapātaḥ stambhajñānaṃ kuḍyajñānaṃ ghaṭajñānaṃ paṭajñānamiti,
GSP33brssgo2u:3953: anādau hi saṃsāre bījāṅ kuravadvijñānānāṃ vāsanānāṃ cānyonyanimittanaimittikabhāvena vaicitryaṃ na vipratiṣidhyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:3962: upalabhyate hi pratipratyayaṃ bāhyor'thaḥ stambhaḥ kuḍyaṃ ghaṭaḥ paṭa iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3964: yathā hi kaścidbhuñjāno bhujitasādhyāyāṃ tṛptau svayamanubhūyamānāyāmevaṃ brūyānnāhaṃ bhuñje na vā tṛpyāmīti,
GSP33brssgo2u:3965: tadvadindriyasaṃnikarṣeṇa svayamupalabhamāna eva bāhyamarthaṃ nāhamupalabhe naca so 'stīti bruvankathamupādeyavacanaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3966: nanu nāhamahaṃ bravīmi na kañcidarthamupalabha iti kiṃ tūpalabdhivyatiriktaṃ nopalabha iti bravīmi /
GSP33brssgo2u:3971: upalabdhiviṣayatvenaiva tu stambhakuḍyādīnsarve laukikā upalabhante yatpratyācakṣāṇā api bāhyārthameva vyācakṣate yadantarjñeyarūpaṃ tadbahirvadavabhāsata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3972: te 'pi sarvalokaprasiddhāṃ bahiravabhāsamānāṃ saṃvidaṃ pratilabhamānāḥ pratyākhyātukāmāśca bāhyamarthaṃ bahirvadati vatkāraṃ kurvanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3975: tasmādyathānubhavaṃ tattvamabhyupagacchadbhirbahirevāvabhāsata iti yuktamabhyupagantuṃ natu bahirvadavabhāsata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3977: nāyaṃ sādhuradhyavasāyo yataḥ pramāṇapravṛttyapravṛttipūrvakau saṃbavāsaṃbhavāvavadhāryete na punaḥ saṃbhavāsaṃbhavapūrvike pramāṇapravṛttyapravṛttī /
GSP33brssgo2u:3979: yattu na kenacidapi pramāṇenopalabhyate tanna saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:3980: iha tu yathāsvaṃ sarvaireva pramāṇairbāhyor'tha upalabhyamānaḥ kathaṃ vyatirekāvyatirekādivikalpairna saṃbhavatītyucyetopalabdhereva /
GSP33brssgo2u:3984: ata eva sahopalambhaniyamo 'pi pratyayaviṣayayorupāyopeyabhāvahetuko nābhedahetuka ityabyupagantavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3985: apica ghaṭajñānaṃ paṭajñānamiti viśeṣaṇayoreva ghaṭapaṭayorbhedo na viśeṣyasya jñānasya /
GSP33brssgo2u:3986: dvābhyāṃ ca bheda etasya siddho bhavatyekasmācca dvayoḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3989: atrāpi hi viśeṣyayoreva darśanasmaraṇayorbhedo na viśeṣaṇas ghaṭasya /
GSP33brssgo2u:3990: yathā kṣīragandhaḥ kṣīrarasa iti viśeṣyayoreva gandharasayorbhedo na viśeṣaṇasya kṣīrasya tadvat /
GSP33brssgo2u:3994: vijñānaṃ vijñānamityabhyupagacchatā bāhyorthaḥ stambhaḥ kuḍyamityevañjātīyakaḥ tasmānnābhyupagamyata eveti yuktamabhyupagantum /
GSP33brssgo2u:3995: atha vijñānaṃ prakāśātmakatvātpradīpavatsvayamevānubhūyate na tathā bāhyo 'pyartha iti cet /
GSP33brssgo2u:3997: aviruddhaṃ tu lokaprasiddhaṃ svātmavyatiriktena vijñānena bāhyor'thonubhūyata iti necchāsyaho pāṇḍityaṃ mahaddarśitam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3999: nanu vijñānasya svarūpavyatiriktagrāhyatve tadapyanena grāhyaṃ tadapyanyenetyanavasthā prāpnoti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4000: apica pradīpavadavabhāsātmakatvājjñānasya jñānāntaraṃ kalpayataḥ samatvādavabhāsyāvabhāsakabhāvānupapatteḥ kalpanānarthakyamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4006: pradīpavadvijñānamavabhāsakāntaranirapekṣaṃ svayameva prathata iti bruvatāpramāṇagamyaṃ vijñānamanavagantṛkamityuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4008: bāḍhamevam, anubhavarūpatvāttu vijñānasyeṣṭo naḥ pakṣastvayānujñāyata iti cet /
GSP33brssgo2u:4012: sākṣiṇo 'vagantuḥ svayaṃsiddhatāmupakṣipatā svayaṃ prathate vijñānamityeṣa eva mama pakṣastvayā vācoyuktyantareṇāśrita iti cet /
GSP33brssgo2u:4020_0: akhaṇḍanirviśeṣaṃ brahma vijñānaṃ bāhyārthopādānaṃ vadatāṃ vedāntānāṃ bhinnaṃ sākāraṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:4020_1: kṣaṇikaṃ vijñānaṃ na tato 'nyor'tho 'stīti yogācāramatena virudhyate na veti tanmatasya
GSP33brssgo2u:4022_1: iti vadan vijñānavādinaḥ sugatābhiprāyajñatvena mandādhikāribhyo bāhyārthavādibhyaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:4030: mukhya eva bhedaḥ kiṃ na syādata āha-satyapīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4032: ato buddhyārūḍhākāra eva prameyaṃ na bāhyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4039: jātiguṇakarmaṇāṃ dharmiṇaḥ sakāśādabhede 'tyantabhede vā dharmivaddharmyantaravacca na dharmadharmibhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4040: bhedābhedau ca viruddhāviti na santi jātyādyarthā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4045: jñānārthayovāstavabhede 'pi sahopalambhanaṃ syāt, graihyagrāhakabhāvādityata āha-na caitaditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:4047: kiñca jāgradvijñānaṃ na bāhyālambanaṃ, vijñānatvāt, svapnādijñānavadityāha-svapneti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4053: ubhayavādisaṃmatatvācca vāsanā eva jñānavaicitryahetavo na bāhyārthā ityāha-apiceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4054: kṣaṇikavijñānamātravādasya mānamūlatvāttena nityavijñānavādo virudhyata iti prāpte siddhāntasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-nābhāva ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:4065: asattvaṃ vā asattvaniścayo vā ayuktatvaṃ vā utkaṭakoṭikasaṃśayātmakasaṃbhavasyābhāvo vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:4070: asaṃbhavo 'sattvaniścayaḥ pramāṇābhāvādhīno na vaiparītyamiti vyavasthāmeva sphuṭayati-yaddhīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4071: uktavyavasthāyāḥ phalaṃ bāhyārthasya pratyakṣādibhiḥ saṃbhavaṃ vadanneva tṛtīyaṃ dūṣayati-iheti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4074: na hyasthūlasyaikasya vijñānasya sthūlānekasamūhālambanasya viṣayābhedo yuktaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:4084: ata eva sahopalambhaniyamo 'pi nābhedasādhaka ityāha-ata eveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4088: naca jñānasya kṣaṇikatvāt svabhinnagrāhyasaṃbandhāyogaḥ, sthāyitvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4089: vijñānamanekārthebhyo bhinnam, ekatvāt, gotvavaditi satpratipakṣamāha-api ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4096: tathā ca tayorbhedapratijñā na yuktā, dharmipratiyoginormithaḥ pareṇa cāgraheṇa bhedagrahāyogāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4098: evaṃ pakṣasādhyahetudṛṣṭāntabhedābhāve idaṃ kṣaṇikamasaditi pratijñā na yuktā /
GSP33brssgo2u:4101: sarvānekārthānāṃ jñānamātratve mithaḥ pareṇavā durjñānatvāt uttaranīlajñānaṃ vāsyaṃ pūrvanīlajñānaṃ vāsakamiti pratijñā na yuktā,
GSP33brssgo2u:4109: ajñānenāsya bandho jñānenāsya mokṣa iti ca pratijñā bahvarthajñānasādhyā /
GSP33brssgo2u:4110: ādipadena sāmānyata iṣṭaṃ grāhyamaniṣṭaṃ tyājyamiti śiṣyahitepadeśo 'nekajñānasādhyo gṛhītaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4114: svaviṣayatvādvijñānaṃ svīkriyate nārthaḥ paragrāhyatvāditi śaṅkate-atha vijñānamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4115: viruddhaṃ svīkṛtyāviruddhaṃ tyajatā bauddhatanayena mauḍhyaṃ darśitamityāha-atyanteti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4118: naca svaviṣayatvamātraṃ svavedyatvamiti vācyam, abhede viṣayaviṣayitvasyāpyasaṃbhavāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4120: anavasthā ca sāmyaṃ ceti doṣadvayaṃ pariharati-tadubhayamapīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4121: anityajñānasya janmādimatvena ghaṭavajjaḍasya svena svīyajanmādigrahāyogādasti grāhakākāṅkṣā,
GSP33brssgo2u:4129: svayaṃ prathata iti bruvatā jñātṛśūnyatvaṃ coktā syāt,
GSP33brssgo2u:4132: vijñānasya svānyajñātṛśūnyatvamiṣṭameva tvayāpādyate na cāsattvāpattiḥ jñātrabhāvāditi vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:4138: dvitīye vijñānavāda eva bhaṅgyantareṇoktaḥ syāditiśaṅkate-sākṣiṇa iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4147: yaduktaṃ bāhyārthapalāyinā svapnādipratyayavajijāgaritagocarā api stambhādipratyayā vinaiva bāhyenārthena bhaveyuḥ pratyayatvāviśeṣāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:4155: bādhyate hi svapnopalabdhaṃ vastu pratibuddhasya mithyā mayopalabdho mahājanasamāgama iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:4156: nahyasti mama mahājanasamāgamo nidrālagnaṃ tu me mano babhūva tenaiṣā bhrāntirudbabhūveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4158: naivaṃ jāgaritopalabdhaṃ vastu stambhādikaṃ kasyāñcidapyavasthāyāṃ bādhyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:4161: smṛtyupalabdhayośca pratyakṣamantaraṃ svayamanubhūyater'thaviprayogasaṃyogātmakamiṣṭaṃ putraṃ smarāmi nopalabha upalabdhumicchāmīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4162: tatraivaṃsati na śakyate vaktuṃ mithyā jāgaritopalabdhirūpalabdhitvātsvapnopalabdhivadityubhayorantaraṃ svayamanubhavatā /
GSP33brssgo2u:4165: naca yo yasya svato dharmo na saṃbhavati so 'nyasya sādharmyāttasya saṃbhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssgo2u:4174: kimatra nirviṣayatvaṃ sādhyamuta pāramārthikaviṣayaśūnyatvam, athavā vyāvahārikaviṣayaśūnyatvam /
GSP33brssgo2u:4181: kiñca pramāṇajānubhava upalabdhiḥ pakṣo 'pramāṇajaṃ svapnajñānaṃ dṛṣṭānta iti vaidharmyāntaram /
GSP33brssgo2u:4184: asaṃbandhaścāvartamānaśca smṛterartho viṣaya iti nirālambanatvamapyasyāḥ kadācidbhavet,
GSP33brssgo2u:4191: vastuto ghaṭādyanubhavasya nirālambanatvaṃ dharmo di syāttadā kiṃ dṛṣṭāntāgraheṇa,
GSP33brssgo2u:4194: yadi na vastuto dharmo 'sti tadā kiṃ dṛṣṭāntena, bādhitasya dṛṣṭāntasahasreṇāpi duḥsādhyatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4195: ataḥ svato nirālambanatvoktau sālambanatvānubhavabādhabhiyā tvayānumātumārabdhaṃ tathāpi bādho na muñcatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4204: arthopalabdhinimittā hi pratyarthaṃ nānārūpā vāsanā bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4205: anupalabhyamāneṣu tvartheṣu kiṃnimittā vicitrā vāsanā bhaveyuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4220: bījādaṅkuro dṛṣṭa ityadṛṣṭe 'pi tajjātīyayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvakalpanā yuktā,
GSP33brssgo2u:4222: nanu nirapekṣavāsanānāṃ sattve dhīvaicitryamasattve tu neti svapne dṛṣṭamiti samūlānavasthetyata āha-yāviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4226_0: abhinavārthopalabdhivaicitryasya vāsanāṃ vināpi bhāvena vyatirekavyabhicārācca na
GSP33brssgo2u:4226_1: kvāpi vāsanāmātrakṛtaṃ dhīvaicitryaṃ kintvarthānubhave sati vāsanāsati netyanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:4227: yaḥ saṃskāraḥ sa sāśrayo loke dṛṣṭaḥ yathā vegādiriṣvādyāśrayaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:4233: yadapyālayavijñānaṃ nāma vāsanāśrayatvena parikalpitaṃ tadapi kṣaṇikatvābhyupagamādanavasthitasvarūpaṃ satpravṛttivijñānavanna vāsanānāmadhikaraṇaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo2u:4237_0: apica vijñānavāde 'pi kṣaṇikatvābhyupagamasya samānatvādyāni bāhyārthavāde kṣaṇikatvanibandhanāni
GSP33brssgo2u:4238: evametau dvāvapi vaināśikapakṣau nirākṛtau bāhyārthavādipakṣo vijñānavādipakṣaśca /
GSP33brssgo2u:4239: śūnyavādipakṣastu sarvapramāṇavipratiṣiddha iti tannirākaraṇāya nādaraḥ kriyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:4242: FN: nādaraḥ kriyate sūtrāntarāṇi na racyanta etānyevāvṛttyā yojayante /
GSP33brssgo2u:4249: savikāraḥ kūṭastho vā sthāyyātmā yadi nāsti tadā saṃtānasyāvastutvāddeśādyapekṣayā yadvāsanānāmādhānaṃ nikṣepo ye ca smṛtipratyabhijñe yaśca tanmūlo vyavahāraḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:4254: jñānajñeyātmakasya sarvasya sattvāsattvābhyāṃ vicārāsahatvācchūnyatāvaśiṣyata iti mādhyamikapakṣasyāpi mānamūlatvamāśaṅkaya sūtrakāraḥ kimiti na nirācakāretyata āha-śūnyeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4264: kiñca niradhiṣṭhānaniṣedhāyogādadhiṣṭhānameva tattvaṃ vācyaṃ, tasya tvante na bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4278: sarvaprakāreṇa yathāyathāyaṃ vaināśikasamaya upapattimattvāya parīkṣyate tathātathā sikatākūpavadvidīryata eva /
GSP33brssgo2u:4282: pradveṣo vā prajāsu viruddhārthapratipattyā vimuhyeyurimāḥ prajā iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4289: ato bhrāntyekamūlasugatasiddhāntena vedāntasiddhāntasya na virodha iti siddham //32//
GSP33brssgo2u:4297: sapta caiṣāṃ padārthāḥ saṃmatā jīvājīvāsravasaṃvaranirjarabandhamokṣā nāma /
GSP33brssgo2u:4300: tayorimamaparaṃ prapañcamācakṣate pañcāstikāyā nāma- jīvāstikāyaḥ pudgalāstikāyo dharmāstikāyo 'dharmāstikāya ākāśāstikāyaśceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4314: ya ete saptapadārthā nirdhāritā etāvanta evaṃrūpāśceti te tathaiva vā syurnaiva vā tathā syuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4315: itarathā hi tathā vā syuratathā vetyanirdhāritarūpaṃ jñānaṃ saṃśayajñānavadapramāṇameva syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4316: nanvanekātmakaṃ vastviti nirdhāritarūpameva jñānamutpadyamānaṃ saṃśayajñānavannāpramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo2u:4318: niraṅ kuśaṃ hyanekāntatvaṃ sarvavastuṣu pratijānānasya nirdhāraṇasyāpi vastutvaviśeṣātsyāditi syānavnāstītyādivikalpopanipātādinirdhāraṇātmakataiva syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4319: evaṃ nirdhārayiturnirdhāraṇaphalasya ca syātpakṣe 'stitā syācca pakṣe nāstīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4322: aikāntikaphalatvanirdhāraṇe hi sati tatsādhanānuṣṭhānāya sarvo loko 'nākulaḥ pravartate nānyathā /
GSP33brssgo2u:4324: tathā pañcānāmastikāyānāṃ pañcatvasaṃkhyāsti vā nāsti veti vikalpyamānā syāttāvadekasminpakṣe,
GSP33brssgo2u:4325: pakṣāntare tu na syādityato nyūnasaṃkhyātvamadhikasaṃkhyātvaṃ vā prāpnuyāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4330: tathā tadavadhāraṇaphalaṃ samyagdarśanamasti vā nāsti vā,
GSP33brssgo2u:4331: evaṃ tadviparītamasamyagdarśanamapyasti vā nāsti veti pralapanmattonmattapakṣasyaiva syānna pratyāyitavyapakṣasya /
GSP33brssgo2u:4332: svargāpavargayośca pakṣe bhāvaḥ pakṣe cābhāvastathā pakṣe nityatā pakṣe cānityatetyanavadhāraṇāyāṃ pravṛttyanupapattiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4336: yattu pudgalasaṃjñakebhyo 'ṇubhyaḥ saṃgātāḥ saṃbhavantīti kalpayanti tatpūrveṇaivāṇuvādanirākaraṇena nirākṛtaṃ bhavatītyato na pṛthaktannirākaraṇāya prayatyate // 33 //
GSP33brssgo2u:4347: saptānāṃstitvādīnāṃ bhaṅgānāṃ samāhāraḥ saptabhaṅgī tasyā nayo nyāyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4349: muktakacchamate niraste muktāmbarāṇāṃ mataṃ buddhisthaṃ bhavati tannirasyata iti prasaṅgasaṅgatimāha-nirasta iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4350_0: ekarūpaṃ brahmeti vaidikasiddhāntasyānaikāntavādena virodho 'sti na veti tadvādasya
GSP33brssgo2u:4368: pudgalāstikāyaḥ ṣoḍhā-pṛthivyādīni catvāri bhūtāni, sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4370: ākāśāstikāyo dvividhaḥ-lokākāśaḥ sāṃsārikaḥ, alokākāśo muktāśraya iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4372: tatra jñānāvaraṇīyaṃ darśanāvaraṇīyaṃ mohanīyamantarāyaṃ ceti ghātikarmāṇi /
GSP33brssgo2u:4378: athāghātīni catvāri karmāṇi vedanīyaṃ nāmikaṃ gotrikamāyuṣkamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4381: ahamatra bhavato deśikasyārhataḥ śiṣyavaṃśe praviṣṭo 'smītyabhimāno gotrikam,
GSP33brssgo2u:4385: śaktasya tasya dravībhāvātmakakalalāvasthāyā budbudāvasthāyāścārambhakaḥ kriyāviśeṣo nāmikaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:4393: saptānāmastitvādīnāṃ bhaṅgānāṃ samāhāraḥ saptabhaṅgī, tasyā nayo nyāyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4394: ghaṭāderhi sarvātmanā sadaikarūpatve prāpyātmanāpyastyeva sa iti tatprāptaye yatno na syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4404: krameṇobhayavāñchāyāṃ syādasti ca nāsti ceti tṛtīyo bhaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4405: yugapadubhayavāñchāyāmasti nāstīti śabdadvayasya sakṛdvakttumaśakyatvāt syādavaktavya iti caturtho bhaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4408: tṛtīyacaturthecchāyāṃ syādasti cāvaktavyaśceti saptamo bhaṅga iti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4409: evamekatvamanekatvaṃ ceti dvayamādāya syādekaḥ syādeko 'nekaśca syādavaktavyaḥ syādeko vaktavyaḥ syādaneko 'vaktavyaḥ syādeko 'nekaścāvaktavyaśceti,
GSP33brssgo2u:4412: ekarūpatve sarvaṃ sarvatra sarvadāstyeveti vyavahāravilopāpattiḥ syāt,
GSP33brssgo2u:4414: yadasti tat sarvatra sarvadāstyeva yathā brahmātmā /
GSP33brssgo2u:4415: na caivaṃ tatprāptaye yatno na syāditi vācyam, aprāptibhrāntyā yatnasaṃbhavāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4420: nahi dūrasthagrāmasya prāpterasattve grāmo 'pyasan bhavati, prāpyāsattve prāptiyatnānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4426: kiñca jīvādipadārthānāṃ saptatvaṃ jīvatvādirūpaṃ cāstyeva nāstyeveti ca niyatamutāniyatam /
GSP33brssgo2u:4432: dvitīye tasya saṃśayatvaṃ syādityāha-neti brūma iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4435: ityevaṃ sarvatrānirdhāraṇe satyupadeśo niṣkampapravṛttiśca na syādityāha-evaṃsatīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4437: yaduktamavaktavyatvaṃ tat kiṃ kenāpi śabdenāvācyatvamuta sakṛdanekaśabdāvācyatvam /
GSP33brssgo2u:4442: na cārthasya yugapadviruddhadharmavāñchāyāṃ vakturmūkatvamātramavaktavyapadena vivakṣitamiti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:4451: ananuṣṭhānādbadhyanta ityārhatatantrāvadhṛtasvabhāvānāṃ trividhajīvānāṃ traividhyaniyamo 'pi na syādityāha-anādīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4461: yathaikasmindharmiṇi viruddhadharmāsaṃbhavo doṣaḥ syādvāde prasakta evamātmano 'pi jīvasyākārtsnyamaparo doṣaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:4464: śarīraparimāṇatāyāṃ ca satyāmakṛtsno 'sarvagataḥ paricchinna ātmetyato ghaṭādivadanityatvamātmanaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:4465: śarīrīṇāṃ cānavasthitaparimāṇatvānmanuṣyajīvo manuṣyaśarīraparimāṇo bhūtvā punaḥ kenacitkarmavipākena hastijanma prāpnuvanna kṛtsnaṃ hastiśarīraṃ vyāpnuyāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4466: puttikājanma ca prāpmuvanna kṛtsnaḥ puttikāśarīre saṃmīyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:4467: samāna eṣa ekasminnapi janmani kaumārayauvanasthavireṣu doṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4469: antāvayavo jīvastasya ta evāvayavā alpe śarīre saṃkuceyurmahati ca vikuceyuriti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4470: teṣāṃ punaranantānāṃ jīvāvayavānāṃ samānadeśatvaṃ pratihanyate vā naveti vaktavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:4485: kiñca bāladehamātra ātmā tataḥ sthūle yuvadehe kvacit syāditi kṛtsnadehaḥ sajīvo na syādityāha-samāna iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4486: yathā dīpāvayavānāṃ ghaṭe saṃkoco gehe vikāsastathā jīvāvayavānāmiti dehamānatvaniyamaṃ śaṅkate-syāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:4487: dīpāṃśavajjīvāṃśā bhinnadeśā ekadeśā veti vikalpyādye 'lpadehādbahirapi jīvaḥ syāditi dūṣayati-teṣāmityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:4488: dīpasya tu na ghaṭādbahiḥ sattvamadhikāvayavānāṃ vināśāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4494: atha prayāyeṇa bṛhaccharīrapratipattau kecijjīvāvayavā upagacchanti tanuśarīrapratipattau ca kecidapagacchantītyucyeta tatrāpyucyate-
GSP33brssgo2u:4495: na ca paryāyād apy avirodho vikārādibhyaḥ | BBs_2,2.35 |
GSP33brssgo2u:4499: avayavopagamāpagamābhyāṃ hyaniśamāpūryamāṇasyāpakṣīyamāṇasya ca jīvasya vikriyāvattvaṃ tāvadaparihāryam,
GSP33brssgo2u:4501: tataśca bandhamokṣābhyupagamo bādhyeta karmāṣṭakapariveṣṭitasya jīvasyālābuvatsaṃsārasāgare nimagnasya bandhanocchedādūrdhvagāmitvaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4507: āgacchantaścaite jīvāvayavāḥ kutaḥ prādurbhavantyapagacchantaśca kva vā līyanta iti vaktavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:4508: nahi bhūtebhyaḥ prādurbhaveyurbhūteṣu ca nilīyeran, abhautikatvājjīvasya /
GSP33brssgo2u:4509: nāpi kaścidanyaḥ sādhāraṇo 'sādhāraṇo vā jīvānāmavayavādhāro nirūpyate pramāṇābhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4514_1: coditāyāṃ punaḥ paryāyeṇa parimāṇānavasthāne 'pi srotaḥsaṃtānanityatānyāyenātmano nityatā syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4515: yathā raktapaṭānāṃ vijñānānavasthāne 'pi tatsaṃtānanityatā tadvaddhisicāmapītyāśaṅkyānena sūtreṇottaramucyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:4521: evaṃ jīvāvayavā nityā itimate dehamānatvaṃ nirastam /
GSP33brssgo2u:4522: saṃprati jīvasya kecideva kūṭasthā avayavā anye tvāgamāpāyina iti śaṅkate-atheti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4530: ādye kalpe doṣāntaraṃ vadan kalpāntaramādāya dūṣayati-kiñceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4534: kiñcātmana āgamāpāyiśīlāvayavatve sati kiyanta āyāntyavayavāḥ kiyanto 'payantītyajñānādātmaniścayābhāvādanirmokṣaḥ syādityāha-kiñceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4538: gotvavatpratyekaṃ samāptāvekasmiñcharīra ātmanānātvaṃ syādato na dehaparimāṇatvasāvayavatve ātmana ityupasaṃharati-ata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4545: sig vastraṃ vigataṃ yebhyaste visico digambarāsteṣāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4551: anatireke janmādivikāro vināśo muktyabhāva ityuktadoṣaprasaṅgāt saṃtānātmapakṣo 'nupapanna iti sūtrārthaḥ //35//
GSP33brssgo2u:4563: yaṃ sthūlaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā dehaṃ gṛhṇāti taddehaparimāṇa eva jīva iti niyamaṃ dūṣayati-antyeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4566: na cāprayojakatā, parimāṇanāśe satyātmano 'pi nāśādantyaparimāṇanityatvāyogāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4582: yadi punaraviśeṣeṇeśvarakāraṇavādamātramiha pratiṣidhyeta pūrvottaravirodhādvyāhatābhivyāhāraḥ sūtrakāra ityetadāpadyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:4583: tasmādaprakṛtiradhiṣṭhātā kevalaṃ nimittakāraṇamīśvara ityeṣa pakṣo vedāntavihitabrahmaikatvapratipakṣatvādyatnenātra pratiṣidhyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:4585: kecittāvatsāṃkhyayogavyapāśrayāḥ kalpayanti pradhānapuruṣayoradhiṣṭhātā kevalaṃ nimittakāraṇamīśvara itaretaravilakṣaṇāḥ pradhānapuruṣeśvarā iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4586: māheśvarāstu manyante kāryakāraṇayogavidhiduḥkhāntāḥ pañca padārthāḥ paśupatineśvareṇa paśupāśavimokṣaṇāyopadiṣṭāḥ paśupatirīśvaro nimittakāraṇamiti varṇayanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4587: tathā vaiśeṣikādayo 'pi kecitkathañcitsvaprakriyānusāreṇa nimittakāraṇamīśvara iti varṇayanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4601: nahi kaścidadoṣaprayuktaḥ svārthe parārthe vā pravartamāno dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:4602: svārthaprayukta eva ca sarvo janaḥ parārthe 'pi pravartata ityevamapyasāmañjasyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:4610: luñcitakeśamatanirasanānantaraṃ jaṭādhāriśaivamataṃ buddhisthaṃ nirākriyata iti prasaṅgasaṃgatimāha-idānīmiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4611: sāmānyata īśvaranirāsa evātra kiṃ na syāditi śaṅkate-taditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:4615_0: advitīyabrahmaprakṛtikaṃ jagaditi vadato vedāntasamanvayasya kartaiveśvaro naprakṛtiriti
GSP33brssgo2u:4615_1: śaivādimatena virodho 'sti na veti saṃdehe tanmatasya mānamūlatvādvirodhe sati vedāntoktadvayabrahmāsiddhiriti
GSP33brssgo2u:4626: vimataṃ sakartṛkaṃ, kāryatvāt, ghaṭavaditi vaiśeṣikāḥ kartāramīśvaraṃ sādhayanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4627: karmaphalaṃ saparikarābhijñadātṛkaṃ, kālāntarabhāviphalatvāt, sevāphalavaditi gautamā digambarāśca /
GSP33brssgo2u:4635: na cāgama eva mānam, āgamamānatvaniścaye mūlaniścayastanniścaye tanniścaya ityanyonyāśrayāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4636: naca puruṣavacasāṃ svatomānatvaṃ yuktaṃ, mitho virodhena tattvāvyavasthānācca /
GSP33brssgo2u:4639: tathāca loke yādṛśāḥ kartāro dṛṣṭāntādṛśā eva jagatkartāro rāgadveṣādimantaḥ sidhyeyuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4640: yadi loke vicitraprāsādādikarturekatvādyadarśane 'pi jagatkartari lāghavādekatvaṃ nityajñānaṃ nirdeṣatvaṃ ca kalpyeta,
GSP33brssgo2u:4645: asmākaṃ tvapauruṣeyatayā svataḥsiddhapramāṇabhāvayā śrutyā svaprameyabodhane dṛṣṭāntānapekṣayā bhavatyeva laukikakartṛviparītādvitīyakartrupādānātmakasarvajñanirdeṣeśvaranirṇayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4646: nirṇīte ca tasmin dharmigrāhakamānabādhānna rāgādidoṣāpādānasyāvakāśa ityānumānikeśvaravādibhyo vaiṣamyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:4648: yadi karturupādānatvamadṛṣṭatvānna kalpyate tarhi nirdeṣatvasyāpyadṛṣṭatvādyo viṣamakārī sa doṣavāniti vyāptidṛṣṭeśca jagatkartā doṣavān syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4651: na cotkarṣasamā jātiḥ, vyāpakadharmāpādānāt, doṣābhāve tadvyāpyaviṣamakartṛtvāyogācca /
GSP33brssgo2u:4653: yathā śabdo yadi kṛtakatvena hetunā ghaṭavadanityaḥ syāttarhi tenaiva hetunā sāvayavo 'pi syāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:4654: na hyanityatvasya vyāpakaṃ sāvayavatvaṃ gandhādau vyabhicārāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4655: nanu prāṇikarmaprerita īśvaro viṣamaphalān prāṇinaḥ karoti na svecchayeti śaṅkate-prāṇīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4658: atītakarmaṇā prerita īśvaro vartamānaṃ karma tatphalāya prerayatītyanāditvātpreryaprerakabhāvasya nānupapattiriti śaṅkate-nānāditvāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:4660: naca tadapīśvareṇa preritaṃ sadīśvaraṃ prerayati, uktānyonyāśrayāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4661: tato 'pyatītakarmapreriteśvarapreritaṃ tadeveśvaraṃ vartamāne karmaṇi phaladānāya prerayati cet /
GSP33brssgo2u:4665: yattu phaladāne īśvarasya karma nimittamātraṃ na prerakamiti noktadoṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4676: udāsīnaḥ pravartaka iti ca vyāhṛtamiti yogānpratyāha-puruṣeti //37//
GSP33brssgo2u:4686: nāpyanyaḥ kaścitkāryagamyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ śakyate kalpayituṃ, kāryakāraṇabhāvasyaivādyāpyasiddhatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4690: apicāgamabalena brahmavādī kāraṇādisvarūpaṃ nirūpayatīti nāvaśyaṃ tasya yathādṛṣṭameva sarvamabhyupagantavyamiti niyamo 'sti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4691: parasya tu dṛṣṭāntabalena kāraṇādisvarūpaṃ nirūpayato yathādṛṣṭameva sarvamabhyupagantavyamityayamastyatiśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4699: sa ca saṃyegaḥ samavāyo vā nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4700: kāryabalāt preraṇayogyātvākhyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kalpyatāmityata āha-nāpyanya iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4701: īśvarapreritapradhānakāryaṃ jagaditi siddhaṃ cet saṃbandhakalpanā syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4716: sa hi parikalpyamānaḥ kumabhakāra iva mṛdādīni pradhānādīnyadhiṣṭhāya pravartayet /
GSP33brssgo2u:4718: nahyapratyakṣaṃ rūpādihīnaṃ ca pradhānamīśvarasyādhiṣṭheyaṃ saṃbhavati mṛdādivailakṣaṇyāt // 39 //
GSP33brssgo2u:4729: yathā karaṇagrāmaṃ cakṣurādikamapratyakṣaṃ rūpādihīnaṃ ca puruṣo 'dhitiṣṭhatyevaṃ pradhānamapīśvaro 'dhiṣṭhāsyatīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4735: sādhiṣṭhāno hi loke saśarīro rājā rāṣṭrasyeśvaro dṛśyate na niradhiṣṭhānaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4736: ataśca taddṛṣṭāntavaśenādṛṣṭamīśvaraṃ kalpayitumicchata īśvarasyapi kiñciccharīraṃ karaṇāyatanaṃ varṇayitavyaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4742: atha lokadarśanānusāreṇeśvarasyāpi kiñcitkāraṇānāmāyatanaṃ śarīraṃ kāmena kalpyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:4754: naca yadyenādhiṣṭheyaṃ tattadīyabhogahetutve sati pratyakṣamiti vyatirekavyāptau karaṇeṣu vyabhicāratādavasthyamiti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:4760: jīve karaṇakṛtā bhogadayo dṛśyante, īśvare tu pradhānakṛtāste na dṛśyanta ityakṣarārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4765: yaḥ pravartakaścetanaḥ sa śarīrīti loke vyāptidṛṣṭerīśvarasya ca śarīrānupapatterna pravartakatvamiti sūtrārthamāha-itaśceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4766: kimataṃ seśvaraṃ, kāryatvāt, rāṣṭravaditi kalpayato rājavatsaśarīra eveśvaraḥ syādityuktam /
GSP33brssgo2u:4768: naca nityaṃ śarīraṃ sargātprāgapi saṃbhavatīti vācyaṃ, śarīrasya bhautikatvaniyamādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4770: jīvasyaiva śarīraṃ bhautikamīśvarasya tu svecchānirmitaṃ prāgapi syādityāśaṅkāṃ nirasyati-karaṇavaditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:4779: anantaṃ ca pradhānamanantāśca puruṣā mitho bhinnā abhyupagamyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:4780: tatra sarvajñeśvareṇa pradhānasya puruṣāṇāmātmanaśceyattā paricchidyeta vā na vā paricchidyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:4784: yaddhi loka iyattāparicchinnaṃ vastu paṭādi tadantavaddṛṣṭaṃ tathā pradhānapuruṣeśvaratrayamapīyattāparicchinnatvādantavatsyāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4788: tataśceyattāparicchinnānāṃ madhye ye saṃsāriṇaḥ saṃsārānmucyante teṣāṃ saṃsāro 'ntavānsaṃsāritvaṃ ca teṣāmantavat /
GSP33brssgo2u:4789: evamitareṣvapi krameṇa mucyamāneṣu saṃsārasya saṃsāriṇāṃ cāntavattvaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4790: pradhānaṃ ca savikāraṃ puruṣārthamīśvarasyādhiṣṭheyaṃ saṃsāritvenābhimataṃ tacchūnyatāyāmīśvaraḥ kimadhitiṣṭhet /
GSP33brssgo2u:4794: atha mā bhūdeṣa doṣa ityuttaro vikalpo 'bhyupagamyeta na pradhānasya puruṣāṇāmātmanaśceyatteśvareṇa paricchidyata iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:4799: evamīśvarasya śuṣkatarkeṇa kartṛtvanirṇayo netyupapādya nityatvasarvajñatvanirṇayo 'pi na saṃbhavatītyāha sūtrakāraḥ-antavatvamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4803: yadyapi saṃkhyāvatvamātraṃ hetuḥ saṃbhavati tathāpi sarvajñaniścayena hetvasiddhinirāsaṃ dyotayituṃ niścitapadam /
GSP33brssgo2u:4808: nanu pradhānapuruṣeśvarāstraya iti jñāte 'pi jīvānāmānantyātkathaṃ saṃkhyāniścayaḥ, tatrāha-puruṣeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4812: māṣarāśivatkeṣāñcijjīvānāṃ saṃghastadbandhaśca naśyedityevaṃ sarvamukteridānīṃ śūnyaṃ jagatsyādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4826: tasmāt kevalakartrīśvaravādasya nirmūlatvānna tartrupādānādvayeśvarasamanvayavirodha iti siddham //41//
GSP33brssgo2u:4833: yeṣāṃ punaḥ prakṛtiścādhiṣṭhātā cobhayātmakaṃ kāraṇamīśvaro 'bhimatasteṣāṃ pakṣaḥ pratyākhyāyayate /
GSP33brssgo2u:4834: nanu śrutisamāśrayaṇenāpyevaṃrūpa eveśvaraḥ prāṅnirdhāritaḥ prakṛtiścādhiṣṭhātā ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4840: sa caturdhātmānaṃ pravibhajya pratiṣṭhito vāsudevavyūharūpeṇa saṃkarṣaṇavyūharūpeṇa pradyumnavyūharūpeṇāniruddhavyūharūpeṇa ca /
GSP33brssgo2u:4845: teṣāṃ vāsudevaḥ parā parakṛtiritare saṃkarṣaṇādayaḥ kāryam /
GSP33brssgo2u:4846: tamitthaṃbhūtaṃ parameśvaraṃ bhagavantamabhigamanopādānejyāsvādhyāyayogairvarṣaśatamiṣṭvā kṣīṇakleśo bhagavantameva pratipadyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4847: tatra yattāvaducyeta yo 'sau nārāyaṇaḥ paro 'vyaktātprasiddhaḥ paramātmā sarvātmā sa ātmānātmānamanekadhā vyūhyāvasthita iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:4854: yatpunaridamucyate vāsudevātsaṃkarṣaṇa utpadyate saṃkarṣaṇācca pradyumnaḥ pradyumnāccāniruddha iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4855: atra brūmaḥ - na vāsudevasaṃjñakātparamātmanaḥ saṃkarṣaṇasaṃjñakasya jīvasyotpattiḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:4871: vedāviruddhāṃśamaṅgīkṛtya vedaviruddhaṃ jīvotpattyaṃśaṃ nirākartumadhikaraṇārambha ityāha-ucyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4873: sa kiṃ jīvotpattyādyaṃśe mānaṃ naveti saṃdehe bādhānupalambhānmānamiti pūrvapakṣayati-tatreti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4877: kathaṃ tarhyadvitīye vāsudeve mūrtibhedaḥ, tatrāha-sa iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4880: yathoktavyūhavantaṃ sarvaprakṛtiṃ nirañjanaṃ vijñānarūpaṃ paramātmānamiti yāvat /
GSP33brssgo2u:4887: 'samāhitaḥ śraddhāvitto bhūtvā'iti, 'taṃ yathā yathopāsate'ityādyā ca śrutiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4897: yasmānna hi loke karturdevadattādeḥ karaṇaṃ paraśvādyutpadyamānaṃ dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:4898: varṇayanti ca bhāgavatāḥ karturjīvātsaṃkarṣaṇasaṃjñakātkaraṇaṃ manaḥ pradyumnasaṃjñakamutpadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:4902: jīvasyotpattiṃ nirasya jīvānmanasa utpattiṃ nirasyati-naca karturiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4903: yasmāt kartuḥ karaṇotpattirna dṛśyate tasmādasaṃgatā kalpanetyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4904: siddhānāṃ karaṇānāṃ prayoktā karteti prasiddhyartho hiśabdaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4906: nanu loke kaścicchilpivaraḥ kuṭhāraṃ nirmāya tena vṛkṣaṃ chinattīti dṛṣṭamiti cet /
GSP33brssgo2u:4910: vinaiva karaṇaṃ kartṛtve vā manovaiyarthyamiti bhāvaḥ //43//
GSP33brssgo2u:4915_0: athāpi syānna caite saṃkarṣaṇādayo jīvādibhāvenābhipreyante kiṃ tarhīśvarā evaite
GSP33brssgo2u:4915_2: vāsudevā evaite sarve nirdeṣā niradhiṣṭhāna niravadyāśceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4917: atrocyate- evamapi tadapratiṣedha utpattyasaṃbhavasyāpratiṣedhaḥ prāpnotyevāmutpattyasaṃbhavo doṣaḥ prakārāntareṇetyabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4919: yadi tāvadayamabhiprāyaḥ parasparabhinnā evaite vāsudevādayaścatvāra īśvarāstulyadharmāṇo naiṣāmekātmakatvamastīti,
GSP33brssgo2u:4924: athāyamabhiprāya ekasyaiva bhagavata ete catvāro vyūhāstulyadharmāṇa iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:4926: nahi vāsudevātsaṃkarṣaṇasyotpattiḥ saṃbhavati saṃkarṣaṇācca pradyumnasya pradyumnāccāniruddhasya, atiśayābhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4930: vāsudevā eva hi sarve vyūhā nirviśeṣā iṣyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:4934: FN: nirdeṣā rāgādiśūnyāḥ, niradhiṣṭhānā prakṛtyajanyāḥ, niravadyā nāśādirahitā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4949: kiṃ catvāraḥ svatantrā bhinnā eva utaikasya vikāratvenābhinnāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4951: dvitīye vikārāḥ prakṛtitulyā vā nyūnā vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:4954: yadi nyūnā api bhagavato vyūhāstadā catuṣṭvavyāghāta ityāha-nacaita iti //44//
GSP33brssgo2u:4960: jñānaiśvaryaśaktibalavīryatejāṃsi guṇāḥ, ātmāna evaite bhagavanto vāsudevā ityādidarśanāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4962: caturṣu vedeṣu paraṃ śreyo 'labdhvā śāṇḍilya idaṃ śāstramadhigatavānityādivedanindādarśanāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4966: ādipadāt pradyumnāniruddhau bhinnāvātmana ityuktvātmana evaite iti viruddhoktigrahaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4971: iti śrīgovindabhagavatpūjyapādaśiṣyaśrīmacchaṅkarabhagavatpūjyapādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ // 2 //
GSP33brssgo2u:4972: iti dvitīyādhyāyasya sāṃkhyādimatānāṃ duṣṭatvapradarśanaṃ nāma dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP33brssgo2u:4973: iti śrīparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2//
GSP33brssgo2u:4974: iti dvitīyādhyāyasya sāṃkhyādimatānāṃ duṣṭatvapradarśanaṃ nāma dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:4986: vedānteṣu tatra tatra bhinnaprasthānā utpattiśrutaya upalabhyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:4993: tatra prathamaṃ tāvadākāśamāśritya cintyate kimasyākāśasyotpattirastyuta nāstīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5001: iti ca pañcānāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ madhyamaṃ teja ādiṅkṛtvā trayāṇāṃ tejobannānāmutpattiḥ śrāvyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5010: yathā mithovirodhāt pūrvāparavirodhācca parapakṣā upekṣyāstathā śrutipakṣo 'pi upekṣya iti śaṅkotthāne pādadvayasyārambhāt pūrvapādena dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatiriti samudāyārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5013: jīvasya prāṇānāṃ cotpattiṃ 'sarva eta ātmano vyuccaranti'iti vājinaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5021_1: saṃdehe yadyutpattistadā vākyabhedena virodhādaprāmāṇyamanayoḥ śrutyoriti pūrvapakṣayiṣyannādāvanutpattikṣamekadeśi
GSP33brssgo2u:5028: mā nāmākāśasya chāndogye bhūdutpattiḥ, śrutyantare tvasti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5029: taittirīyakā hi samāmananti- 'satyaṃ jñānamantaṃ brahma' iti prakṛtya 'tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ' (tai. 2.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5039: nanu sakṛcchrutasyāpi kartuḥ kartavyadvayena saṃbandho dṛśyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:5043: prathamajatvaṃ hi chāndogye tejaso 'vagamyate taittirīyake cākāśasya /
GSP33brssgo2u:5047: ityatrāpi tasmādākāśaḥ saṃbhūtastasmāttejaḥ saṃbhūtamiti sakṛcchrutasyāpādānasya saṃbhavanasya ca viyattejobhyāṃ yugapatsaṃbandhānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5052: ekasya yugapatkāryadvayāsaṃbandhe 'pi krameṇa saṃbandhasaṃbhavādekavākyateti mukhyasiddhāntī śaṅkate-nanu sakṛditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:5060: kiñca satpadārtha ātmā chāndogye tejasa upādānaṃ śrūyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:5068: yā tvitarā viyadutpattivādinī śrutirudāhṛtā sā gauṇī bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo2u:5074: dravyasya caikajātīyakamanekaṃ ca dravyaṃ samavāyikāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:5076: yasminsamavāyikāraṇe satyasamavāyikāraṇe ca tatsaṃyoga ākāśa utpadyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:5078: utpattimatāṃ ca tejaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ pūrvottarakāyorviśeṣaḥ saṃbhāvyate prāgutpatteḥ prakāśādikāryaṃ na babhūva paścācca bhavatīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5082: tasmādyathā loka ākāśaṃ kurvākāśo jāta ityevañjātīyako gauṇaḥ prayogo bhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:5083: yathāca ghaṭākāśaḥ karakākāśo gṛhākāśa ityekasyāpyākāśasyaivañjātīyako bhedavyapadeśo gauṇo bhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:5086: evaṃ śrutyorvirodhādaprāmāṇyamiti pūrvapakṣe prāpte sa eva viyadanutpattivādi svamatena prāmāṇyaṃ brūta ityāha-asminniti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5087: evamādhyāyasamāpteradhikaraṇeṣu prathamaṃ virodhācchrutyaprāmāṇyamiti pūrvapakṣaphalaṃ tata ekadeśisiddhāntaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:5088: paścānmukhyasiddhānte śrutīnāmavirodhenaika vākyatayā brahmaṇi samanvayasiddhiriti phalaṃ kramaścetyavagantavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:5092: saṃyoga eva hi dravyasyāsamavāyikāraṇamataḥ samavāyyasamavāyinorabhāvānna hetvasiddhirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5096: mūrtadravyāśrayatvaṃ hyakāśasya kāryaṃ, tacca pralaye 'pyasti paramāṇvāśrayatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:5111: ākāśavatsarvagataśca nityaḥ iti cākāśena brahma sarvagatatvanityatvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāmupamimāna ākāśasyāpi tau dharmau sūcayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:5113: 'sa yathānanto 'yamākāśa evamananta ātmā veditavyaḥ' iti codāharaṇam /
GSP33brssgo2u:5128: kathaṃ punarekasya saṃbhūtaśabdasya 'tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ' (tai. 2.1)
GSP33brssgo2u:5129: ityasminnadhikāre pareṣu tejaḥprabhṛtiṣvanuvartamānasya mukhyatvaṃ saṃbhavatyākāśe ca gauṇatvamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5130: ata uttaramucyate- syāccaikasyāpi saṃbhūtaśabdasya viṣayaviśeṣavaśādgauṇo mukhyasya prayogo brahmaśabdavat /
GSP33brssgo2u:5131: yathaikasyāpi brahmaśabdasya 'tapasā brahma vijijñāsasva, tapo brahma' (tai. 3.2)
GSP33brssgo2u:5132: ityasminnadhikāre 'nnādiṣu gauṇaḥ prayoga ānande ca mukhyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5133: yathā ca tapasi brahmavijñānasādhane brahmaśabdo bhaktyā prayujyate 'ñjasā tu vijñeye brahmaṇi tadvat /
GSP33brssgo2u:5134: kathaṃ punaranutpattau nabhasaḥ 'ekamevādvitīyam' (chā. 6.2.1) itīyaṃ pratijñā samarthyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5135: nanu nabhasā dvitīyena sadvitīyaṃ brahma prāpnoti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5136: kathaṃ ca brahmaṇi vidite sarvaṃ viditaṃ syāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:5138_0: yathā loke kaścitkumbhakārakule pūrvedyurmṛddaṇḍacakrādīni copalabhyāparedyuśca nānāvidhānyamatrāṇi
GSP33brssgo2u:5138_1: prasāritānyupalabhya brūyānmṛdevaikākinī pūrvedyurāsīditi sa ca tayāvadhāraṇayā mṛtkāryajātameva
GSP33brssgo2u:5140: yathā mṛdo 'matraprakṛteḥ kumbhakāro 'dhiṣṭhātā dṛśyate naivaṃ brahmaṇo jagatprakṛteranyo 'dhikṛtāstīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5141: naca nabhasāpi dvitīyena sadvitīyaṃ brahma prasajyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5144: sargakāle tu brahma jagadutpādayituṃ yatate stimitamitaravattiṣṭati /
GSP33brssgo2u:5150: ato brahmaṇā tatkāryeṇa ca vijñātena sahavijñātamevākāśaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:5151: yathā kṣīrapūrṇe ghaṭe katicidabbindavaḥ prakṣiptāḥ santaḥ kṣīragrahaṇenaiva gṛhītā bhavanti,
GSP33brssgo2u:5174: ākāśasya dvitīyatvamaṅgīkṛtyādvitīyādipadasaṃkocaḥ kṛtaḥ, tadapi nāstītyāha-naca nabhasāpīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5175: dharmasāmye brahmanabhasoḥ kathaṃ bhedaḥ, tatrāha-sargakāle tviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5186: iti, 'ātmani khalvare dṛṣṭe śrute mate vijñāta idaṃ sarvaṃ viditam' (bṛ. 4.5.6)
GSP33brssgo2u:5187: iti, 'kasminnu bhagavo vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati' (muṇḍa. 1.1.3)
GSP33brssgo2u:5188: iti, 'na kācana maddhahirdhā vidyāsti' iti caivaṃrūpā prativedāntaṃ pratijñā vijñāyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5191: vyatireke hi satyekavijñānena sarvaṃ vijñāyata itīyaṃ pratijñā hrīyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:5192: sa cāvyatireka evamupapadyate yadi kṛtsnaṃ vastujātamekasmādbrahmaṇa utpadyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:5194: tathāhi- 'yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavati' iti pratijñāya mṛdādidṛṣṭāntaiḥ kāryakāraṇābhedapratipādanaparaiḥ pratijñaiṣā samarthyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5197: ityevaṃ kāryajātaṃ brahmaṇaḥ pradarśyāvyatirekaṃ pradarśayanti- 'aitadātmyamidaṃ sarvam' (chā. 6.8.7)
GSP33brssgo2u:5199: tadyadyākāśaṃ na brahmakāryaṃ syānna brahmaṇi vijñāta ākāśaṃ vijñāyeta, tataśca pratijñāhāniḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:5201: tathāhi- prativedāntaṃ te te śabdāstena tena dṛṣṭāntena tāmeva pratijñāṃ khyapayanti 'idaṃ sarvaṃ yadayamātmā' (bṛ. 2.4.6)
GSP33brssgo2u:5206: viyadutpattiviṣayaśrutyantarasya darśitatvāt 'tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ' (tai. 2.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5215: tejaḥsargasya taittirīyake tṛtīyatvaśravaṇāt 'tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5219: śakyā tu pariṇetuṃ chāndogyaśrutistadākāśaṃ vāyuṃ ca sṛṣṭvā 'tattejo 'sṛjata' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5220: nahīyaṃ śrutistejojanipradhānā satī śrutyantaraprasiddhāmākāśasyotpattiṃ vārayituṃ śaknoti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5224: nacāsmābhiḥ sakṛcchrutasya sraṣṭuḥ sraṣṭavyadvayasaṃbandho 'bhipreyate śrutyantaravaśena sraṣṭavyāntaropasaṃgrahāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:5226: ityatra sākṣādeva sarvasya vastujātasya brahmajatvaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ na pradeśāntaravihitaṃ tejaḥpramukhamutpattikramaṃ vārayati,
GSP33brssgo2u:5227: evaṃ tejaso 'pi brahmajatvaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ na śrutyantaravihitaṃ nabhaḥpramukhamutpattikramaṃ vārayitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo2u:5235: nahi tejaḥprāthamyānurodhena śrutyantaraprasiddho viyatpadārthaḥ parityaktavyo bhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:5237: apica 'tattejo 'sṛjata' iti nātra kramasya vācakaḥ kaścicchabdo 'sti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5239: sa ca 'vāyoragniḥ' ityanena śrutyantaraprasiddhena krameṇa nivāryate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5242: apica chāndogye 'yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavati' ityetāṃ pratijñāṃ vākyopakrame śrutāṃ samarthayitumasamāmnātamapi viyadutpattāvupasaṃkhyātavyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:5243: kimaṅga punastaittirīyake samāmnātaṃ nabho na saṃgṛhyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5244: yaccoktamākāśasya sarveṇānanyadeśakālatvādbrahmaṇā tatkāryaiśca saha viditameva tadbhavatyato na pratijñā hīyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:5250: kṣīrodakanyāyena ca sarvavijñānaṃ kalpyamānaṃ na samyagvijñānaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:5255: naca svakāryāpekṣayedaṃ vastvekadeśaviṣayaṃ sarvavijñānamekamevādvitīyatāvadhāraṇaṃ ceti nyāyyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:5256_0: mṛdādiṣvapi hi tatsaṃbhavānna tadapūrvavadupanyasitavyaṃ bhavati 'śvetaketo yannu
GSP33brssgo2u:5256_1: somyedaṃ mahāmanā anūcānamānī stabdho 'syuta tamādeśamaprākṣyo 'yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:5257: tasmādaśeṣavastuviṣayamevedaṃ sarvavijñānaṃ sarvasya brahmakāryatāpekṣayopanyasyata iti draṣṭavyam // 6 //
GSP33brssgo2u:5258: evamākāśasyānutpattau sarvaśrutīnāmavirodha ityekadeśisiddhāntaḥ prāptastaṃ mukhyasiddhāntī dūṣayati-pratijñeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5264: tathāpi jīvādivadanutpannasyāpi nabhaso brahmaṇi kalpitatvenāvyatirekātpratijñāsiddhiḥ kiṃ na syāt,
