GSP33brssgo2u:6421: tasyā buddherguṇāstadguṇā icchā dveṣaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhamityevamādayastadguṇāḥ sāraḥ pradhānaṃ yasyātmanaḥ saṃsāritve saṃbhavati sa tadguṇasārastasya bhāvastadguṇasāratvam /
GSP33brssgo2u:6423: buddhyupādhirdharmādhyāsanimittaṃ hi kartṛtvabhoktṛtvādilakṣaṇaṃ saṃsāritvamakartṛrabhoktuścāsaṃsāriṇo nityamuktasya sata ātmanaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6427: bhāgo jīvaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ sa cānantyāya kalpate' (śve. 5.9)
GSP33brssgo2u:6429: taccaivameva samañjasaṃ syādyadyaupacārikamaṇutvaṃ jīvasya bhavetpāramārthikaṃ cānantyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:6431: nacānantyamaupacārikamiti śakyaṃ vijñātuṃ, sarvopaniṣatsu brahmātmabhāvasya pratipādayiṣitatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:6433: iti ca buddhiguṇasaṃbandhenaivārāgramātratāṃ śāsti na svenaivātmanā /
GSP33brssgo2u:6440: ityevañjātīyakeṣvapi bhedopadeśeṣu buddhyauvopādhibhūtayā jīvaḥ śarīraṃ samāruhyetyevaṃ yojayitavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:6444: tathotkrāntyādīnāmapyupādhyāyattatāṃ darśayati- 'kasminnvahamutkrānta utkrānto bhaviṣyāmi kasminvā pratiṣṭhite pratiṣṭhāsyāmīti' (praśna. 6.3)
GSP33brssgo2u:6453: tato buddhyātmanorbhinnayoḥ saṃyogāvasānamavaśyaṃbhāvītyato buddhiviyoge satyātmano vibhaktasyānālakṣyatvādasattvamasaṃsāritvaṃ vā prasajyeteti // 29 //
GSP33brssgo2u:6454: tatrātmāṇutvavibhutvaśrutīnāṃ virodhādaprāmāṇyaprāptāvaṇutvaṃ jīvasya vibhutvamīśvarasyetyavirodha ityekadeśipakṣo darśitaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6456: tasmādbrahmābhinnatvādvibhurjīvaḥ brahmavadityanumānānugṛhite śrutismṛti āha-tathāca sa vā eṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6458: etena jīvasya brahmabedajñāne 'ṇutvābhāvadhīstasyāṃ tadityanyonyāśraya iti nirastam /
GSP33brssgo2u:6464: yadyaṇvātmasaṃbandhasya tvagvyāptyā dehavyāpinī vedanā syāttarhyatiprasaṅga iti dūṣayati-neti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6469: naca siddhānte tvagātmasaṃbandhasya vyāpitvātkaṇṭakasaṃbandhe dehavyāpivedanāprasaṅga iti vācyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:6471: na caivaṃ viṣayatvaksaṃbandha eva taddheturastu kimātmavyāptyeti vācyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:6473: na caiṣāṃ vyāpakānāṃ kāryāṇāmalpamupādānaṃ saṃbhavati kāryasyopādānādviśleṣānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6476: yaduktaṃ guṇasyāpi guṇiviśleṣo gandhavaditi, tannetyāha-na cāṇoriti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6481: pūrvaṃ caitanyasya guṇatvamupetya tadvyāptyā guṇyātmāṇutvaṃ nirastaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:6484: 'antarā vijñānamanasī hṛdi hi'iti ca prakṛtā buddhiryogyatvāttacchabdena parāmṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:6486: akāryakāraṇadravyasamānādhikaraṇatayā tattvamasīti vākyasya so 'yamiti vākyavadakhaṇḍābhedārthatvādānantyaṃ satyamaṇutvamadhyastamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6490: buddherguṇena nimittenātmanyadhyasto guṇo bhavati tenātmaguṇenādhyastenaivārāgraparimāṇo 'pakṛṣṭaśca jīvo dṛṣṭaḥ svatastvananta evetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6491: 'na cakṣuṣā gṛhyate nāpi vācā nānyairdevaistapasā karmaṇā vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:6492: jñānaprasādena viśuddhasattvastatastu taṃ paśyati niṣkalaṃ dhyāyamānaḥ'ityuktvā 'eṣo 'ṇurātmā'ityuktaḥ para eva,
GSP33brssgo2u:6496: yadi caitanyaṃ prajñā tadā bhedopacāra ityāha-vyapadeśamātraṃ veti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6497: nanu caitanyaṃ guṇa iti bhedo mukhyo 'stu, netyāha-na hyatreti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6508: yāvadātmabhāvitvāc ca na doṣas taddarśanāt | BBs_2,3.30 |
GSP33brssgo2u:6515: yāvadeva cāyaṃ buddhyupādhisaṃbandhastāvajjīvasya jīvatvaṃ saṃsāritvaṃ ca /
GSP33brssgo2u:6524: tathāhi śāstraṃ darśayati- 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu hṛdyantarjyotiḥ puruṣaḥ sa samānaḥ sannubhau lokāvanusaṃcarati dhyāyatīva lelāyatīva' (bṛ. 4.3.4) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo2u:6525: tatra vijñānamaya iti buddhimaya ityetaduktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:6526: pradeśāntare 'vijñānamayo manomayaḥ prāṇamayaścakṣurmayaḥ śrotramayaḥ' iti vijñānamayasya manaādibhiḥ saha pāṭhāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:6528: yathā loke strīmayo devadatta iti strīrāgādipradhāno 'bhidhīyate tadvat /
GSP33brssgo2u:6529: 'sa samānaḥ sannubhau lokāvanusaṃcarati' iti ca lokāntaragamane 'pyaviyogaṃ buddhyā darśayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:6534: dhyāyantyāṃ buddhau dhyāyatīva calantyāṃ buddhau calatīveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6536: naca mithyājñānasya samyagjñānādanyatra nivṛttirastītyato yāvadbrahmātmatānavabodhasyāvadayaṃ buddhyupādhisaṃbandho na śāmyati /
GSP33brssgo2u:6537: darśayati ca- 'vedāhametaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāntamādityavarṇaṃ tamasaḥ purastāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:6538: tameva viditvātimṛtyumeti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya' (śve. 3.8) iti // 30 //
GSP33brssgo2u:6544: nanu svataḥ saṃsāritvamastu kiṃ buddhyupādhinetyata āha-yāvadeva cāyamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6545: samāno buddhitādātmyāpannaḥ san vijñānaṃ brahma tanmayo vikāro 'ṇurityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6550: sati mūle kāryasya viyogāsaṃbhavācceti yuktyāpyāha-apica mithyeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6559: 'satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavati svamapīto bhavati' (chā. 6.8.1) iti vacanāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:6563: yathā loke puṃstvādīni bījātmanā vidyamānānyeva bālyādiṣvanupalabhyamānānyavidyamānavadabhipreyamāṇāni yauvanādiṣvāvirbhavanti,
GSP33brssgo2u:6565: evamayamapi buddhisaṃbandhaḥ śaktyātmanā vidyamāna eva suṣuptapralayayoḥ punaḥ prabodhaprasavayorāvirbhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:6569: darśayati ca suṣuptādutthānamavidyātmakabījasadbhāvakāritam- 'sati saṃpadya na viduḥ sati saṃpadyamāha' iti ta iha vyāghro vā saṃho vā' (chā. 6.9.3) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:6578: svāpe bījātmanā sato buddhayādeḥ prabodhe 'bhivyaktirityatra śrutimāha-darśayatīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6585: taccātmana upādhibhūtamantaḥkaraṇaṃ mano buddhirvijñānaṃ ctitamiti cānekadhā tatra tatrābhilapyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:6586: kvacicca vṛttivibhāgena saṃśayādivṛttikaṃ mana ityucyate, niścayādivṛttikaṃ buddhiriti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6590: atha satyapi hetusamavadhāne phalābhāvastato nityamevānupalabdhiḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:6596: nahi tasya pūrvottarayoḥ kṣaṇayorapratibaddhaśaktikasya sato 'kasmācchaktiḥ pratibadhyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:6598: tathāca śrutiḥ - 'anyatrātmanā abhūvaṃ nādarśamanyatramanā abhūvaṃ nāśrauṣam' (bṛ. 1.5.3)
GSP33brssgo2u:6599: iti, 'manasā hyeva paśyati manasā śṛṇoti' (bṛ. 1.5.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6600: kāmādayaścāsya vṛttaya iti darśayati 'kāmaḥ saṃkalpo vicikitsā śraddhāśraddhā dhṛtiradhṛtirhīrbhīrityetatsarvaṃ mana eva' (bṛ. 1.5.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6607: ' 'cittaṃ ca cetayitavyam'iti tatra tatra śrutiṣu manaādipadavācyaṃ tāvadbuddhidravyaṃ prasiddhamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6609: garvavṛttiko 'haṅkāro vijñānaṃ citpradhānaṃ smṛtipradhānaṃ vā cittamityapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:6610: yadyapi sākṣipratyakṣasiddhamantaḥkaraṇaṃ śrutyanūditaṃ ca tathāpi pratyakṣaśrutyorvivadamānaṃ prati vyāsaṅgānupapattyā tatsādhayati-taccetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:6612: pañcendriyāṇāṃ pañcaviṣayasaṃbandhe sati nityaṃ yugapatpañcopalabdhayaḥ syuḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:6616: nanu satyapi kāragrisaṃyoge dāhakādācitkatvavadupalabdhikādācitkatvamastu kiṃ manasetyāśaṅkyānyataraniyamo vetyetadvyācaṣṭe-athaveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6617: satyāṃ sāmagryāṃ nityopalabdhirvāṅgīkāryā anyatarasya kāraṇasya kenapicchaktipratibandhaniyamo vāṅgīkāryaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:6624: tathāhi-rasādīnāṃ sahopalabdhiprāptau rasabubhutsārūpo vyāsaṅgo rūpādyupalabdhipratibandhako vācyaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:6626: tatrātmano 'saṅganirguṇakūṭasthasya guṇitvāyogānmana eva guṇitvenaiṣṭavyamiti vyāsaṅgānupapattyā manaḥsiddhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6631: teṣāṃ mate punaricchādīnāmātmadharmatvaṃ teṣāṃ mano durlabhamiti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:6649: tathedamapi śāstramarthavadbhavati eṣa hi draṣṭā śrotā mantā boddhā kartā vijñānātmā puruṣaḥ (pra. 5.9) iti // 33 //
GSP33brssgo2u:6651: saṃprati tato bahiṣṭhaṃ kartṛtvaṃ sādhayati-kartā śāstrārthavattvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:6652_0: sa nityaścidrūpo mahānātmā kartā na vetyasaṅgatvaśrutīnāṃ vidhyādiśrutīnāṃ ca vipratipattyā
GSP33brssgo2u:6659: nanu buddhikartṛtvena śāstrārthavattāstu kiṃ jīvakartṛtvena tatrāha-taddhi kartuḥ sata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6660: mayedaṃ kartavyamiti bodhasamarthasya cetanasyaiva kartṛtvaṃ vācyaṃ na tvacetanāyā buddheḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6661: kiṃ ca bhokturātmana eva kartṛtā vācyā 'śāstraphalaṃ prayoktari'iti nyāyāditi bhāvaḥ //33//
GSP33brssgo2u:6667: yajjīvaprakriyāyāṃ saṃdhye sthāne vihāramupadiśati- 'sa īyate 'mṛto yatra kāmam' (bṛ. 4.3.12)
GSP33brssgo2u:6668: iti, 'sve śarīre yathākāmaṃ parivartate' (bṛ. 2.1.18) iti ca // 34 //
GSP33brssgo2u:6673: amṛtaḥ sa ātmā yatheṣṭamīyate gacchatīti vihāropadeśāt, ātmā kartā //34//
GSP33brssgo2u:6679: yajjīvaprakriyāyāmeva karaṇānāmupādānaṃ saṃkīrtayati- 'tadeṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ vijñānena vijñānamādāya' (bṛ. 21.1.17)
GSP33brssgo2u:6682: FN: prāṇānāmindryāṇāṃ vijñānena buddhyā vijñānaṃ grahaṇaśaktimādāya svāpe jīvo hṛdayametīti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo2u:6683: prāṇānāṃ madhye vijñānena buddhyā vijñānasamarthamindriyajātamādāya śete iti prāṇān gṛhītvā parivartata iti upādānakartṛtvamātmanaḥ akartṛtve upādānānupapatteriti bhāvaḥ //35//
GSP33brssgo2u:6687: vyapadeśāc ca kriyāyāṃ na cen nirdeśaviparyayaḥ | BBs_2,3.36 |
GSP33brssgo2u:6689: yadasya laukikīṣu vaidikīṣu ca kriyāsu kartṛtvaṃ vyapadiśati śāstram- 'vijñānaṃ yajñaṃ tanute karmāṇi tanute 'pi ca' (tai. 2.5.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6696: tathā hyanyatra buddhivivakṣāyāṃ vijñānaśabdasya karaṇavibhaktinirdeśo dṛśyate 'tadeṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ vijñānena vijñānamādāya' (bṛ. 2.1.17) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6699: atrāha- yadi buddhivyatirikto jīvaḥ kartā syātsa svatantraḥ sanpriyaṃ hitaṃ caivātmano niyamena saṃpādayenna viparītam /
GSP33brssgo2u:6702: vijñānaśabdo jīvasya nirdeśo na cet tadā prathamānirdeśādviparyayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6704: tasmādiha śrutau tanuta ityākhyātena kartṛvācinā vijñānapadasya sāmānādhikaraṇyanirdeśātkriyāyāmātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ sūcyata iti sūtrabhāṣyayorarthaḥ //36//
GSP33brssgo2u:6710: yathāyamātmopalabdhiṃ prati svatantro 'pyaniyameneṣṭamaniṣṭaṃ copalabhata evamaniyamenaiveṣṭamaniṣṭaṃ ca saṃpādayiṣyati /
GSP33brssgo2u:6720: jīvaḥ svatantraścediṣṭameva kuryādasvatantraścenna kartā, 'svatantraḥ kartā'iti nyāyādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6721: satyapi svātantrye kārakavaicitryādaniyatā pravṛttiriti sūtreṇa pariharati-yatheti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6724: nanvātmā viṣayasaṃbandhāya karaṇānyapekṣate cetkathaṃ svatantra ityāśaṅkyamāha-apiceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6725: svātantryaṃ nāma na svānyānapekṣatvam, īśvarasyāpi prāṇikarmāpekṣatvenāsvātantryaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:6726_0: kiṃ tu svetarakārakaprayoktṛtve sati kārakāpreryatvaṃ svātantryaṃ tena svatantro
GSP33brssgo2u:6732: yadi purvijñānaśabdavācyā buddhireva kartrī syāttataḥ śaktiviparyayaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:6734: satyāṃ ca buddheḥ kartṛśaktau tasyā evāhaṃpratyayaviṣayatvamabhyupagantavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:6738: śakto 'pi hi sankartā karaṇamupādāya kriyāsu pravartamāno dṛśyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6739: tataśca saṃjñāmātre vivādaḥ syānna vastubhedaḥ kaścit /
GSP33brssgo2u:6745: sa kartā sa eva jīvo yattadapekṣitaṃ karaṇaṃ tanmana iti jīvakartṛtvasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ //38//
GSP33brssgo2u:6750: yo 'pyayamaupaniṣadātmapratipattiprayojanaḥ samādhirupadiṣṭo vedānteṣu- 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyasitavya so 'nveṣṭavyaḥ sa vijijñāsitavyaḥ' (bṛ. 2.4.5)
GSP33brssgo2u:6763: tatpunaḥ svābhāvikaṃ vā syādupādhinimittaṃ veti cintyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:6767: kartṛtvasvabhāve hyātmano na kartṛtvānnirmokṣaḥ saṃbhavati, agnerivauṣṇyāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:6783: nahi vivekināṃ parasmādanyo jīvo nāma kartā bhoktā vā vidyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:6785: para eva tarhi saṃsārī kartā bhoktā ca prasajyeta,
GSP33brssgo2u:6789: tathāca śāstram- 'yatra hi dvaitamiva bhavati taditara itaraṃ paśyati' (bṛ. 2.4.14)
GSP33brssgo2u:6790: ityavidyāvasthāyāṃ kartṛtvabhoktṛtve darśayitvā vidyāvasthāyāṃ te eva kartṛtvabhoktṛtve nivārayati- 'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyet' (bṛ. 2.4.14) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6791_0: tathā svapnajāgaritayorātmana upādhisaṃparkakṛtaṃ śramaṃ śyenasyevākāśe viparipatataḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:6791_1: śrāvayitvā tadabhāvaṃ suṣuptau prājñenātmanā saṃpariṣvaktasya śrāvayati- 'tadvā asyaitadāptakāmamātmakāmamakāmaṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:6792: ityārabhya eṣāsya paramā gatireṣāsya paramā saṃpadeṣo 'sya paramo loka eṣo 'syaparama ānandaḥ (bṛ. 4.3.32) ityupasaṃhārāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:6796_0: yathā tu takṣā loke vāsyādikaraṇahastaḥ kartā duḥkhī bhavati sa eva svagṛhaṃ prāpto
GSP33brssgo2u:6796_2: ātmā svapnajāgaritāvasthayoḥ kartā duḥkhī bhavati sa tacchramāpanuttaye svamātmānaṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:6796_3: paraṃ brahma praviśya vimuktakāryakaraṇasaṃghāto 'kartā sukhī bhavati saṃprasādāvasthāyām /
GSP33brssgo2u:6797: tathā muktyavasthāyāmapyavidyādhvāntaṃ vidyāpradīpena vidhūyātmaiva kevalo nivṛttaḥ sukhī bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:6799: takṣā hi viśiṣṭheṣu takṣaṇādivyāpāreṣvapekṣyaiva pratiniyatāni karaṇāni vāsyādīni kartā bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:6801: evamayamātmā sarvavyāpāreṣvapekṣyaiva manaādīni karaṇāni kartā bhavati, svātmanā tvakartaiveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6802: natvātmanasthakṣṇa ivāvayavāḥ santi yairhastādibhiriva vāsyādīni takṣā manaādīni karaṇānyātmopādadīta nyasyedvā /
GSP33brssgo2u:6805: vidhiśāstraṃ tāvadyathāprāptaṃ kartṛtvamupādāya kartavyaviśeṣamupadiśati na kartṛtvamātmanaḥ pratipādayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:6811: nanu saṃdhye sthāne prasupteṣu karaṇeṣu sve śarīre yathākāmaṃ parivartata iti vihāra upadiśyamānaḥ kevalasyātmanaḥ kartṛtvamāvahati /
GSP33brssgo2u:6812: tathopādāne 'pi 'tadeṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ vijñānena vijñānamādāya' iti karaṇeṣu karmakaraṇavibhaktī śrūyamāṇe kevalasyātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ gamayata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6813: atrocyate- na tāvatsaṃdhye sthāne 'tyantamātmanaḥ karaṇaviramaṇamasti / 'sadhīḥ svapno bhūtvemaṃ lokamatikrāmati' (bṛ.4.3.7)
GSP33brssgo2u:6814_0: iti tatrāpi dhīsaṃbandhaśravaṇāt / tathāca smaranti- 'indriyāṇāmuparame mano 'nuparataṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:6814_1: yadi / sevate viṣayāneva tadvidyātsvapnadarśanam' iti / 'kāmādayaśca manaso vṛttayaḥ'
GSP33brssgo2u:6814_2: iti śrutiḥ / tāśca svapne dṛśyante / tasmātsamanā eva svapne viharati / vihāro 'pi
GSP33brssgo2u:6814_3: ca tatratyo vāsanāmaya eva natu pāramārthiko 'sti / tathāca śrutirivākārānubaddhameva
GSP33brssgo2u:6814_4: svapnavyāpāraṃ varṇayati- 'uteva strībhiḥ saha modamāno jakṣadutevāpi bhayāni paśyan' (bṛ. 4.3.13)
GSP33brssgo2u:6815: iti / laukikā api tathaiva svapnaṃ kathayanti- ārukṣamiva giriśṛṅgamadrākṣamiva vanarājimiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6816: tathopādāne 'pi yadyapi karaṇeṣu karmakaraṇavibhaktinirdeśastathāpi tatsaṃpṛktasyaivātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:6818: bhavati ca loke 'nekaprakārā vivakṣā yodhā yudhyante yodhai rājā yudhyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6819: apicāsminnupādāne karaṇavyāpāroparamamātraṃ vivakṣyate na svātantryaṃ kasyacidabuddhipūrvakasyāpi svāpe karaṇavyāpāroparamasya dṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:6820: yastvayaṃ vyapadeśo darśitaḥ 'vijñānaṃ yajñaṃ tanute' iti, sa buddhereva kartṛtvaṃ prāpayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:6823: 'tasya śraddhaiva śiraḥ' (tai. 2.4) iti ca vijñānamayasyātmanaḥ śraddhādyavayavatvasaṃkīrtanāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:6825: 'vijñānaṃ devāḥ sarve brahma jyeṣṭhamupāsate' (tai. 2.5.1) iti ca vākyaśeṣāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:6827: 'sa eṣa vācaścittasyottarottarakramo yadyajñaḥ' iti ca śrutyantare yajñasya vāgbuddhisādhyatvāvadhāramāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:6828: naca buddheḥ śaktiviparyayaḥ karaṇānāṃ kartṛtvābhyupagame bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:6830: upalabdhyapekṣaṃ tveṣāṃ karaṇānāṃ karaṇatvaṃ, sā cātmanaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6850: sāṃkhyanirāsenātmanaḥ kartṛtve sādhite bādhakābhāvāt tatsatyamiti mīmāṃsakādipakṣaḥ prāptaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6852: ahaṃ kartetyanubhavasahitakartṛtvaśrutibalena tasyāgamasya stāvakatvāditi prāpta utsūtrameva siddhāntayati-na svābhāvikamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6854: nanu kartṛtvaṃ nāma kriyāśaktirmuktāvapyasti tathāpi śaktikāryasya kriyārūpaśakyasyābhāvānmukteḥ puruṣārthatvasiddhiriti śaṅkate-nanu sthitāyāmiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6856: muktau śaktisattve kāryamapi syāt, śakyābhāve śaktyayogāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:6857: asti hi pralaye 'pi kāryaṃ punarudbhavayogyaṃ sūkṣmaṃ śakyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:6858: tathāca śaktyā dharmādinimitteḥ sahitakāryākṣepānmuktilopa iti pariharati-na nimittānāmapīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6859: sanimittasya kāryasya śakyatvena śaktyā saṃbandhānnamittānāmapi paramparayā śaktisaṃbandhitvamuktaṃ mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:6861: yadvā śaktirlakṣaṇamākṣepakaṃ yasya kāryasya tena kāryeṇa yaḥ saṃbandhasteneti vyadhikaraṇe tṛtīye /
GSP33brssgo2u:6872: buddhyādisaṃghātādvyatirikto yadi parasmādanyaścetano na syāttadā para eva saṃsārī prasajyeta,
GSP33brssgo2u:6875: na vayaṃ śuddhasya ciddhātoḥ parasya bandhaṃ vadāmaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:6876: kintu tasyaivāvidyābuddhyādiprativimbitasyāvidyayā bhinnasya jīvatvaṃ prāptasya bandhamokṣāviti brūmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6877: kalpitabhedo 'pi loke bimbapratibimbayordharmavyavasthāpako dṛṣṭa iti pariharati-nāvidyeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6884: gatiḥ prāpyaṃ, saṃpadaiśvaryaṃ loko bogyaṃ sukhaṃ, caitasmādanyatrāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6885: ātmā svato 'kartā buddhyādyupādhinā tu kartetyubhayathābhāva uktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6888: yathā sphaṭikasya lauhityaṃ kusumādyupādhikaṃ tathātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ buddhyādyupādhikamanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ siddham /
GSP33brssgo2u:6889: naca tau buddherātmakartṛtve karaṇatvaviṣayau nopādānatvaviṣayāviti yuktaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:6892_0: nanu takṣā svahastādinā vāsyādipreraṇaśaktatvātsvataḥ kartā ātmā tu niravayavatvādaśakta
GSP33brssgo2u:6893: śāstreṇānūdyamānaṃ kartṛtvaṃ svābhāvikameva kiṃ na syādityata āha-naca svābhāvikamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6894: upādhyabhāvakāle śrutaṃ kartṛtvaṃ svābhāvikameveti śaṅkate-nanu saṃdhya iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6895: kiñca karaṇairviśiṣṭasya kartṛtve teṣāṃ kartrantarbhāvātteṣvapi kartṛvibhaktiḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:6901: na karaṇavibhaktirityuktaṃ pratyāha-bhavati ca loka iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6903: asti ca kartṛtvaprayogaḥ, 'vijñānaṃ yajñaṃ tanute'ityādāviti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6906: pūrvaṃ vijñānaṃ jīva ityaṅgīkṛtya jīvasya kartṛtve tanuta iti śrutiruktā,
GSP33brssgo2u:6907: saṃprati tayā śrutyānupahitātmanaḥ kartṛtvamiti prāptau vijñānaṃ buddhireva tasyā evātra kartṛtvamucyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:6909: 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ'ityādiśrutiṣu vijñānabdasya buddhau prasiddhatvādatra ca manomayakośānantaraṃ paṭhitatvācchraddhādiliṅgācca buddhireva vijñānamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6911: 'mahadyakṣaṃ prathamajam'ityādiśrutau hiraṇyagarbhabrahmātmakabuddherjyeṣṭhatvokteratra devairindriyairūpāsyamānaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ brahma vijñānaṃ buddhirevetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6913: kiñca śrutyantare yajñasya buddhikāryatvokteratrāpi yajñakartṛvijñānaṃ buddhirityāha-sa eṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6914: cittena dhyātvā vācā mantroktyā yajño jāyate tataścittasya vācaḥ pūrvottarabhāvo yajña ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6919: tarhi buddhyādīnāṃ kartṛtve karaṇatvavārtā teṣu na syādityata āha-upalabdhīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6920: yathā kāṣṭhānāṃ svavyāpāre kartṛtve 'pi pākāpekṣayā karaṇatvaṃ tathā buddhyādīnāmadhyavasāyasaṃkalpādikriyākartṛtve 'pyupalabdhyapekṣayā karaṇatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6921: nanu tarhyupalabdhiḥ kasya vyāpāra ityāha-sā ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6922: tarhi tasyāmātmā kevalaḥ kartā syāt, yasya yo vyāpāraḥ sa tasya karteti sthiterityata āha-naceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6923: upalabdhernityatve buddhyādīnāṃ kathaṃ karaṇatvamuktamiti ceducyate-akhaṇḍasākṣicaitanyaṃ buddhivṛttibhirbhinnaṃ sadviṣayāvācchinnatvena jāyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:6924: tathāca viṣayāvacchinnacaitanyākhyopalabdhau buddhyādīnāṃ karaṇatvaṃ buddhyādyupahitātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ na kevalasya,
GSP33brssgo2u:6925: naca buddhereva tatkartṛtvaṃ caitanyasya jaḍavyāpāratvāyogāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6926: yaccoktaṃ buddheḥ kartṛtve sa evāhandhīgamyo jīva iti tasya karaṇāntaraṃ kalpanīyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:6927: tathāca nāmamātre vivāda iti tatra kevalātmanaḥ kartṛtvamuktamiti bhrāntiṃ nirasyati-ahaṅkāreti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6928: sāṃkhyanirāsārthaṃ buddhyabhedenādhyastacidātmakāhaṅkāragataṃ kartṛtvaṃ yaduktaṃ tadahandhīgamyasya buddhiviśiṣṭātmana eva na kevalasya sākṣiṇo bhavitumarhati,
GSP33brssgo2u:6930: evaṃ viśiṣṭātmanaḥ kartṛtve viśeṣaṇībhūtāyā jaḍabuddhereva karaṇatvopapatterna karaṇāntarakalpanāprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6931: adhyāsaṃ vinā kevalabuddhikartṛtvavādinastu karaṇāntaraprasaṅgo durvāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6941: tatra prāptaṃ tāvanneśvaramapekṣate jīvaḥ kartṛtva iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6944: ayaṃ hi jīvaḥ svayameva rāgadveṣādidoṣaprayuktaḥ kārakāntarasāmagrīsamapannaḥ kartṛtvamanubhavituṃ śaknoti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6946: naca loke prasiddhirasti kṛṣyādikāsu kriyāsvanaḍudādivadīśvaro 'paro 'pekṣitavya iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6947: kleṣātmakena ca kartṛtvena jantūnsaṃsṛjata īśvarasya nairghṛṇyaṃ prasajyeta,
GSP33brssgo2u:6951: sāpekṣatvaṃ ceśvarasya saṃbhavati satorjantūnāṃ dharmādharmayostayośca sadbhāvaḥ sati jīvasya kartṛtve /
GSP33brssgo2u:6955: etāṃ prāptiṃ tuśabdena vyāvartya pratijānīte- 'parāt' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6961: yadyapi ca loke kṛṣyādiṣu karmasu neśvarakāraṇatvaṃ prasiddhaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:6963: tathāhi śrutirbhavati- 'eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamebhyo lokebhya unninīyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:6964: eṣa hyevāsādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamadho ninīṣate' (kauṣī. 3.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6967: yathā sphaṭike lauhityādhyāse lohitadravyaṃ karaṇaṃ tenāyaṃ sphaṭiko lohita ityanubhavāt,
GSP33brssgo2u:6969: tadadhyastaṃ kartṛtvamupajīvya jīvasya kārakasaṃpannatvādīśvarasya kārayitṛtvaśruteśca saṃśayamāha-yadidamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6975: pūrvaṃ jīvasya dharmādharmavattvaṃ siddhavatkṛtya tatsāpekṣatvādviṣamajagatkartṛtvamaviruddhamityuktaṃ saṃprati īśvarādhīnatve jīvasya kartṛtve siddhe dharmādharmavattvasiddhiḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:6977: īśvarasya kārayitṛtve siddhe jīvasya kartṛtvasiddhiriti cakrakāpatteḥ karmasāpekṣatvaṃ na saṃbhavatītyucyata ityāha-satyamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6979: anapekṣasya pravartakatve dharmavato narān duḥkhenādharmavataḥ sukhena yojayet,
GSP33brssgo2u:6980: kāruṇikatve vā sarve sukhena ekarūpāḥ syuruti jagadvaicitryaṃ vidhyādiśāstraṃ ca na syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:6981: tasmādvidhyādiśāstrārthavattvāya rāgadveṣāyattaṃ svata eva jīvasya kartṛtvaṃ vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:6983: īśvarastāvikā vā sā śrutiriti prāpte siddhāntayati-etāmiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6984: yathā candanādisāmagryāṃ satyāṃ dharmavyatirike sukhavyatirekagrahābhāve 'pi 'puṇyo vai puṇyena karmaṇā bhavati'ityādiśāstraprāmāṇyādeva dharmasya hetutvasiddhiḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:6989: nanvevamīśvarasya kārayitṛtve sati vaiṣamyanairghaṇye syātāmakṛtābhyāgamaśca jīvasyeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6993: kṛto yaḥ prayatno jīvasya dharmādharmalakṣaṇastadapekṣa evainamīśvaraḥ kārayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:6995: jīvakṛtadharmādharmavaiṣamyāpekṣa eva tattatphalāni viṣamaṃ vibhajetparjanyavadīśvaro nimittatvamātreṇa /
GSP33brssgo2u:6996: yathā loke nānāvidhānāṃ gucchagulmādīnāṃ vrīhiyavādīnāṃ cāsādhāraṇebhyaḥ svasvabījebhyo jāyamānānāṃ sādhāraṇaṃ nimittaṃ bhavati parjanyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6999: evaṃ jīvakṛtaprayatnāpekṣa īśvarasteṣāṃ śubhāśubhaṃ vidadhyāditi śliṣyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7000: nanu kṛtaprayatnāpekṣatvameva jīvasya parāyatte kartṛtve nopapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7004: apica pūrvaprayatnamapekṣyedānīṃ kārayati pūrvataraṃ ca prayatnamapekṣya pūrvamakārayadityanāditvātsaṃsārasyetyanavadyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7014: īśvarasya cātyantānapekṣatve laukikasyāpi puruṣakārasya vaiyarthyaṃ tathā deśakālanimittānāṃ pūrvoktadoṣaprasaṅgaścetyevañjātīyakaṃ doṣajātamādigrahaṇena darśayati // 42 //
GSP33brssgo2u:7016: yadi viśeṣahetūnāṃ sādhāraṇahetvapekṣatvānna vaiyarthyaṃ tarhi īśvarasyāpi sādhāraṇahetutvānna vaiyarthyamityāha-parjanyavaditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:7018: atidīrghavallīgranthayo gucchāḥ puṣpastabakā vā, gulmāstu hrasvavallya iti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7019: kimīśvarasya kārayitṛtve jīvasya kartṛtvaṃ na syādityāpādyate uta cakrakāpattirvā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7023: anavadyaṃ jīvasya kartṛtvamīśvarasya kārayitṛtvaṃ ceti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7025: evaṃ sāpekṣatve satyavaiyarthyaṃ bhavati, anyathānapekṣatve vaiyarthyaṃ prapañcayati-īśvara iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7026: tayoḥ sthāne sa eva niyujyeta abhiṣicyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:7027: tayoḥ kāryaṃ sa eva kuryāditi yāvat /
GSP33brssgo2u:7032: tasmāt karmasāpekṣeśvarasya kārayitṛtvāt 'eṣa hyeva'ityādiśrutervidhyādiśrutyavirodha iti siddham //42//
GSP33brssgo2u:7037: aṃśo nānāvyapadeśād anyathā cāpi dāśakitavāditvam adhīyata eke | BBs_2,3.43 |
GSP33brssgo2u:7039: sa ca saṃbaddhayoreva loke dṛṣṭo yathā svāmibhṛtyayoryathā vāgnivisphuliṅgayoḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7040: tataśca jīveśvarayorapyupakāryopakārakabhāvābhyupagamātkiṃ svāmibhṛtyavatsaṃbandha āhosvidagnivisphuliṅgavadityasyāṃ vicikitsāyāmaniyamo vā prāpnoti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7041: athavā svāmibhṛtyaprakāreṣveveśitrīśitavyabhāvasya prasiddhatvāttadvidha eva saṃbandha iti prāpnoti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7044: aṃśa ivāṃśo nahi niravayavasya mukhyoṃ'śaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:7048: 'etameva viditvā munirbhavati' ' ya ātmani tiṣṭhannātmānamantaro yamayati' iti caivañjātīyako bhedanirdeśo nāsati bhede yujyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7049: nanu cāyaṃ nānāvyapadeśaḥ sutarāṃ svāmibhṛtyasārūpye yujyata ityata āha- anyathā cāpīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7051: kiṃ tarhyanyathā cāpi vyapadeśo bhavatyanānātvasya pratipādakaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7052: tathāhi- eke śākhino dāśakitavādibhāvaṃ brahmaṇa āmanantyātharvaṇikā brahmasūkte- 'brahma dāśā brahma dāsā brahmaiveme kitavāḥ' ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7055: ye cānye kitavā dyūtakṛtaste sarve brahmaiveti hīnajantūdāharaṇena sarveṣāmeva nāmarūpakṛtakāryakaraṇasaṃghātapraviṣṭānāṃ jīvānāṃ brahmatvamāha /
GSP33brssgo2u:7056: tathānyatrāpi brahmaprakriyāyāmevāyamarthaḥ prapañcyate- 'tvaṃ strī tvaṃ pumānasi tvaṃ kumāra uta vā kumārī /
GSP33brssgo2u:7057: tvaṃ jīrṇo daṇḍena vañcasi tvaṃ jāto bhavasi viśvatomukhaḥ' (śve. 4.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7058: 'sarvāṇi rūpāṇi vicitya dhīro nāmāni kṛtvābhivadanyadāste' iti ca /
GSP33brssgo2u:7063: nityaḥ svaprakāśo 'naṇurakartā jīva'iti śodhitatvaṃpadārthasyātra brahmaikyasādhanena bhedābhedaśrutīnāṃ virodhasamādhānātpādasaṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7066: prasiddhasvasvāmitvasaṃbandhasaṃbhavādyaḥ kaścit saṃbandha ityaniyamo na yukta ityarucerāha-athaveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7070: lokasiddhānarthātmakabhedānuvāditvena bhedaśrutīnāṃ durbalatvādajñātaphalavadabhedaśrutyanusāreṇa prakalpitabhedanibandhanoṃ'śāṃśibhāvaḥ saṃbandha iti siddhāntayati-ata ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7071: agneḥ sāṃśatve 'pi niṣkaleśvarasya kathaṃ sāṃśatvamata āha-aṃśa iveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7073: bheda eva cetsvasvāmibhāvo yukto nāṃśāṃśibhāva iti śaṅkate-nanu ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7075: vañcasi gacchasi yadāste yo nāmarūpe nirmāya praviśya vyavaharanvartate taṃ vidvānamṛto bhavatīti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7089: asya sahasraśīrṣapuruṣasya tāvānprapañco mahimā vibhūtiḥ puruṣastasmātprapañcāt jyāyānmahattaraḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7092: atra bhūtaśabdasya prāṇiṣu prayogātsūtroktamantre 'pi tatheti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7093: bhūtānāṃ pādatve 'pyaṃśatvaṃ kutaḥ, tatrāha-aṃśaḥ pāda iti //44//
GSP33brssgo2u:7099: īśvaragītāsvapi ceśvaraṃśatvaṃ jīvasya smaryate- 'mamaivāṃśo jīvaloke jīvabhūtaḥ sanātanaḥ' (15.7) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7104: atrāha- nanu jīvasyeśvarāṃśatvābhyupagame tadīyena saṃsāraduḥkhopabhogenāṃśina īśvarasyāpi duḥkhitvaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7105: yathā loke hastapādādyanyatamāṅgagatena duḥkhenāṅgino devadattasya duḥkhitvaṃ tadvat /
GSP33brssgo2u:7107: ato varaṃ pūrvāvasthaḥ saṃsāra evāstviti samyagdarśanānarthakyaprasaṅgaḥ syāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:7111: aupādhike īśvarasya niyantṛtve jīva eva tanniyantā kiṃ na syādityata āha-niratiśayeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7121: yathā jīvaḥ saṃsāraduḥkhamanubhavati naivaṃ para īśvaro 'nubhavatīti pratijānīmahe /
GSP33brssgo2u:7122: jīvo hyavidyāveśavaśāddehādyātmabhāvamiva gatvā tatkṛtena duḥkhena duḥkhyahamityavidyayā kṛtaṃ duḥkhopabhogamabhimanyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7126: tataśca niścitametadavagamyate- mithyābhimānabhramanimitta eva duḥkhānubhava iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7128_0: tathāhi- putramitrādimatsu bahuṣūpaviṣṭeṣu tatsaṃbandhābhimāniṣvitareṣu ca putro
GSP33brssgo2u:7133_1: pratipadyamāneṣu tattadbhāvamiva pratipadyamāno 'pi na paramārthatastadbhāvaṃ pratipadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7134: yathā cākāśo ghaṭādiṣu gacchatsu gacchanniva vibhāvyamāno 'pi na paramārthato gacchati,
GSP33brssgo2u:7135: yathā codaśarāvādikampanāttadgate sūryapratibimbe kampamāne 'pi na tadvānsūryaḥ kampate,
GSP33brssgo2u:7136: evamavidyāpratyupasthāpite buddhyādyupahite jīvākhyeṃ'śe duḥkhāyamāne 'pi na tadvānīśvaro duḥkhāyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7138: tathācāvidyānimittajīvabhāvavyudāsena brahmabhāvameva jīvasya pratipādayanti vedāntāḥ 'tattvamasi' ityevamādayaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7146: naivaṃpara iti pratijñānaṃ vibhajate-yathā jīva iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7151: bhrāntau satyāṃ duḥkhamityanvayamuktvā bhrāntyabhāve duḥkhābhāvadarśanācca bhrāntikṛtaṃ duḥkhamiti niścīyata ityāha-vyatireketi /
GSP33brssgo2u:7153: jīvasyāpi samyagjñāne duḥkhābhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ kimu vācyaṃ nityasarvajñeśvarasyetyāha-ataśceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7154: evamaṃśitve hetoḥ sopādhikatvamuktvā yoṃ'śī sa vastutaḥ svāṃśadharmavānitī vyāptiṃ sthalatraye vyabhicārayati-prakāśādivaditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:7157: kiñca jīvasyeśvarasya vā vastuto duḥkhitvānumānaṃ na yuktamāgamabādhādityāha-tathāceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7163: smaranti ca vyāsādayo yathā jaivena duḥkhena na paramātmā duḥkhāyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7164: 'tatra yaḥ paramātmā hi sa nityo nirguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7166: karmātmā tvaparo yo 'sau mokṣabandhanaiḥ sa yujyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7167: sa saptadaśakenāpi rāśinā yujyate punaḥ' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7170: 'ekastathā sarvabhūtāntarātmā na lipyate lokaduḥkhena bāhyaḥ' (kaṭha. 5.11) iti ca // 47 //
GSP33brssgo2u:7171: atrāha- yadi tarhyeka eva sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāmantarātmā syātkathamanujñāparihārau syātāṃ lokikau vaidikau ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7175: anaṃśitvamapi hi jīvasyābhedavādinyaḥ śrutayaḥ pratipādayanti- 'tatsṛṣṭvā tadevānuprāviśat' (te. 2.6.1)
GSP33brssgo2u:7177: , 'mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati' (bṛ. 4.4.19)
GSP33brssgo2u:7182: abheda eva tvatra pratipipādayiṣito brahmātmatvapratipattau puruṣārthasiddheḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7184: naca niravayavasya brahmaṇo mukhyoṃ'śo jīvaḥ saṃbhavatītyuktam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7185: tasmātparaḥ evaikaḥ sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāmantarātmā jīvabhāvenāvasthita ityato vaktavyānujñāparihāropapattiḥ // 47 //
GSP33brssgo2u:7189: saptadaśakena daśendrayāṇi pañca prāṇaḥ mano buddiśceti saptadaśasaṃkhyāko rāśirliṅgam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7190: mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyu - iha brahmaṇi yo nāneva kalpitabhedaśāli cetanācetanātmakaṃ viśvaṃ paśyati sa mṛtyoranantaraṃ mṛtyuṃ janmamaraṇādiparamparārūpaṃ saṃsāraṃ prāpnotītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7194: daśendriyāṇi pañca prāṇāḥ mano buddhiśceti saptadaśasaṃkhyāko rāśirliṅgam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7198: yato bāhyo 'saṅgastasmānna lipyate evamaṃśitvakṛtamīśvare doṣaṃ nirasyāṃśa ityuktaṃ jīvasyāṃśatvaṃ dehādyupādhikamiti sphuṭayitumatyantasvarūpaikyamādāyākṣipati-atrāhetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7201: niravayavabrahmaṇo mukhyāṃśo na saṃbhavatīti vadatā siddhāntinā bhedo nāstītyuktaṃ bhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:7203: na vayaṃ bhedasyāsattvaṃ naraśṛṅgavadbrūmaḥ, kintu mithyātvaṃ vadāmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7220: dṛṣṭā ca sā sarvaprāṇināmahaṃ gacchāmyahamāgacchāmyahamandho 'hamanandho 'haṃ mūḍho 'hamamūḍha ityevamātmikā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7233: satyaṃ vyatirekadarśino niyojyatvaṃ tathāpi vyomādivaddehādyasaṃhatatvamapaśyata evātmano niyojyatvābhimānaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7241: yathāca prakāśa ekasyāpi savituramedhyadeśasaṃbaddhaḥ parihriyate netaraḥ śucibhūmiṣṭhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7244: yathā mūtraparīṣaṃ gavāṃ pavitratayā parigṛhyate tadeva jātyantare parivarjyate tadvat // 48 //
GSP33brssgo2u:7249: nanu bhrānteḥ kutaścinnivṛttau vyavahāravicchedaḥ syādityata āha-na hyasyā ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7260: ajñasyāpi bhrāntyabhāvakāle niyojyatvaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ kimu vācyamātmavida ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7262: viṣayavairāgyasya jñānārthamabhyastasya jñānānantaramanuvṛttyā viṣayeṣu pravartakarāganivṛtternātiprasaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7272: yatsvayaṃ karmaphalasaṃbandhaḥ sa caikātmyābhyupagame vyatikīryeta svāmyekatvāditi cet /
GSP33brssgo2u:7275: nahi kartṛbhoktṛścātmanaḥ saṃtataḥ sarvaiḥ śarīraiḥ saṃbandho 'sti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7278: tataśca karmavyatikaraḥ phalavyatikaro vā na bhaviṣyati // 49 //
GSP33brssgo2u:7281: tasmātsvargī narakī ceti vyavasthāsiddhaye ātmasvarūpabhedo vācya iti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7282: bhavettadā sāṃkaryaṃ yadyanupahitātmana eva bhoktṛtvaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7286: tathāca buddheḥ paradehāsaṃbandhāttadupahitajīvasya nāsti paradehasaṃbandha iti buddhibhedena bhoktṛbhedānna karmādisāṃkaryamiti samādhānārthaḥ //49//
GSP33brssgo2u:7291: ābhāsa eva caiṣa jīvaḥ parasyātmano jalasūryakādivatpratipattavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7294: ataśca yathā naikasmiñjalasūryake kampamāne jalasūryakāntaraṃ kampate,
GSP33brssgo2u:7299: yeṣāṃ tu bahava ātmānaste ca sarve sarvagatāsteṣāmevaiṣa vyatikaraḥ prāpnoti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7301: bahavo vibhavaścātmānaścaitanyamātrasvarūpā nirguṇā niratiśayāśca tadarthaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ pradhānaṃ tannimittaiṣāṃ bhogāpavargasiddhiriti sāṃkhyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7302: sati bahutve vibhutve ca ghaṭakuḍyādisamānā dravyamātrasvarūpāḥ svato 'cetanā ātmanastadupakaraṇāni cāṇūni manāṃsyacetanāni /
GSP33brssgo2u:7303: tatrātmadravyāṇāṃ manodravyāṇāṃ ca saṃyogānnavecchādayo vaiśeṣikā ātmaguṇā utpadyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:7304: te cāvyatirekeṇa pratyekamātmasu samavayanti sa saṃsāraḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7306: tatra sāṃkhyānāṃ tāvaccaitanyasvarūpatvātsarvātmanāṃ saṃnidhānādyaviśeṣāccaikasya sukhaduḥkhasaṃbandhe sarveṣāṃ sukhaduḥkhasaṃbandhaḥ prāpnoti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7314: asatyāṃ punarupapattau kāmaṃ mā bhūdabhilaṣitaṃ puruṣakaivalyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7316: kāṇādānāmapi yadaikenātmanā manaḥ saṃyujyate tadātmāntarairapi nāntarīyakaḥ saṃyogaḥ syātsaṃnidhānādyaviśeṣāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7317: tataśca hetvaviśeṣātphalāviśeṣa ityekasyātmanaḥ sukhaduḥkhayoge sarvātmanāmapi samānaṃ sukhaduḥkhitvaṃ prasajyeta // 50 //
GSP33brssgo2u:7319: saṃprati evakāreṇāvacchedapakṣāruciṃ sūcayan 'rūpaṃ rūpaṃ pratirūpo babhūva'ityādiśrutisiddhaṃpratibimbapakṣamupanyasyati bhagavān sūtrakāraḥ-ābhāsa eva ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7321: nāpi tato bhinnaḥ, 'sa eṣa iha praviṣṭaḥ'ityādyabhedaśrutismṛtivirodhāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7323: asmin pakṣe buddhipratibimbabhedātsvargī nārakītyādivyavasthā jīvatvasyāvidyakatvādvidyayā mokṣaścetyupapadyata ityāha-ataścetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7324: yastvayaṃ bhāskarasya pralāpaḥ pratibimbasya nopādhisaṃsṛṣṭatayā kalpitatvaṃ kintu svarūpeṇaiva,
GSP33brssgo2u:7325: ataḥ kalpitapratibimbasya muktau sthityayogānna jīvatvamiti sa siddhāntarahasyājñānakṛta ityupekṣaṇīyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7326: yadi darpaṇe mukhaṃ śuktau rajatavatkalpitaṃ syāttadā nedaṃ rajatamiti svarūpabādhavannedaṃ mukhamiti bādhaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7335: sarveṣāṃ puṃsāṃ prakṛtisāṃnidhyādyaviśeṣe 'pi prakṛtireva pratipuruṣaṃ niyamena bhogāpavargārthaṃ pravartate,
GSP33brssgo2u:7337: anyathā niyatapravṛttyanaṅgīkāre svamāhātmyakhyāpanārthā pradhānasya pravṛttirityuddeśyavighātaḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7340: yo hi niyāmakabhāvenoddeśyavighātamāpādayati taṃ prati tasyaivāpādanamiṣṭamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7344: yadātmādṛṣṭakṛto yo manaḥsaṃyogaḥ sa tadātmana eva sukhādiheturiti vyavasthāṃ śaṅkate-syādetaditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:7354: sāṃkhyānāṃ tāvattadanātmasamavāyi pradhānavarti pradhānasādhāraṇyānna pratyātmaṃ sukhaduḥkhopabhogasya niyāmakamupapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7355: kāṇādānāmapi pūrvavatsādhāraṇenātmamanaḥsaṃyogena nirvartitasyādṛṣṭasyāpyasyaivātmana idamadṛṣṭamiti niyame hetvabhāvādeṣa eva doṣaḥ // 51 //
GSP33brssgo2u:7357: ahamidaṃ phalaṃ prāpnavānīdaṃ pariharāṇītthaṃ prayatā itthaṃ karavāṇītyevaṃvidhā abhisaṃdhyādayaḥ pratyātmaṃ pravartamānā adṛṣṭasyātmanāṃ ca svasvāmibhāvaṃ niyaṃsyantīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7365: abhisaṃdhyādīnāmapi sādhāraṇenaivātmamanaḥsaṃyogena sarvātmasaṃnidhau kriyamāṇānāṃ niyamahetutvānupapatteruktadoṣānuṣaṅga eva // 52 //
GSP33brssgo2u:7372_0: athocyeta vibhutve 'pyatmanaḥ śarīrapratiṣṭhena manasā saṃyogaḥ śarīrāvacchinna evātmapradeśe
GSP33brssgo2u:7372_1: bhaviṣyatīti ataḥ pradeśakṛtā vyavasthābhisaṃdhyādīnāmadṛṣṭasya sukhaduḥkhayośca bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7377: tatra na vaiśeṣikaiḥ śarīrāvacchinno 'pyātmānaḥ pradeśaḥ kalpayituṃ śakyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7378: kalpyamāno 'pyayaṃ niṣpradeśasyātmanaḥ pradeśaḥ kālpanikatvādeva na pāramārthikaṃ kāryaṃ niyantuṃ śaknoti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7379: śarīramapi sarvātmasaṃnidhāvutpadyamānamasyaivātmano netareṣāmiti na niyantuṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7380: pradeśaviśeṣābhyupagame 'pi ca dvayorātmanoḥ samānasukhaduḥkhabhājoḥ kadācidekenaiva tāvaccharīreṇopabhogasiddhiḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7382_1: yajñadattaśarīre ca taṃ pradeśamanuprāpte tasyāpītareṇa samānaḥ sukhaduḥkhānubhavo
GSP33brssgo2u:7382_2: dṛśyate sa na syādyadi devadattayajñadattayoḥ samānapradeśamaniṣṭaṃ na syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7403: kāryamabhisaṃdhyādikaṃ yasyātmano yaccharīraṃ tatra tasyaiva bhoga iti vyavasthāmāśaṅkyāha-śarīramapīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7405: yasminnātmapradeśe 'dṛṣṭotpattiḥ sa kiṃ calaḥ sthito vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7407: dvitīye tasminneva pradeśe parasyāpi bhogadarśanādadṛṣṭamastītyekenāpi śarīreṇa dvayorātmanorbhogaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7409_0: kiñca yattu yatrātmanaḥ pradeśe śarīrādisaṃyogādadṛṣṭamutpannaṃ tattatraivācalapradeśe
GSP33brssgo2u:7409_1: sthitamiti svargādiśarīrāvacchinnātmanyadṛṣṭābhāvādbhogo na syādataḥ pradeśabhedo na vyavasthāpakaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7413: yadapi kecidāhuḥ-manasa ekatve 'pyātmanāṃ bhedena saṃyogavyaktīnāṃ bhedātkayācitsaṃyogavyaktyā kasmiṃścedevātmanyadṛṣṭādikamityasāṃkaryamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7419: kiñca bahūnāṃ vibhutve samānadeśatvaṃ vācyaṃ, taccāyuktamadṛṣṭatvādityāha-vadeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7420: nanu rūparasādīnāmekaghaṭasthatvaṃ dṛṣṭamiti cet, nāyamasmatsaṃmato dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7424: tathāca devadattātmā yajñadattātmano na bhinnaḥ ātmatvāt, yajñadattātmavat /
GSP33brssgo2u:7426: nityadravyamātravṛttayo viśeṣāste ca svayaṃ svāśrayavyāvartakā eva na sveṣāṃ vyāvartakamapekṣanta ityantyā ucyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:7432: yattu bahūnāṃ vibhutve ākāśadikkālā dṛṣṭānta iti so 'pyasaṃmata ityāha-ākāśādīnāmiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7435: evaṃ bhūtabhoktṛśrutīnāṃ virodhābhāvādbrahmaṇyadvaye samanvaya iti siddham //53//
GSP33brssgo2u:7437: iti śrīgovindabhagavatpūjyapādaśiṣyaśrīmacchaṅkarabhagavatpūjyapādakṛtau śrīśārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye dvitīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ // 3 //
GSP33brssgo2u:7438: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //3//
GSP33brssgo2u:7453: iti caivamādiṣūtpattiprakaraṇeṣu prāṇānāmutpajirnāmnāyate kvaciccānutpattirevaiṣāmāmnāyate 'asadvā idamagra āsīt' (tai. 2.7)
GSP33brssgo2u:7456: prāṇā vāva ṛṣayaḥ' ityatra prāgutpatteḥ prāṇānāṃ sadbhāvaśravaṇāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7457: anyatra tu prāṇānāmapyutpattiḥ paṭhyate- 'yathāgnerjvalataḥ kṣudrā visphuliṅgā vyuccarantyevamevaitasmādātmanaḥ sarve prāṇāḥ' iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:7460: iti, 'sa prāṇamasṛjata prāṇācchraddhāṃ khaṃ vāyurjyotirāpaḥ pṛthivīndriyaṃ mano 'nnam' (pra. 6.4)
GSP33brssgo2u:7478: atra prāṇotpattivādivākyajātamujadāharaṇam- 'etasmādātmanaḥ sarve prāṇāḥ sarve lokāḥ sarve devāḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni vyuccaranti' (bṛ. 2.1.20) ityevañjātīyakam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7479: tatra yathā lokādayaḥ parasmādbrahmaṇa utpadyante tathā prāṇā apītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7480: tathā- 'etasmājjāyate prāṇo manaḥ sarvendriyāṇi ca khaṃ vāyurjyotirāpaḥ pṛthivī viśvasya dhāriṇī' (muṇḍa. 2.1.3)
GSP33brssgo2u:7483: yathātītānantarapādādyuktā viyadādayaḥ parasya brahmaṇo vikārāḥ samadhigatāstathā prāṇā api parasya brahmaṇo vikārā iti yojayitavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7486: nanu keṣucitpradeśeṣu na prāṇānāmutpattiḥ śrūyata ityuktaṃ tadayuktam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7493: yathā tṛtīyādhyaye caturthapādeṣvapratigraheṣvadhikaraṇapūrvapakṣanyāyo bahusūtravyavahito 'pi somavamane parāmṛśyate tadvadatrāpi jñeyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7494: pūrvādhikaraṇe kartuḥ svarūpaṃ vicārya tadupakaraṇānāmindriyāṇāmutpatti sādhayati-tathā prāṇāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7495: bhūtabhoktṛvicārānantaraṃ bhautikaprāṇavicāra iti hetuhetumadbhāvaṃ pādayoḥ saṃgatimāha-viyadādīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7499: te kimutpadyante na veti śrutīnāṃ vipratipattyā saṃśaye tāsāṃ samabalatvādanirṇaya ityaprāmāṇyamiti pūrvapakṣaphalaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7508: yadyapyadṛṣṭavatprāṇā apyaniyatā iti sūtramanveti tathāpi punaruktam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7517_1: kimiyaṃ vāruṇīṣṭirdāturuta pratigrahīturiti viśaye 'pratigṛhṇīyāt'iti śruteḥ pratigrahīturityāśaṅkya
GSP33brssgo2u:7518: ataḥ pratigṛhṇīyādityasya padasyāśvān yaḥ pratigrāhayedityarthaḥ dadyāditi yāvat /
GSP33brssgo2u:7519: 'yo 'śvadātā sa vāruṇīmiṣṭiṃ kuryāt'iti vākyārthe sthite cintā-aśvadānanimitteyamiṣṭiḥ kiṃ laukike 'śvadāne vaidike veti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7521_1: syāditi sūtreṇa prāpte siddhāntaḥ-'atra hi varuṇo vā etaṃ gṛhṇāti yo 'śvaṃ pratigṛhṇāti'iti
GSP33brssgo2u:7523: naca laukike 'śvadāne 'yaṃ rogo bhavati iti prasiddham /
GSP33brssgo2u:7526: naca vṛṇotīti vyutpattyā varuṇaśabdo niṣedhātikramakṛtadoṣānuvādaka iti yuktaṃ, rūḍhityāgāpātāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7527: tattyāge ca vaidike 'pi dāne 'śvatyāgajanyaduḥkhaṃ prāptamuktavyutpattyā śaknotyanuvadituṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7529: somapāne kriyamāṇe vyāpadvamanaṃ yadi syāttadā 'etaṃ saumendraṃ śyāmākaṃ caruṃ nirvapet'iti śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7531_0: tadvallaukike dhātusāmyārthaṃ pītasomasya vamane 'yaṃ caruḥ syādvamananimittendriyaśoṣākhyadoṣasya
GSP33brssgo2u:7531_1: dṛṣṭasya 'indriyeṇa vīryeṇa vyṛdhyate yaḥ somaṃ vamati'ityanuvādāditi pūrvapakṣasūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7532: vaidike tu somapāne śeṣapratipatterjātatvādvamane 'pina doṣa iti siddhāntaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7534: vede tu 'mā me vāṅnābhimatigāḥ'iti sāmyagjaraṇārthamantraliṅgādvamane karmavaiguṇyāttasya doṣatā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7546: iti hyekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ pratijñāya tatsādhanāyedamāmnāyate- 'etasmājjāyate prāṇaḥ' (muṇḍa. 2.1.3) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo2u:7547: sā ca pratijñā prāṇādeḥ samastasya jāgato brahmavikāratve sati prakṛtivyatirekeṇa vikārābhāvātsiddhyati /
GSP33brssgo2u:7549: tathāca pratijñātārthamupasaṃharati- 'puruṣa evedaṃ viśvaṃ karma tapo brahma parāmṛtam' (muṇḍa. 2.2.11)
GSP33brssgo2u:7551: tathā 'ātmano vā are darśanena śravaṇena matyā vijñānenedaṃ sarvaṃ viditam' ityevañjātīyakāsu śrutiṣveṣaiva pratijñā yojayitavyā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7556: avāntaraprakṛtiviṣayaṃ tvetatsvavavikārāpekṣaṃ pragutpatteḥ prāṇānāṃ sadbhāvāvadhāraṇamiti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7558: viyadadhikaraṇe hi 'gauṇyasaṃbhavāt' iti pūrvapakṣasūtratvādgauṇī janmaśrutirasaṃbhavāditi vyākhyātam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7561: tadanurodena tvihāpi gauṇī janmaśrutisaṃbhavāditi vyācakṣāṇaiḥ pratijñāhānirupekṣitā syāt // 2 //
GSP33brssgo2u:7562: nanu pratijñāpi gauṇī kaṃ na syādityata āha-tathāca pratijñātārthamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7567: nedaṃ vākyaṃ mahāpralaye paramakāraṇasya brahmaṇaḥ prāṇavattvaparaṃ kintvavāntarapralaye hiraṇyagarbhākhyāvāntaraprakṛtirūpaprāṇasadbhāvaparamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7568: nanu hiraṇyagarbharūpavikārasya sattve kathaṃ tadā vikārāsattvakathanaṃ, tatrāha-svavikāreti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7570_0: nanu yathāśruti mahāpralaye prāṇasadbhāvarūpaṃ liṅgaṃ prāṇānutpattisādhakaṃ kimityavāntarapralayaparatayā
GSP33brssgo2u:7570_1: nīyata iti cet 'etasmājjāyate prāṇaḥ'ityādi prabalajanmaśrutibalāditi vadāmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7571: nanu vikārasya brahmaṇaḥ kathaṃ prakṛtitvamityata āha-vyākṛteti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7572: 'hiraṇyagarbheḥ samavartatāgre'ityādiśrutau 'ādikartā sa bhūtānāṃ'ityādi smṛtau ca vikārātmanāmapi mūlakāraṇāvasthārūpāṇāṃ brahmavirāḍādīnāṃ prakṛtivikārabhāvena prasiddhirasti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7581: yajjāyata ityekaṃ janmavācipadaṃ prāṇeṣu prākśrutaṃ saduttareṣvapyākāśādiṣvanuvartate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7583: ityatrākāśādiṣu mukhyaṃ janmeti pratiṣṭhāpitaṃ tatsāmānyātprāṇeṣvapi mukhyameva janma bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo2u:7584: nahyekasminprakaraṇa ekasmiṃśca vākya ekaḥ śabdaḥ sakṛduccarito bahubhiḥ saṃbadhyamānaḥ kvacinmukhyaḥ kvacidgauṇa ityadhyavasātuṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7587: ityatrāpi prāṇeṣu śrutaḥ sṛjatiḥ pareṣvapyutpattimatsu śraddhādiṣvanuṣajyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7588: yatrāpi paścacchruta utpattivacanaḥ śabdaḥ pūrvaiḥ saṃbadhyate tatrāpyeṣa eva nyāyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7589: yathā 'sarvāṇi bhūtāni vyuccaranti' ityayamante paṭhito vyuccarantiśabdaḥ pūrvairapi prāṇādibhiḥ saṃbadhyate // 3 //
GSP33brssgo2u:7590: tasya jāyata iti padasyākāśādiṣu mukhyasya pāṭhāpekṣayā prācīneṣu prāṇeṣu śrutermukhyaṃ janmeti sūtrayojanā-tatsāmānyāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:7592: ekasminvākye ekasya śabdasya kvacinmukhyatvaṃ kvacidgauṇatvamiti vairūpyaṃ na yuktamiti nyāyamanyatrāpyatidiśati-yatrāpi paścācchruta iti //3//
GSP33brssgo2u:7600: tathāpi brahmaprakṛtikatejobannapīrvakatvābhidhānādvākprāṇamanasāṃ tatsāmānyācca sarveṣāmeva prāṇānāṃ brahmaprabhavatvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:7601: tathāhi- asminneva prakaraṇe tejobannapūrvakatvaṃ vākprāṇamanasāmāmnāyate- 'annamayaṃ hi somya mana āpomayaḥ prāṇastejomayī vāk' (chā. 6.5.4) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7602: tatra yadi tāvanmukhyamevaiṣāmannādimayatvaṃ tato vartata eva brahmaprabhavatvam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7603: atha bhāktaṃ tatāpi brahmakartṛkāyāṃ nāmarūpavyākriyāyāṃ śravaṇāt 'yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavati' (chā. 6.1.3)
GSP33brssgo2u:7607: yaccoktaṃ chāndogye 'pi prāṇānāmutpattirna śrūyata iti, tatrāha-tatpūrvakatvādvāca iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7611: atra mayaḍvikāre mukhya iti pakṣe vartata eva prāṇānāṃ brahmakāryatvaṃ tejobannānāṃ brahmavikāratvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7612_1: vikāratve bhūtādhīnasthitikatvaṃ liṅgaṃ mayaṭoktamiti siddhaṃ brahmakāryatvaṃ 'sa
GSP33brssgo2u:7613: tasmātprāṇānāmutpattiśrutīnāṃ sadbhāvaśrutyavirodhātkāraṇe brahmaṇi samanvaya iti siddham /
GSP33brssgo2u:7623: saṃprati tu katītare prāṇā iti saṃpradhārayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:7625: kvacitsapta prāṇāḥ saṃkīrtyante- 'sapta prāṇāḥ prabhavanti tasmāt' (muṇḍa. 2.1.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7626: kvaciccāṣṭau prāṇā grahatvena guṇena saṃkīrtyante- ' aṣṭau grahā aṣṭāvatigrahāḥ'' (bṛ. 3.2.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7627: kvacinnava- 'sapta vai śīrṣaṇyāḥ prāṇā dvāvavāñcau' (tai. saṃ. 5.1.7.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7628: kvaciddaśa- 'nava vai puruṣe prāṇā nābhirdaśamī' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7632: evaṃ hi vipratipannāḥ prāṇeyattāṃ prati śrutayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7636: yatastāvanto 'vagamyante- 'sapta prāṇāḥ prabhavanti tasmāt' (muṇḍa. 2.1.8) ityevaṃvidhāsu śrutiṣu /
GSP33brssgo2u:7641: puruṣabhedābhiprāyeyaṃ vīpsā pratipuruṣaṃ sapta sapta prāṇā iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:7642: na tattvabhedābhiprāyā sapta saptānye 'nye prāṇā iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7643: nanvaṣṭatvādikāpi saṃkhāyā prāṇeṣūdāhṛtā kathaṃ saptaiva syuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7655: evaṃ janmalabdhasattākānāṃ prāṇānāmupajīvyopajīvakatvasaṃgatyā sāṃkhyāṃ nirṇetuṃ śrutīnāṃ virodhātsaṃśaye pūrvapakṣayati-saptagaterviśeṣitatvācca /
GSP33brssgo2u:7658: pañca dhīndriyāṇi vāṅmanaśceti sapta prāṇā eta eva hastena sahāṣṭau /
GSP33brssgo2u:7660: gṛhṇanti badhnantīti grahā indriyāṇi teṣāṃ bandhakatvaṃ viṣayādhīnamityatigrahāḥ grahānatikrāntā viṣayā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7661: dve śrotre dve cakṣuṣi dve ghrāṇe vākceti sapta śīrṣṇi bhavāḥ prāṇā dvāvavāñcau pāyūpasthau ceti nava,
GSP33brssgo2u:7662: jñānakarmendriyāṇi daśeme puruṣe dehe prāṇāḥ ātmā mana ekādaśa prāṇā iti siddhāntakoṭiruktā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7665: śrutitaḥ saptatvāvagaterye śīrṣaṇyāḥ sapta te prāṇā iti śīrṣaṇyoddeśena prāṇatvaviśeṣaṇādvā śīrṣaṇyānāṃ prāṇatvaśabditā,
GSP33brssgo2u:7677: hastādayastvapare saptabhyo 'tiriktāḥ prāṇāḥ śrūyante- 'hastau vai grahaḥ sa karmaṇātigraheṇa gṛhīto hastābhyāṃ hi karma karoti' (bṛ. 3.2.8)
GSP33brssgo2u:7680: hīnādhikasaṃkhyāvipratipattau hyadhikā saṃkhyā saṃgrāhyā bhavati tasyāṃ hīnāntarbhavati natu hīnāyāmadhikā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7681: ataśca naivaṃ mantavyaṃ stokakalpanānurodhātsaptaiva prāṇāḥ syuriti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7683: tathā codāhṛtā śrutiḥ - 'daśeme puruṣe prāṇā ātmaikādaśaḥ' (bṛ. 3.9.4) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7687: nanvekādaśābhyaḥ kāryajātebhyo 'dhikaṃ kāryajātamasti yadarthamadhikaṃ karaṇaṃ kalpyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:7689: vacanādānaviharaṇotsargānandāḥ pañca karmabhedāstadarthāni ca pañca karmendriyāṇi /
GSP33brssgo2u:7691: tadeva vṛttibhedāt kvacidbhinnavadvyapadiśyate- 'mano buddhiraṅaṃkāraścittaṃ ca' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7692: tathāca śrutiḥ kāmādyā nānāvidhā vṛttiranukramyāha- 'etatsarvaṃ mana eva' (bṛ. 1.5.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7693: apica saptaiva śīrṣaṇyānprāṇānabhimanyamānasya catvāra eva prāṇā abhimatāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7694: sthānabhedāddhyete catvāraḥ santaḥ sapta gaṇyante 'dve śrotre dve cakṣuṣī dve nāsike ekā vāk' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7695: naca tāvatāmeva vṛttibhedā itare prāṇā iti śakyate vaktuṃ, hastādivṛttīnāmatyantavijātīyatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7697: ityatrāpi dehacchidrabhedābhiprāyeṇaiva daśa prāṇā ucyante na prāṇatattvabhedābhiprāyeṇa /
GSP33brssgo2u:7700: mukhyasya tu prāṇasya bhavati nābhirapyekaṃ viśeṣāyatanamityato nābhirdaśamītyucyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7702: tadevaṃ vicitre prāṇeyattāmnāne sati kva kiṃparamāmnānamiti vivektavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7705: saptaiva prāṇāḥ syuryataḥ saptānāmeva gatiḥ śrūyate- 'tamutkrāmantaṃ prāṇo 'nūtkrāmantaṃ sarve prāṇā anūtkrāmanti' (bṛ. 4.4.2) ityatra /
GSP33brssgo2u:7706: nanu sarvaśabdo 'pyatra paṭhyate, tatkathaṃ saptanāmeva gatiḥ pratijñāyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7708: saptaiva hi prāṇāścakṣurādayastvakparyantā viśeṣitā iha prakṛtāḥ 'sa yatraiva cākṣuṣaḥ puruṣaḥ parāṅparyāvartate 'thārūpajño bhavati' (bṛ. 4.4.1)
GSP33brssgo2u:7711: prakṛtagāmī ca sarvaśabdo bhavati yathā sarve brāhmaṇā bhojayitavyā iti ye nimantritāḥ prakṛtā brāhmaṇāsta eva sarvaśabdenocyante nānye /
GSP33brssgo2u:7712: evamihāpi ye prakṛtāḥ sapta prāṇāsta eva sarvaśabdenocyante nānya iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7717: evaṃprāpte brūmaḥ - hastādayastvapare saptabhyo 'tiriktāḥ prāṇāḥ pratīyante-' hastau vai grahaḥ' (bṛ. 3.2.8) ityādiśrutiṣu /
GSP33brssgo2u:7718: grahatvaṃ ca bandhanabhāvo gṛhyate,badhyate kṣetrajño 'nena grahasaṃjñakena bandhaneneti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7719: sa ca kṣetrajño naikasminneva śarīre badhyate, śarīrāntareṣvi tulyatvādbandhanasya /
GSP33brssgo2u:7721: tathāca smṛtiḥ - puryaṣṭakena liṅgena prāṇādyena sa yujyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7722: tena baddhasya vai bandho mokṣo muktasya tena ca /
GSP33brssgo2u:7724_0: ātharvaṇe ca viṣayendriyānukramaṇe cakṣuṣa draṣṭavyaṃ ca ityatra tulyavaddhastādīnīndriyāṇi
GSP33brssgo2u:7724_1: saviṣayāṇyanukrāmati-' hastau cādātavyaṃ copasthaścānandayitavyaṃ ca pāyuśca visarjayitavyaṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:7724_2: ca pādau ca gantavyaṃ ca' ( pra. 4.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7725: tathā 'daśeme puruṣe prāṇā ātmaikādaśaste yadāsmāccharīrānmartyādutkrāmantyatha rodayanti' (bṛ. 3.9.4)
GSP33brssgo2u:7728: sarvaśabdo 'pi ca prāṇaśabdena saṃbadhyamāno 'śeṣānprāṇānabhidadhāno na prakaraṇavaśena saptasvevāvasthāpayituṃ śakyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:7730: sarve brāhmaṇā bhojayitavyā ityatrāpi sarveṣāmevāvanivartināṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ grahaṇaṃ nyāyyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7738: FN: guhāyāṃ hṛdaye śerata iti guhāśayāḥ svastāneṣu nihitāḥ nikṣiptāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7743: prāṇādipañcakaṃ bhūtasūkṣmapañcakaṃ jñānendriyapañcakaṃ karmendriyapañcakaṃ antaḥkaraṇacatuṣṭayaṃ avidyā kāmaḥ karma ceti paryuṣṭakam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7747: tato varaṃ prāthamikasaptatve 'ntarbhāvaḥ lāghavāditi prāpte siddhāntayati-atreti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7750: ato 'dhikasaṃkhyāyā nyūnāyāmantarbhāvāyogātsaptaiva prāṇāḥ syurlāghavānurodhādityevaṃ na mantavyamityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7752: 'śrutīnāṃ mitho virodhe sati mānāntarānugṛhītā śrutirbalīyasī'iti nyāyena kāryaliṅgānumānānugṛhītaikādaśaprāṇaśrutyanusāreṇānyāḥ śrutayo neyā ityabhisaṃdhāyāha-satyamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7759: teṣāṃ tadvṛttitve badhirādīnāmādānādi na syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7760: kathaṃ tarhi chidre prāṇaśabda ityāśaṅkya lakṣaṇayetyāha-mukhyasya tviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7764: nanvidaṃ sūtravyākhyānamasaṃgataṃ pañcadhīndriyāvāṅmanasāṃ saptatvāvagatiḥ śīrṣaṇyānāṃ caturṇāṃ viśeṣitatvamiti hetorvaiyadhikaraṇyāduktaparisaṃkhyādoṣāccetyarucerāha-iyamapareti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7766: taṃ jīvātmānaṃ ye prāṇāḥ saha gacchanti teṣāmeva bhogahetutvādindriyatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7767: vipannāvasthāyāmeva cākṣupaścakṣuṣi sthito 'nugrāhakasūryāṃśarūpaḥ puruṣaḥ parāṅ paryāvartate bahirdeśātsvāṃśinaṃ surye pratigacchati /
GSP33brssgo2u:7769: devāṃśe devaṃ praviṣṭe liṅgāṃśaścakṣurhṛdaye manasaikībhavati tadāyaṃ na paśyatīti pārśvasthā āhurityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7770: ādipadāt 'na jighrati na vadati na ramayate na śṛṇoti na manute na spṛśati na vijānāti'iti gṛhyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7774_1: kāmaḥ karma ceti puryaṣṭakamātmano jñāpakatvālliṅgaṃ sati saṃbhave sarvaśrutisaṃkoco
GSP33brssgo2u:7783: aṇutvaṃ caiṣāṃ saukṣmyaparicchedau na paramāṇutulyatvaṃ, kṛtsnadehavyāpikāryānupapattiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7784: sūkṣmā ete prāṇāḥ sthūlāścetsyurmaraṇakāle śarīrānnirgacchanto bilādahirivopalabhyeranmriyamāṇasya pārśvasthaiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7789: yadeva hyupalabdhisādhanaṃ vṛttiranyadvā tasyaiva naḥ karaṇatvaṃ saṃjñāmātre vivāda iti karaṇānāṃ vyāpitvakalpanā nirarthikā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7795: 'prāṇāḥ sarve 'nantāḥ'iti śruterindriyāṇāṃ vibhutvātteṣāmutkrāntirasiddhā kintu tattaddehe teṣāmabhivyaktirūpāḥ prādeśikyo vṛttayaḥ santi na tāsāmutkrāntyādiriti sāṃkhyānāmākṣepaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7796: tatsaṃgatyā prāṇāḥ kiṃparimāṇā iti saṃdehe siddhāntayati-adhunetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7815: nāsadāsīye hi brahmapradhāne sūkte mantravarṇo bhavati 'na mṛtyurāsīdamṛtaṃ na tarhi na rātryā ahnu āsītpraketaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7816: ānīdavātaṃ svadhayā tadekaṃ tasmāddhānyanna paraḥ kiñcanāsa' (ṛ.saṃ. 8.7.17) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7822: 'aprāṇo hyamanāḥ śubhraḥ' iti ca mulaprakṛteḥ prāṇādisamastaviśeṣarahitatvasya darśitatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7824: śreṣṭha iti ca mukhyaṃ prāṇamabhidadhāti- 'prāṇo vāva jyeṣṭhaśca śreṣṭhaśca' (chā. 5.1.1)
GSP33brssgo2u:7827: na cetasya tadānīṃ vṛttilābhaḥ syādyonau niṣiktaṃ śukraṃ pūyeta na saṃbhavedvā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7829: śreṣṭhaśca prāṇo guṇādhikyāt, 'na vai śakṣyāmastvadṛte jīvitum' (bṛ. 6.1.13) iti śruteḥ // 8 //
GSP33brssgo2u:7831: FN: tarhi tadā pralayakāle mṛtyurmārako mṛtyumatkāryaṃ vā nāsīt,
GSP33brssgo2u:7833: rātryāḥ praketaścihnarūpaścandraḥ ahaḥ praketaḥ sūryaśca nāstāṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7839: nanu prāṇo jāyate na veti saṃśayābhāvādatideśo na yukta ityākṣipati-kimartha iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7842: tarhi tadā pralayakāle mṛtyurmārako mṛtyumatkāryaṃ vā nāsīt,
GSP33brssgo2u:7844: rātryāḥ praketaścihnarūpaścandraḥ ahnaḥ praketaḥ sūryaśca nāstāṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7847: yadvā svena dhṛtā māyā svadhā tayā saha tadekaṃ brahmānīdāsīditi paramārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7849: tasmādbrahmaṇaḥ paraḥ paramutkṛṣṭamanyacca kimapi na babhūvetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7850: parihāraḥ subodhaḥ nanu śreṣṭhaśabdasya prāṇe prasiddhyabhāvātkathaṃ sūtramiti,
GSP33brssgo2u:7862: sa punarmukhyaḥ prāṇaḥ kiṃsvarūpa itīdānīṃ jijñāsyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7864: evaṃ hi śrūyate- 'yaḥ prāṇaḥ sa vāyuḥ sa eṣa vāyuḥ pañcavidhaḥ prāṇo 'pāno vyāna udānaḥ samānaḥ' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7866: evaṃ hi tantrāntarīyā ācakṣate- 'sāmānyā karaṇavṛttiḥ prāṇādyā vāyavaḥ pañce' ti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7867: atrocyate- na vāyuḥ prāṇo nāpi karaṇavyāpāraḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7869: vāyostāvatprāṇasya pṛthagupadeśo bhavati- 'prāṇa eva brahmaṇaścaścaturthaḥ pādaḥ sa vāyunā jyotiṣā bhāti ca tapati ca' (chāndo. 3.18.4) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7874: nahi karaṇavyāpāra eva san karaṇebhyaḥ pṛthagupadiśyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:7876: khaṃ vāyuḥ' (mu. 2.1.3) ityevamādayo 'pi vāyoḥ karaṇebhyaśca prāṇasya pṛthagupadeśā anusartavyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7877: naca samastānāṃ karaṇānāmekā vṛttiḥ saṃbhavati, pratyekamekaikavṛttitvātsamudāyasya cākārakatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7879: yathaitapañjaravartina ekādaśapakṣiṇaḥ pratyekaṃ pratiniyatavyāpārāḥ santaḥ saṃbhūyaikaṃ pañjaraṃ cālayanti,
GSP33brssgo2u:7880: evamekaśarīravartina ekādaśa prāṇāḥ pratyekaṃ pratiniyatavṛttayaḥ santaḥ saṃbhūyaikāṃ prāṇākhyāṃ vṛttiṃ pratilapsyanta iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7882: yuktaṃ tatra pratyekavṛttibhiravāntaravyāpāraiḥ pañjaracālanānurūpairevopetāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ saṃbhūyaikaṃ pañjaraṃ cālayeyuriti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7884: iha tu śravaṇādyavāntaravyāpāropetāḥ prāṇa na saṃbhūya prāṇyuriti yuktam, pramāṇābhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7886: tathā prāṇasya śreṣṭhatvādyudghoṣaṇaṃ guṇabhāvopagamaśca taṃ prati vāgādīnāṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7889: kathaṃ tarhīyaṃ śrutiḥ 'yaḥ prāṇaḥ sa vāyuḥ' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7890: ucyate- vāyurevāyamadhyātmamāpannaḥ pañcavyūho viśeṣātmanāvatiṣṭhamānaḥ prāṇo nāma bhaṇyate na tattvāntaraṃ nāpi vāyumātram /
GSP33brssgo2u:7895_0: tathāhyanekavidhā vibhūtiḥ prāṇasya śrāvyate- 'supteṣu vāgādiṣu prāṇa eko hi jāgarti
GSP33brssgo2u:7895_1: prāṇa eko mṛtyunānāptaḥ prāṇaḥ saṃvargo vāgādīnsaṃvṛṅ kte prāṇa itarānprāṇānrakṣati
GSP33brssgo2u:7899: mukhyaḥ prāṇaḥ kiṃ vāyumātramuta karaṇānāṃ sādhāraṇavyāpāra āhosvittattvāntaramiti vāyuprāṇayorbhedābhedaśrutīnāṃ mithovirodhātsaṃśaye pūrvapakṣamāha-tatreti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7903: tatra prāṇo vāyunādhidaivikena bhātyabhivyañjyate abhivyaktaḥ saṃstapati /
GSP33brssgo2u:7905: śrutiṣu tatra tatra prāṇasya vāgādīnāṃ ca mithaḥ saṃvādaliṅgena pṛthagutpattiliṅgena cendriyatadabhinnavyāpārebhyo 'pi bhinnatvamityāha-tatheti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7906: prāṇasyendriyavṛttitvaṃ śrutyā nirasya yuktyāpi nirasyati-naca samastānāmiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7907: yā cakṣuḥ-sādhyā vṛttiḥ saiva na śrotrādisādhyā,
GSP33brssgo2u:7914: kiñca prāṇasya vṛttitve vāgādīnāmeva prādhānyaṃ vācyaṃ, naitadastītyāha-tathā prāṇasyeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7915: yathā mṛdo ghaṭo na vastvantaraṃ nāpi mṛṇmātraṃ tadvikāratvāt,
GSP33brssgo2u:7917: dehaṃ prāptaḥ pañcāvastho vikārātmanā sthito vāyureva prāṇa ityarthaḥ //9//
GSP33brssgo2u:7924: yathā cakṣurādīni rājaprakṛtivajjīvasya kartṛtvaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ ca pratyupakaraṇāni na svatantrāṇi /
GSP33brssgo2u:7925: tathā mukhyo 'pi prāṇo rājamantrivajjīvasya sarvārthakaratvenopakaraṇabhūto na svatantraḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7929: samānadharmāṇāṃ ca saha śāsanaṃ yuktaṃ bṛhadrathantarādivat /
GSP33brssgo2u:7932: prāṇo na bhoktā, bhogopakaraṇatvāt, cakṣurādivaditi sūtrārthamāha-tuśabda ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7933: yathā bṛhadrathantarayoḥ sarvatra sahaprayujyamānatvena sāmatvena vā sāmyātsahapāṭhastathā karaṇaiḥ sahopakaraṇatvena sāmyātprāṇasya pāṭha iti na hetvasiddhirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7934: kiñca prāṇo na bhoktā, sāvayavatvāt, jaḍatvādbhautikatvācca, dehavat //10//
GSP33brssgo2u:7939: yadi cakṣurādivatprāṇasya jīvaṃ prati karaṇabhāvo 'bhāyupagamyeta,viṣayāntaraṃ rūpādivatprasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:7940: rūpādyālocanādibhirvṛttibhiryathāsvaṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ jīvaṃ prati karaṇabhāvo bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:7941: apicaikādaśaiva kāryajātāni rūpālocanādīni parigaṇitāni yadarthamekādaśa prāṇāḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ natu dvādaśamaparaṃ kāryajātamadhigamyate yadarthamayaṃ dvādaśaḥ prāṇaḥ pratijñāyeteti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7943: akaraṇatvāc ca na doṣas tathā hi darśayati | BBs_2,4.11 |
GSP33brssgo2u:7949_0: tathāhi śrutiḥ prāṇāntareṣvasaṃbhāvyamānaṃ mukhyaprāṇasya vaiśeṣikaṃ kāryaṃ darśayati
GSP33brssgo2u:7949_1: prāṇasaṃvādādiṣu- 'atha ha prāṇā ahaṃśreyasi vyūdire' ityupakramya 'yasminva utkrānte
GSP33brssgo2u:7949_2: śarīraṃ pāpiṣṭhataramiva dṛśyate sa vaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ' (chā. 5.1.6,7)
GSP33brssgo2u:7950_0: iti copanyasya pratyekaṃ vāgādyutkramaṇena tadvṛttimātrahīnaṃ yathāpūrvaṃ jīvanaṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:7950_1: darśayitvā prāṇoccikramiṣāyāṃ vāgādiśaithilyāpattiṃ śarīrapātaprasaṅgaṃ ca darśayantī
GSP33brssgo2u:7951: 'tāvanvariṣṭhaḥ prāṇa uvāca mā mohamāpadyathāhamevaitatpañcadhātmānaṃ pravibhajyaitadbāṇamavaṣṭabhya vidhārayāmi,
GSP33brssgo2u:7953: 4.3.12) iti ca supteṣu cakṣurādiṣu prāṇanimittāṃ śarīrarakṣāṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:7955: 'tena yadaśnāti yatpibati tenetarānprāṇānavati' iti ca prāṇanimittāṃ śarīrendriyapuṣṭiṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:7956: 'kasminnvahamutkrānta utkrānto bhaviṣyāmi kasminvā pratiṣṭhite pratiṣṭhāsyāmi' iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:7957: 'sa prāṇamasṛjata' iti ca prāṇanimitte jīvasyotkrāntapratiṣṭhe darśayati // 11 //
GSP33brssgo2u:7959: FN: ahaṃśreyasi svasya śreṣṭhatānimittaṃ, vyūdire vivādaṃ cakrire /
GSP33brssgo2u:7961: nanu yadbhogopakaraṇaṃ tatsaviṣayaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā cakṣurādikaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7963_1: nirviṣayasyāpi prāṇasya śarīravadbhogopakaraṇatvamakṣataṃ na tu cakṣurādivajjñānakarmakaraṇatvamasti
GSP33brssgo2u:7967: avaraṃ nīcaṃ, kulāyaṃ dehākhyaṃ gṛhaṃ, prāṇena rakṣañjīvaḥ svapitītyarthaḥ-tadaiva tadānīmeva /
GSP33brssgo2u:7968: tena prāṇena yadaśnāti jīvastvena prāṇakṛtāśaneneti yāvat /
GSP33brssgo2u:7975: yatkāraṇaṃ pañcavṛttirayaṃ vyapadiśyate śrutiṣu 'prāṇo 'pāno vyāna udānaḥ samānaḥ' (bṛ. 1.5.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7983: yathā manasaḥ pañca vṛttaya evaṃ prāṇasyāpītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7984: śrotrādinimittāḥ śabdādiviṣayā manasaḥ pañca vṛttayaḥ prasiddhāḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7985: natu kāmaḥ saṃkalpaḥ ityādyāḥ paripaṭhitāḥ parigṛhyeran /
GSP33brssgo2u:7987: nanvatrāpi śrotrādinirapekṣā bhūtabhaviṣyadādiviṣayāparā manaso vṛttirastīti samānaḥ pañcasaṃkhyātirekaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7988_0: evaṃ tarhi 'paramatamapratiṣiddhamanumataṃ bhavati' iti nyāyādihāpi yogaśāstraprasiddhā
GSP33brssgo2u:7989: bahuvṛttitvamātreṇa vā manaḥ prāṇasya nidarśanamiti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7992: FN: pramāṇaṃ pramitiḥ, viparyayo bhramaḥ, śabdajñānānupātī vastuśūnyo vikalpaḥ, tāmasī vṛttirnidrā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7996: kāmādivṛttivajjñāne 'pi pañcatvaniyamo nāstītyaruciṃ svayamevodbhāvya pakṣāntaraṃ gṛhṇāti-nanvatrāpītyādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:8014: nanu vibhutvamapi prāṇasya samāmnāyate- 'samaḥ pluṣiṇā samo maśakena samo nāgena sama ebhistribhirlokaiḥ samo 'nena sarveṇa (bṛ. 1.3.22)
GSP33brssgo2u:8016: taducyate- ādhidaivikena samaṣṭivyaṣṭirūpeṇa hairaṇyagarṇeṇa prāṇātmanaivaitadvibhutvamāmnāyate nādhyātmikena /
GSP33brssgo2u:8017: apica samaḥ pluṣiṇetyādinā sāmyavacanena pratiprāṇivartinaḥ prāṇasya pariccheda eva pradarśyate tasmādadoṣaḥ // 13 //
GSP33brssgo2u:8019: FN: pluṣirmaśakādapi sūkṣmo jantuḥ, nāgo hastī /
GSP33brssgo2u:8026: śrutyā vibhutvamiti virodhe ādhyātmikaprāṇasyālpatvamādhidaivikasya vibhutvamiti viṣayabhedācchrutyoravirodha iti samādhatte-taducyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8027: kiñcopakrame prāṇasya pluṣyādisamatvenālpatvokteḥ sama ebhistribhirlokairiti virāḍdehasāmyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8038_0: te punaḥ prakṛtāḥ prāṇāḥ kiṃ svamahimnaiva svasmai kāryāya prabhavantyāhosviddevatādhiṣṭhitāḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:8038_1: prabhavantīti vicāryate- tatra prāptaṃ tāvadyathā svakāryaśaktiyogātsvamahimnaiva
GSP33brssgo2u:8039: apica devatādhiṣṭhitānāṃ prāṇānāṃ pravṛttāvabhyupagamyamānāyāṃ tāsāmevādhiṣṭhātrīṇāṃ devatānāṃ bhoktṛtvaprasaṅgāccharīrasya bhoktṛtvaṃ pralīyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:8041: evaṃ prāptaṃ idamucyate- jyotirādyadhiṣṭhānaṃ tu iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8043: jyotirādibhiragnyādyabhimāninībhirdevatābhiradhiṣṭhitaṃ vāgādi karaṇajātaṃ svakāryeṣu pravartata iti pratijānīte /
GSP33brssgo2u:8047: nahi devatāsaṃbandhaṃ pratyākhyāyāgnervāci mukhe vā kaścidviśeṣasaṃbandho dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:8048: tathā 'vāyuḥ prāṇo bhūtvā nāsike prāviśat' (aita. 2.4) ityevamādyapi yaujayitavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8049: tathānyatrāpi vāgeva brahmaṇaścaturthaḥ pādaḥ so 'gninā jyotiṣā bhāti ca tapati ca' (chā. 3.18.3)
GSP33brssgo2u:8051: 'sa vai vācameva prathamāmatyavahatsā yadā mṛtyumatyamucyata so 'gnirabhavat' (bṛ. 1.3.12)
GSP33brssgo2u:8064: sa prāṇo vācaṃ prathamāmudgīthakarmāṇi pradhānāṃ anṛtādipāpmarūpaṃ mṛtyumatītyāvahanmṛtyunā muktāṃ kṛtvā agnidevatātmatvaṃ prāpitavān /
GSP33brssgo2u:8066_0: 'vācā hi nāmānyabhivadati cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyati'iti tṛtīyāśrutyānvayavyatirekavatyā
GSP33brssgo2u:8067: naca svakārye śaktānāmapi vāgādīnāmacetanatvādadhiṣṭhātrapekṣā na virudhyata iti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:8070: tathā caikatrānekabhoktṛṇāṃ virodhāddurbalasya jīvasya bhoktṛtvaṃ na syāditi pūrvapakṣārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8073: vāyuḥ prāṇādhiṣṭhātā bhūtvā nāsāpuṭe prāviśaditi vyākhyeyamityāha-tatheti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8076: sa prāṇo vācaṃ prathamāmudgīthakarmaṇi pradhānāmanṛtādipāpmarūpaṃ mṛtyumatītyāvahanmṛtyunā muktāṃ kṛtvā agnidevatātmatvaṃ prāpitavānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8077: kiñca mṛtasyāgniṃ vāgapyeti vātaṃ prāṇaḥ cakṣurādityamityādiśrutirapyadhiṣṭhātradhiṣṭheyatvasaṃbandhaṃ dyotayatītyāha-sarvatreti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8086: yadapyuktaṃ devatānāmevādhiṣṭhātrīṇāṃ bhoktṛtvaprasaṅgo na śārīrasyeti tatparihriyate-
GSP33brssgo2u:8088: satīṣvapi prāṇānāmadhiṣṭātrīṣu devatāsu prāṇavatā kāryakaraṇasaṃghātasvāminā śārīreṇaivaiṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ saṃbandhaḥ śruteravagamyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:8089: tathāhi śrutiḥ - 'atha yatraitadākāśamanuviṣaṇṇaṃ cakṣuḥ sa cākṣuṣaḥ puruṣo darśanāya takṣuratha yo vededaṃ jighrāṇīti sa ātmā gandhāya ghrāṇam' (chā. 8.124)
GSP33brssgo2u:8095: atha dehe prāgapraveśānantaraṃ yatra golake etacchidramanupraviṣṭaṃ cakṣurindriyaṃ tatra cakṣuṣyabhimānī sa ātmā cākṣuṣaḥ tasya rūpadarśanāya cakṣuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8099_0: atha dehe prāṇapraveśānantaraṃ yatra golake etacchidramanupraviṣṭaṃ cakṣurindriyaṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:8099_1: tatra cakṣuṣyabhimānī sa ātmā cākṣuṣaḥ tasya rūpadarśanāya cakṣuḥ yadyapyātmā karaṇānyepakṣate
GSP33brssgo2u:8099_2: tathāpi jñeyajñānatadāśrayāhaṅkārānyo veda sa ātmā cidrūpa eva,
GSP33brssgo2u:8100: karaṇāni tu gandhādipravṛttaye 'pekṣyante na caitanyāyeti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8101: kiñca yo 'haṃ rūpamadrākṣaṃ sa evāhaṃ śṛṇomīti pratisaṃdhānādekaḥ śārīra eva bhoktā na bahavo devā ityāha-apiceti //15//
GSP33brssgo2u:8106: tasya ca śārīrasyāsmiñśarīre bhoktṛtvena nityatvena puṇyapāpopalepasaṃbhavātsukhaduḥkhopabhogasaṃbhavācca na devatānām /
GSP33brssgo2u:8107: tā hi parasminnaiśvarye pade 'vatiṣṭhamānā na hine 'smiñśarīre bhoktṛtvaṃ pratilabdhumarhanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8108: śrutiśca bhavati- 'puṇyamevāmuṃ gacchati na ha vai devānpāpaṃ gacchati' (bṛ. 1.5.3)
GSP33brssgo2u:8109: iti śārīreṇaiva ca nityaḥ prāṇānāṃ saṃbandha utkrāntyādiṣu tadanuvṛttidarśanāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:8112: tasmātsatīṣvapi karaṇānāṃ niyantrīṣu devatāsu na śārīrasya bhoktṛtvamapagacchati /
GSP33brssgo2u:8114: kadāciddevānāmatrabhoktṛtvaṃ kadācijjīvasyetyaniyamo 'stvityāśaṅkya svakarmārjite dehe jīvasya bhoktṛtvaniyamānmaivamityāha-sūtrakāraḥ-tasya ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8116: devatānāṃ tu parasvāmikarathasārathivadadhiṣṭhātṛtvamātramiti vyākhyāntaramāha-śārīreṇaiva ca nitya iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8117: yathā pradīpādiḥ karaṇopakārakatayā karaṇapakṣasyāntargatastathā devāḥ karaṇopakāriṇa eva na bhoktāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8119: devānāṃ tu karaṇopakārābhijñātayā sārathivadadhiṣṭhātṛtvamiti na jīvenānyathāsiddhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8120: devānāmadhiṣṭhātṛtvenāsmindehe bhoktṛtvānumānaṃ tu 'na ha vai devān pāpaṃ gacchati'ityuktaśrutibādhitam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8121: tasmāt 'cakṣuṣā hi rūpāṇi paśyati'iti śruteḥ sādhanatvamātrabodhitvādagnirvāgbhūtvetyādyadhiṣṭhātṛdevatāpekṣābodhakaśrutibhiravirodha iti siddham //16//
GSP33brssgo2u:8126: ta indriyāṇi tadvyapadeśād anyatra śreṣṭhāt | BBs_2,4.17 |
GSP33brssgo2u:8129: kiṃ mukhyasyaiva prāṇasya vṛttibhedā itare prāṇā āhosvittattvāntarāṇīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8132: tathāhi śrutirmukhyamitarāṃśca prāṇānsaṃnidhāpya mukhyātmatāmitareṣāṃ khyāpayati- 'hantāsyaiva sarve rūpamasāmeti ta etasyaiva sarve rūpamabhavan' (bṛ. 1.5.21) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8136: tasmādyathaikasyaiva prāṇasya prāṇādyāḥ pañca vṛttaya evaṃ vāgādyā apyekādaśeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8141: te prakṛtāḥ prāṇāḥ śreṣṭhaṃ varjayitvāvaśiṣṭā ekādaśenjadriyāṇītyucyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:8144: iti hyevañjātīyakeṣu pradeśeṣu pṛthakprāṇo vyapadiśyate pṛthaktcendriyāṇi /
GSP33brssgo2u:8149: prāṇasya tvindriyatvaṃ na śrutau smṛtau vā prasiddhamasti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8151: tattvaikatve tu sa evaikaḥ sanprāṇa indriyavyapadeśaṃ labhate na labhate ceti vipratiṣiddham /
GSP33brssgo2u:8154: FN: asyaiva mukhyaprāṇasya rūpaṃ asāma bhavemeti saṃkalpya, te vāgādayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8156: tānyeva prāṇavṛttivyatirekeṇa na santītyākṣepaṃ pratyāha-ta indriyāṇi tadvyapadeśādanyatra śreṣṭhāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:8158: hanta idānīmasyaiva mukhyaprāṇasya sarve vayaṃ svarūpaṃ bhavāmeti saṃkalpya te vāgādayastathābhavannityabhedaśrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8160: te prāṇāḥ śreṣṭhādanyatra anye iti pratijñārthatvena padatrayaṃ vyācaṣṭe-tattvāntarāṇyeveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8162: prāṇā indriyāṇītyaparyāyaśabdābhyāmanyatvokteriti hetūpapādanārthatvena punastāni sūtrapadāni yojayati-ka ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:8171: siddhānte manasaḥ pramopādānatvādātmavadanindriyatvamiṣṭaṃ tato notsargabādha iti kecit /
GSP33brssgo2u:8172: kiñca 'etasmājjāyate prāṇo manaḥ sarvendriyāṇi ca'iti pṛthagjanmavyapadeśātsvatantravastubheda ityāha-vyapadeśabhedaścāyamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8173: ekasmin vākye prāṇa indriyaśabdamaikyāllabhate punaruktibhayānna labhate ceti vyāghāta ityarthaḥ //17//
GSP33brssgo2u:8179: bhedena vāgādibhyaḥ prāṇaḥ sarvatra śrūyate- 'te ha vācamūcuḥ' (bṛ. 1.3.2)
GSP33brssgo2u:8180: ityupakramya vāgādīnasurapāpmavidhvastānupanyasyopasaṃhṛtya vāgādiprakaraṇam 'atha hemamāsanyaṃ prāṇamūcuḥ' ityasuravidhvaṃsino mukhyasya prāṇasya pṛthagupakramāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:8181: tathā 'mano vācaṃ prāṇaṃ tānyātmane 'kuruta' ityevamādyā api bhedaśrutaya udāhartavyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8184: bhedaśruteriti sūtreṇa prakaraṇabhedo heturukta iti na paunaruktyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8185_0: te ha devāḥ śāstrīyendriyamanovṛttirūpā asurāṇāṃ pāpavṛttirūpāṇāṃ jayārthamudgīthakarmaṇi
GSP33brssgo2u:8185_2: vācamanṛtādidoṣeṇa vidhvaṃsitavantosurā ityevaṃ krameṇa sarveṣvindriyeṣu pāpagrasteṣu
GSP33brssgo2u:8185_3: paścādatheti prakaraṇaṃ vicchidya prasiddhamāsye bhavamāsanyaṃ mukhyaṃ prāṇamūcustanna
GSP33brssgo2u:8185_4: tadgāyeti tena prāṇenodagātrā nirviṣayatayā saṅgadoṣaśūnyenāsurā naṣṭā ityasurāṇāṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:8193: suṣupteṣu vāgādiṣu mukhya eko jāgarti sa eva caiko mṛtyunānāpta āptāstvitare /
GSP33brssgo2u:8195: viṣayālocanahetutvaṃ cendriyāṇāṃ na prāṇasyevañjātīyako bhūyāllakṣaṇabhedaḥ prāṇendriyāṇām /
GSP33brssgo2u:8201_0: iti vāgādīnīndriyāṇyanukramya 'tāni mṛtyuḥ śramo bhūtvopayeme tasmācchrāmyatyeva
GSP33brssgo2u:8201_1: vāk' iti ca śramarūpeṇa mṛtyunā grastatvaṃ vāgādīnāmabhidhāya 'athemameva nāpnodyo
GSP33brssgo2u:8203: 'ayaṃ vai naḥ śreṣṭhaḥ' (bṛ. 1.5.21) iti ca śreṣṭhatāmasyāvadhārayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:8204: tasmāttadavirodhena vāgādiṣu parispandalābhasya prāṇāyattatvaṃ tadrūpabhavanaṃ vāgādīnāmiti mantavyaṃ na tādātmyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8208: iti mukhyaprāṇaviṣayasyaiva prāṇaśabdasyendriyeṣu lākṣaṇikīṃ vṛttiṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:8217: etadeva prāṇaśabdasyendriyeṣu lakṣaṇābījaṃ śrutau 'tasmādeta etenākhyāyanta'iti parāmṛṣṭam,
GSP33brssgo2u:8224: satprakriyāyāṃ tejobannānāṃ sṛṣṭimabhidhāyopadiśyate- 'seyaṃ devataikṣata hantāhamimāstisro devatā anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8229_0: yathā loke cāreṇāhaṃ parasainyamanupraviśya saṃkalayānītyevañjātīyake prayoge cārakartṛkameva
GSP33brssgo2u:8231: apica ḍitthaḍavitthādiṣu nāmasu ghaṭaśarāvādiṣu ca rūpeṣu jīvasyaiva vyākartṛtvaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8236: trivṛtkurvata iti parameśvaraṃ lakṣayati, trivṛtkaraṇe tasya nirapavādakartṛtvanirdeśāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:8238: tathā kuśakāśapalāśādiṣu paśumṛgamanuṣyādiṣu ca pratyākṛti prativyakti cānekaprakārā /
GSP33brssgo2u:8239: sā khalu parameśvarasyaiva tejobannānāṃ nirmātuḥ kṛtirbhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo2u:8241: tathāhi- 'seyaṃ devataikṣata' ityupakramya 'vyākaravāṇi' ityuttamapuruṣaprayogeṇa parasyaiva brahmaṇo vyākartṛtvamihopadiśyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:8245: tena hi saṃbandhe vyākaravāṇītyayaṃ devatāviṣaya uttamapuruṣa aupacārikaḥ kalpyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:8246: naca girinadīsamudrādiṣu nānāvidheṣu nāmarūpeṣvanīśvarasya jīvasya vyākaraṇasāmarthyamasti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8247: yeṣvapi cāsti sāmarthyaṃ teṣvapi parameśvarāyattameva tat /
GSP33brssgo2u:8248: naca jīvo nāma parameśvarādatyantabhinnaścāra iva rājñaḥ, ātmaneti viśeṣaṇāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:8256: tacca trivṛtkaraṇamagnyādityacandravidyutsu śrutirdarśayati- 'yadagre rohitaṃ rūpaṃ tejasastadrūpaṃ yacchuklaṃ tadapāṃ yatkṛṣṇaṃ tadannasya' (chā. 6.4.1) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:8258: sati ca rūpavyākaraṇe viṣayapratilambhādagniritīdaṃ nāma vyākriyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:8260: anena cāgnyādyudāharaṇena bhaumāmbhasataijaseṣu triṣvapi dravyeṣvaviśeṣeṇa trivṛtkaraṇamuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:8263: aviśeṣeṇaiva copasaṃhāraḥ - 'yadu rohitamivābhūditi tejasastadrūpam' ityevamādiḥ 'yadavijñātamivābhūdityetāsāmeva devatānāṃ samāsa iti' (chā. 6.4.6.7) evamantaḥ // 20 //
GSP33brssgo2u:8266: tāsāṃ tisṛṇāmekaikāṃ devatāṃ tejobannātmanā tryātmikāṃ kariṣyāmīti śrutiḥ pañcīkaraṇopalakṣaṇārthā /
GSP33brssgo2u:8267: utpattirutpādaneti ca kāryakartrorvyāpārau prasiddhau tatra jagadutpattiśrutivirodhaḥ atītena pādadvayaina nirastaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:8270: sthūlabhūtotpādane tvasti śrutivipratipattiriti tannirāsārthamāha-saṃjñāmūrtikḷptistu trivṛtkurvata upadeśāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:8275: hanta idānīṃ devatāḥ sūkṣmā anupraviśyeti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8276: tāsāṃ tisṛṇāṃ devatānāmekaikāṃ devatāṃ tejobannātmanā tryātmikāṃ kariṣyāmīti śrutiḥ pañcīkaraṇopalakṣaṇārthā /
GSP33brssgo2u:8278: evaṃ sthūlīkṛteṣu bhūteṣu prāṇināṃ vyavahāraḥ setsyatīti paradevatāyāstātparyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8280: pūrvapakṣe jīvasyaiva bhautikasraṣṭṛtvādbrahmaṇaḥ sarvasraṣṭṛtvāsiddhiḥ siddhānte tatsiddhiriti phalam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8281: jīvenetyasya vyākaravāṇītipradhānakriyāpadena saṃbandha iti pūrvapakṣamāha-tatra prāptamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8282: paradevatāyā akartṛtve kathamuttamapuruṣaprayoga ityāśaṅkya prayojakatvātkartṛtvopacāra ityāha-yathā loka iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8289: nanu tarhi praveśakriyā jīvakartṛkā vyākaraṇamīśvarakartṛkamiti kartṛbhedāt kṛtvāpratyayo na syādityata āha-naca jīvo nāmeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8290: vastutastu sūryo jale praviṣṭa iti pratibimbabhāvākhyapraveśe sūryasyaiva kartṛtvaprayogājjīvātmanā praveśe 'pīśvara eva karteti kṛtvāśrutiryukteti bodhyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8291: nanvabhedaścejjīva eva vyākartā kiṃ na syādityāśaṅkya kalpanayā bhinnasya tasyāśaktatvācchrutivirodhācca maivamityāha-parameśvara iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8292: pratyekaṃ mahābhūtasargasya prāguktatvādiha vyākaraṇavākye yatnapūrvakaṃ sthīlabhautikasarga ucyata iti pāṭhavyatyayena sūtrasūcitaṃ śrutyarthamāha-trivṛtkaraṇapūrvakamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8296: nanvagnyādīnāṃ taijasānāmeva śrutāvudāharaṇadbhūjalayosatryātmakatvaṃ na vivakṣitamityata āha-anena ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8298: yatkapotarūpādikaṃ kṛṣṇatvādiviśeṣākāreṇa vijñātamiva bhavati taddevatānāṃ samudāyarūpamityarthaḥ //20//
GSP33brssgo2u:8302: tāsāṃ tisṛṇāṃ devatānāṃ bahistrivṛtkṛtānāṃ satīnāmadhyātmamaparaṃ trivṛtkaraṇamuktam- 'imāstisro devatāḥ puruṣaṃ prāpya trivṛttrivṛdekaikā bhavati' (chā. 6.4.7) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8306: tathāhi śrutiḥ - 'annamaśitaṃ tredhā vidhīyate tasya yaḥ sthaviṣṭho dhātustatpurīṣaṃ bhavati yo madhyamastanmāṃsaṃ yo 'ṇiṣṭhastanmanaḥ' (chā. 6.5.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8316: uttarasūtreṇāśaṅkitaṃ doṣaṃ nirasitumādau śaṅkāviṣayamādhyātmikatrivṛtkaraṇaṃ darśayatīti bhāṣyārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8317: nanvannamayaṃ māṃsādi kathaṃ bhaumamityata āha-trivṛtkṛtā bhūmireveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8322: atrāha- yadi sarvameva trivṛtkṛtaṃ bhūtabhautikamaviśeṣaśruteḥ 'tāsa trivṛtaṃ trivṛtamekaikāmakarot' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8323: kiṅkṛtastarhyayaṃ viśeṣavyapadeśaḥ 'idaṃ teja imā āpa idamannam' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8334: vyavahāraśca trivṛtkṛtarajjuvadekatvāpattau satyāṃ na bhedena bhūtatrayagocaro lokasya prasiddhyet /
GSP33brssgo2u:8335: tasmātsatyapi trivṛtkaraṇe vaiśeṣyādeva tejobannaviśeṣavādo bhūtabhautikaviṣaya upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:8345: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīmadgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //4//
